As per the results of a survey across India , around 209.9 thousand female students were awarded their undergraduate degree in Karnataka during academic year 2019 . The number of male graduates was considerably lesser that year compared to female graduates .
This statistic shows the time of average maximum lock-up period accepted by selected hedge fund investors worldwide in 2018 . In that year , a sovereign wealth fund was willing to accept a lock-up period of 33 months .
This statistic shows the progression of average consumer prices for alcoholic beverages in Russia from 2000 to 2018 . In the last 18 years , alcohol prices have more than quadrupled . Overall , the growth rate within the observed period was positive and accelerated until 2016 .
This statistic shows the main export partners of Turkey in 2017 . Germany was the leading export partner of Turkey in 2017 , with a share of 9.6 percent in all exports .
The statistic shows the number of crowdfunding platforms worldwide from 2010 to 2012 . In 2011 , there were 434 crowdfunding platforms globally .
The statistic shows Minnesota Vikings players with the most touchdowns scored in franchise history . Cris Carter is the career touchdown leader of the Minnesota Vikings with 110 touchdowns .
Legalization of cannabis for recreational and medicinal use in Canada and the U.S. has allowed big pharmaceutical companies to capitalize on the industry through cannabis patents and distribution . As of 2019 , Abbvie had the largest number of patents among all cannabis patent holders in the United States . With 59 patents for cannabis they were far above even the second ranked company , Sanofi , which had 39 patents at that time .
This statistic gives information on the online shopping conversion rates on Black Friday 2018 , sorted by device . On Black Friday 2018 , 2.96 percent of smartphone shopping sessions by U.S. online shoppers ended in a purchase .
From 2004 to 2018 , the total number of deaths in France has been increasing , reaching 601,000 in 2018 compared to 509,429 deaths fifteen years earlier . This increase has also been seen in the death rate in France . Over the same time period , the death rate in the country went from 8.3 per 1,000 inhabitants , up to 9.2 in 2018 .
This statistic illustrates the number of tablet computers owned per household in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2013 . In 2013 , 9 percent of UK adults stated they had two or more tablet computers at home . On average , tablet-owning homes in the UK have 1.5 tablets .
This statistic illustrates the percentage change in sales turnover from the manufacture of food products and beverages products in the Netherlands from 2007 to 2017 . Food and beverage manufacturers ' turnover fell by 6.9 percent in 2009 , the biggest decline over the period in consideration . In 2017 , the percentage change in the turnover was 4.8 percent , indicating that the turnover of the food products and beverages products manufacturing increased by 4.8 percent .
This statistic shows the ranking with the most frequently diagnosed types of cancer in Spain in 2020 . That year , it was estimated that around 44.2 thousand new cases of colorectal cancer , commonly known as bowel cancer , were diagnosed in Spain .
This statistic displays price disparities for Pfizer 's pharmaceutical product Viagra as of Q2 2017 . For this time , Viagra cost 58.72 U.S. dollars per pill in the U.S. while the same drug was available for 4.44 U.S. dollars per pill in India .
As of April 2 , 2020 , the daily increase of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) cases in Bahrain amounted to 74 cases . As of the same date , there were four deaths and 381 recoveries recorded in the country .
The statistic shows Hapag-Lloyd 's number of twenty-foot equivalent units as of October 12 , 2020 . The Germany-based transportation company owned ships with a total capacity of around 1.05 million TEUs in October 2020 . In December 2014 , Hapag-Lloyd completed its merger with CSAV to become one of the largest container shipping companies worldwide .
This statistic ranks the share of of time spent on mobile phones in Indonesia as of August 2018 . During the measured period , 25 percent of mobile phone users in Indonesia spent their time the most on mobile game apps . In comparison , only eight percent of mobile phone users in Indonesia spent their time the most on a phone call or messages .
This statistic shows the impact of responses by accommodation management to reviews of their services on their TripAdvisor rating worldwide as of September 2014 . Accommodations with a 40 to 65 percent response rate had an average TripAdvisor rating of 4.05 .
This statistic shows the quarterly trend in the volume of clothing retail sales ( quantity bought ) in Great Britain from 1st quarter 2015 to 2nd quarter 2020 . The figures are seasonally adjusted estimates , measured using the Retail Sales Index ( RSI ) and published in index form with a reference year of 2016 equal to 100 . Over the time period observed , sales reached their highest peak during the second quarter of 2019 , with the index measuring at 108.4 .
This statistic presents the monthly U.S. traffic to subscription box sites in January 2013 and 2016 . As of January 2016 , subscription retail sites in the United States generated a total of 21.4 million visits , a nearly 3,000 percent increase from three years prior .
This statistic shows the leading private household and personal care products companies in the United States in 2019 , ranked by revenue . In 2019 , SC Johnson had an estimated revenue of 10.5 billion U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows the American customer satisfaction index scores for Outback Steakhouse restaurants in the United States from 2007 to 2020 . In 2020 , the ACSI score for Outback Steakhouse restaurants in the U.S. was 78 .
This statistic shows the 10 countries with the largest number of Christians worldwide in 2010 . 246,78 million Christians are living in the United States .
This statistic shows the ten leading fast moving consumer goods ( FMCG ) brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) , ranked by average household purchase frequency per year in 2018 . That year , Warburtons had the highest frequency of products purchased by households in the UK , at approximately 22 times a year .
This statistic shows the fertility rate in Argentina from 2008 to 2018 . The fertility rate is the average number of children born to a woman while being of child-bearing age . In 2018 , the fertility rate in Argentina came to 2.26 children per woman .
This statistic presents the annual value of visitor exports in Germany from 2012 to 2018 , with a forecast for 2028 . Visitor exports ( leisure and business travel spending by international tourists ) valued around 44.4 billion euros in 2017 . This figure is expected to increase in the future .
The timeline shows the per capita consumption of fresh lettuce ( head ) in the United States from 2000 to 2019 . According to the report , the U.S. per capita consumption of fresh lettuce ( head ) amounted to 12.7 pounds in 2019 .
The statistic shows the youth unemployment rate in Afghanistan from 2010 and 2020 . According to the source , the data are ILO estimates . In 2020 , the estimated youth unemployment rate in Afghanistan was at 17.53 percent .
In Romania , the highest number of patients hospitalized at intensive care due to coronavirus infection was reported on December 11 , totaling 1,299 patients . Since November 4 , there have been at least one thousand patients in critical condition . For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic , please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page .
This statistic shows used merchandise store sales in the United States from 1992 to 2018 . In 2018 , U.S. used merchandise store sales came to about 18.8 billion U.S. dollars .
The graph shows the leading smartwatch companies worldwide in 2013 . In that year , Samsung was the top smartwatch company with sales that amounted to 240 million U.S. dollars .
In the second quarter of 2020 , Facebook stated that nine million active advertisers were using the social networking platform to promote their products and services , up from seven million advertisers in the first quarter of the previous year .
This statistic shows the frequency with which luxury or prestige cars are stolen in Great Britain in 2011 and 2012 . These types of luxury cars are mostly stolen to order , meaning that they were sought out specifically on request rather than stolen by an opportunist . BMW , especially the X6 model , was by far the luxury brand which was stolen the most over this period .
This statistic shows the average per capita consumption of fruit juice ( including fruit nectar ) in Europe in 2018 , by country . In 2018 , per capita consumption of fruit juice and nectar in Austria amounted to 21.5 liters .
The number of dentists employed in Iceland was overall lower during the second half of the observed period . The number peaked in 2008 , reaching 301 dentists . In 2019 , there were 285 dentists employed in Iceland .

The statistic shows the distribution of funds paid out per equity based project on crowdfunding platforms in 2012 . Equity based crowdfunding raised the most funds per project as compared to donation-based and reward-based crowdfuning . In 2012 , the funds paid-out by 42 percent of the projects exceeded 100,000 U.S. dollars .
This statistic displays the best selling artist albums in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2016 , ranked by copies sold . The top selling album was 25 by Adele which sold roughly 753 thousand copies that year .
This statistic depicts the percentage of the population who had depression worldwide from 1990 to 2017 . According the data , 3.44 percent of the population worldwide had depression in 2017 .
This statistic shows the results of a survey about the penetration rate of several individual leisure activities in France in 2015 , phrased with the question : `` except reading books , which of the following leisure activities do you do in your free time ? '' . It was found that listening to music was the most practiced leisure activity with a penetration rate of 88 percent of respondents , followed very closely by 82 percent of respondents who stated that they go out with friends in their free time with . Even though music is a very popular activity , it seems that French people would probably not choose to listen to music if they had more free time .
The statistic illustrates the weekly average internet usage in South Korea as of September 2019 . During the survey period , it was found that 26.8 percent of internet users accessed the web for about 21 to 35 hours per week .
This statistic shows life expectancy in France , at birth , from 2008 to 2018 . In 2018 , the average life expectancy at birth among the French population was 82.72 years .
The statistic shows the market share of the leading physician-dispensed topical brands in the United States in 2012 . In that year , 26 percent of topical brands prescribed by physicians in the United States was Allergan Medical .
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Zimbabwe from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , the infant mortality rate in Zimbabwe was at about 38.4 deaths per 1,000 live births .
Inflation in Myanmar dropped to a five-year low in 2017 , settling at 4.62 percent . This is down from a fairly high spike in 2016 , expected to converge to a steady state around 6 percent in the coming years . For a developing economy , this is an acceptable level , though Myanmar 's central bankers would probably prefer one or two percentage points less .
In 2019 , corporations made profits of almost 1.94 trillion U.S. dollars after tax in the United States . Corporate profits are defined as the net income of corporations in the National Income and Product Accounts ( NIPA ) .
This statistic shows the average annual expenditure of consumer units in the United States in 2019 , by region . In 2019 , the average U.S. consumer unit residing in the northeast U.S. spent about 68,795 U.S. dollars . The total average U.S. consumer spending amounted to 63,036 U.S. dollars .

This statistic shows the share of registered voters in the United States in 2018 , by gender . In that year , about 63 percent of females in the United States were registered to vote .
The North American and Caribbean region spent some 325 billion U.S. dollars on health care for people with diabetes in 2019 . Health care expenditures were the lowest in Africa and Southeast Asia that year .
This statistic shows the population growth in Turkey from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , Turkey 's population grew by 1.34 percent compared to the previous year .
This statistic shows the degree of urbanization in Uruguay from 2009 to 2019 . Urbanization means the share of urban population in the total population of a country . In 2019 , 95.43 percent of Uruguay 's total population lived in urban areas and cities .
This statistic displays the results of a survey on the share of LinkedIn users in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in January 2018 , by household income . In 2018 , it was found that 22 percent of responding UK online adults living in a household with an annual income of under £14,000 were LinkedIn users .
This statistic shows the results of a survey among Americans conducted annually from 2007 to 2016 asking if they are planning to celebrate Valentine 's Day in the respective year . 54.9 percent of respondents stated they are planning to celebrate Valentine 's Day in 2015 .
This statistic shows the revenue of Empire Company Limited in Canada from 2013 to 2020 . For the 52 weeks ended May 2 , 2020 , Empire Company Limited generated approximately 26.59 billion Canadian dollars in sales .
This statistic illustrates the home ownership rate among the total population of Italy between 2008 and 2018 . During that timeframe , the home ownership rate oscillated between approximately 72 to 74 percent of the total population .
This statistic shows the gross domestic product ( GDP ) of Manitoba in 2019 , by industry . In 2019 , the GDP of the construction industry in Manitoba was 4.81 billion chained 2012 Canadian dollars .
As of 2019 , the movie in ‘ The Fast and the Furious ' franchise with the highest production budget was by far ‘ The Fate of the Furious ' _ , which cost 250 million U.S. dollars to make . ‘ The Fate of the Furious ' was the eighth instalment in the series and proved itself a worthwhile investment after grossing almost 1.24 billion U.S. dollars at box offices worldwide . Even more successful was ‘ Furious 7 ' _ , which cost 190 million dollars to produce and generated box office revenue of more than 1.5 billion .
The statistic shows the youth unemployment rate in Mexico from 1999 and 2020 . According to the source , the data are ILO estimates . In 2020 , the estimated youth unemployment rate in Mexico was at 7.58 percent .

This statistic presents the losses incurred as a result of automated teller machines - related attacks or incidents reported in selected European countries from 2010 to 2019 . According to data on the number of fraud incidents such as transaction reversal fraud , card skimming and physical attacks , the number of ATM attacks increased between 2018 and 2019 . During the period displayed , the value of losses incurred through payment terminal crimes fluctuated .
This statistic shows the development of the share of households in the United Kingdom ( UK ) connected to the internet via broadband connection from 2003 to 2019 . While in 2003 , 11 percent of households had access to the internet via broadband , the share increased to 96 percent in 2019 .
Kenya 's unemployment rate was 2.64 percent in 2019 . This represents a steady decline from the increase after the financial crisis .
This statistic presents the total length of the road network in Japan from 2010 to 2017 . In 2017 , the overall length of roads in Japan amounted to approximately 1.28 million kilometers , representing a slight increase from around 1.27 million kilometers in 2010 .

Yandex 's historical maximum net income marked in 2018 at over 44 billion Russian rubles , fell by 75 percent over the following year amounting to 11.2 billion Russian rubles , twelve months ended December 31 , 2019 .

This statistic provides a forecast of the compound annual growth rate of selected digital ad formats between 2016 and 2021 . The source projected that mobile advertising would grow 21.6 percent annually in the presented period .
This statistic shows the degree of urbanization in Cyprus from 2009 to 2019 . Urbanization means the share of urban population in the total population of a country . In 2019 , 66.81 percent of Cyprus total population lived in urban areas and cities .
Since the outbreak of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) , as of November 20 , 62580 cases have been confirmed in Slovenia . The highest number of infections remains within the 45 - 54 age group , from which 12866 people are infected . People in the age group 35 - 44 years are the second biggest group , with 12469 infections .
The global pandemic caused by coronavirus COVID-19 could have a prolonged impact on China 's economy . Manufacturing sector was estimated to drop by 3.61 percentage points form the baseline of no global coronavirus crisis . The overall impact was projected to be a decline by 3.54 percentage point .
This statistic shows the household penetration rates for dog-ownership in the United States from 1988 to 2016 . In 2016 , some 48 percent of U.S. households owned a dog , an increase from 44 percent of households in 2014 .

This statistic depicts the share of homes with a garden across Europe in 2014 , by country . While in the United Kingdom ( UK ) the majority of homes had a garden , only 27 percent of Spanish homes included an outside area .

The innovative financial services developed by UK and Irish Fintech companies attracted approximately 623 million U.S. dollars in 2014 . The investments in other European regions grew in the last year : approximately 345 million U.S. dollars was invested in new companies in the Nordic region and 306 million dollars in Dutch companies .
This statistic shows the number of cars sold by Ford in France between 2009 and 2018 . French sales of Ford cars declined over the duration of the period from 133.1 thousand units sold in 2009 to under 100 thousand units by 2012 .
The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in Ecuador from 1985 to 2018 , with projections up until 2025 . GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country in a year . It is considered to be a very important indicator of the economic strength of a country and a positive change is an indicator of economic growth .
This statistic shows the number of international students in Canada from 2000 to 2017 at year 's end . In 2017 , there were 492,533 international students in Canada at year 's end .

In 2019 , the Columbia Sportswear Company 's footwear category accounted for a 23 percent share of the company 's net sales . The company had net sales of 3.04 billion U.S. dollars that year .

This statistic shows the net income of Rogers Communications Inc. from 2010 to 2019 . In 2019 , Rogers Communications earned a net income of 2.04 billion Canadian dollars . Overall , Rogers generated about 15.1 billion Canadian dollars in revenue in 2019 .

This statistic shows the gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Catalonia between 2003 and 2019 . GDP refers to the total market value of all goods and services that are produced within a country per year . It is an important indicator of the economic strength of a country .
As of December 15 , 2020 , Denmark had the highest test rate for the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) among the Nordic countries . Around 1,484 tests per thousand people were performed in the country . Iceland followed with 662 tests per thousand people .
At the end of fiscal year 2019 , the national highways length across the Indian state of Maharashtra was over 17 thousand kilometers . National highways are constructed and governed by the National Highway Authority of India . The highways made up a share of about two percent of the total Indian roads and carried about 40 percent of the traffic .
The statistic shows the total attendance at NCAA Pac-12 Conference college football games in the United States from 2003 to 2019 . In the 2019 college football season , a total of 78 Pac-12 Conference games were attended by a total of 3.59 million spectators .

Fortnite is an online battle royale video game developed by Epic Games and released in 2017 . Fortnite events on the video streaming service Twitch were watched for a combined 82.98 million hours in November 2020 .
This statistic shows the 50 metropolitan areas with the highest poverty rate in the United States in 2019 . The McAllen-Edinburg-Mission metropolitan area in Texas was ranked first with 27.3 percent of its population living below the poverty level in 2019 .

Tokyo Prefecture and Hyogo Prefecture had the highest number with four clusters each . Tokyo also marked the highest number of patients with the virus as of April 2 .

This statistic shows the grey population pressure in the Netherlands from 2009 to 2019 . It reveals that between 2009 and 2019 , the grey population pressure continuously increased , from 24.5 percent in 2009 to 32.6 percent in 2019 .

This statistic shows the trend in the volume of sales ( quantity bought ) across all retailing sectors in Great Britain monthly from January 2015 to November 2020 . Despite some fluctuation , retail sales volumes have generally increased during the time period in question , except during the first months of 2020 , when a low index value of 79.6 was reached in April 2020 . Most recently , retail sales reached an indexed volume of 105.2 in November 2020 .
Mass media corporation 21st Century Fox generated 30.4 billion U.S. dollars in revenue in the fiscal year 2018 , up from 28.5 billion U.S. dollars in the previous year . The company made over half of its revenue in cable network programming in 2018 and a further 8.75 billion U.S. dollars was derived from its filmed entertainment segment .
The country with the largest new production capacity of linear low-density polyethylene ( LLDPE ) worldwide between 2019 and 2021 is expected to be China , amounting to some 3.4 million metric tons of new capacity during that timeframe . In second place was the United States , with new LLDPE production capacity forecast to amount to 1.71 million metric tons .
In the view of the coronavirus ( COVD-19 ) pandemic , Russians ' purchases of refrigerators and freezers skyrocketed over the second week of March 2020 . Namely , on good.ru , sales of such products grew by more than 16 times over the observed period relative to the yearly average in 2019 , while ozon.ru recorded a fourfold growth of refrigerator and freezer sales in March 2020 .
In 2019 , China exported approximately 2.5 trillion U.S. dollars worth of goods . This indicated a growth in export value of less than one percent compared to the previous year .
The statistic depicts the most popular activities on leisure trips of the survey respondents . One of the most frequently done activity amongst leisure trip travellers was dining in a restaurant . 70.3 percent of the respondents had done so .
Søstrene Grene is a Danish retail chain , offering interior decor , home accessories , kitchenware , gifts and stationary furniture . In recent years its revenue increased constantly , amounting to around 1.1 billion Danish kroner during the financial year starting on May 1 , 2018 and ending on April 30 , 2019 . The retail company 's revenue was highest on the Nordic market , reaching roughly 443 million Danish kroner .

This statistic shows the geographical distribution of contact centers worldwide as of December 2016 . During the survey , 24 percent of contact center industry leaders said their organization was located in Europe .
The statistic shows the national debt of Panama from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024 . In 2018 , the national debt of Panama amounted to around 25.69 billion U.S. dollars .
In 2019 , the North Italian region Emilia-Romagna had the largest increase in inhabitants , with a net migration of 5,2 per 1,000 inhabitants , followed by Lombardy . On the contrary , Calabria recorded the lowest net migration rate , with a negative value of 7.1 . Similarly , several regions in the South and in the Center showed negative figures , which means that the amount of residents who moved out of these regions was higher than the number of residents moving into the same areas .
According to April 2020 survey data of adults in the United States , 10 percent of respondents aged 30 to 44 years were currently using Bumble . Adults aged 18 to 29 years were most likely to use the social dating app , as 13 percent of respondents from that age group confirmed being current users .
In 2016 , it was estimated that around 51.5 percent of the income generated in the Dominican Republic was held by the richest 20 percent of its population . This share has shown a slight upward tendency since 2014 , when it stood at 50.2 percent . The level of wealth concentration was also high among other Latin American countries .
The statistic shows leading music consumption technologies in India as of May 2014 . During a survey . 13 percent of respondents stated they used most often used video apps to listen to music .
In 2019 , Gazprom produced over 501 billion cubic meters of natural and associated gas in Russia , which was the highest volume recorded since 2012 . Between 2018 and 2019 , the production increased by approximately 0.5 percent . Gazprom is one of the largest natural gas extractors in the world .

This statistic displays the preliminary estimates of the peat production in Canada , distributed by province , in 2019 . During this year , Quebec produced some 383,000 metric tons of this mineral . Peat moss is often used in agriculture and forestry due to its ability to stimulate plant growth through increasing water infiltration and loosening clay soils .

During the survey period , 81 percent of respondents stated that Instagram was their favorite social platform to engage with brand content , followed by Facebook with 79 percent .

According to a CIO survey , when asked about the top three priorities to help their businesses preserve amid the COVID-19 pandemic , 37 percent of the CIO respondents put digital transformation activities and remote work experiences on top of their list . As the pandemic prompted widespread practice of social distancing , remote working becomes the new reality of many businesses .
This statistic shows the per capita personal income in South Carolina from 2000 to 2019 . In 2019 , the per capita personal income in South Carolina was 45,438 U.S. dollars . Personal income is the income that is received by persons from all sources .
This statistic displays the age distribution of pornhub.com visitors in Poland in 2017 . In that year , 15 percent of pornhub.com visitors from Poland were between 35 and 44 years of age .
From March 4 to March 25 , 2020 , the number of trips on Mexico City 's public transportation system decreased due to the COVID-19 outbreak and the social distancing measures implemented by the local government . For example , the Mexico City Metro suffered a drop of around 44.3 percent .
This statistic presents the value of ginger , saffron , turmeric , thyme , bay leaves and curry imported to the United Kingdom ( UK ) annually from 2001 to 2019 . Imports of ginger , saffron , thyme , turmeric , bay leaves , and curry were valued at approximately 95 million British pounds in 2019 .
The statistic presents the results of a survey conducted in January and February 2018 to find out about the situation of women and gender ( in ) equality across 27 countries . In Mexico , male respondents guessed that approximately 29 percent of members of the Mexican Congress were women . According to the source , around 43 percent of representatives in the Mexican legislature were , in fact , women .
U.S. citizens with a professional degree had the highest median household income in 2019 , at 162,127 U.S. dollars . In comparison , those with less than a 9th grade education made significantly less money , at 30,355 U.S. dollars .
The timeline shows the value of product shipments of dried and dehydrated fruits and vegetables in the United States from 2002 to 2016 . In 2016 , the value of U.S. product shipments of dried and dehydrated fruits and vegetables amounted to 4.2 billion U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows the number of births in New Brunswick , Canada from 2001 to 2020 . Between July 1 , 2019 and June 30 , 2020 , a total of 6,316 people were born in New Brunswick .
This statistic shows the number of poor families in the U.S. from 1990 to 2019 . In 2019 , there was a total of 6.5 million poor families living in the United States . Poverty is the state of one who lacks a certain amount of material possessions or money .
This statistic shows the revenue of reporting nonprofit organizations in the United States from 1998 to 2016 . In 2016 , these nonprofit organizations reported revenues to the IRS in the amount of 2.62 trillion U.S. dollars .
The average prices of property in Spain as of October 2020 varied greatly by autonomous community . The Community of Madrid topped the list with an average house price per built square metre of approximately 2.6 thousand euros . Catalonia followed closely behind , with an average property price that amounted to nearly 2.4 thousand euros .
The COVID-19 pandemic at the beginning of 2020 hit the sports industry hard . Many professional leagues across the globe suspended their seasons , while Major League Soccer postponed the start of its new season for 30 days in light of the pandemic . This jeopardized the league 's media rights deal , which brings in annual revenues of an estimated 90 million U.S. dollars .
This timeline shows the adidas Group 's hardware production worldwide from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , the adidas Group produced 127 million units of hardware worldwide .
The graph shows the share of mobile apps worldwide using selected mobile analytics software development kits ( SDKs ) in 2017 . According to the source , Google Tag Manger was the most popular mobile analytics SDK with a 63.25 percent usage reach . Facebook Analytics was ranked second with a 21.17 percent install rate .
The statistic shows the number of papers published in the field of artificial intelligence ( AI ) by country worldwide from 1997 to 2017 . The number of AI-related papers published in the United States amounted to almost 370 thousand .
This statistic shows the responses to a study about social network usage in Canada as of January 2015 . During the reported period , 36 percent of Canadian adults aged 18 to 34 had a Twitter account . Furthermore , 15 percent of adults aged 55 to 64 also had a Twitter account .
The operating revenue generated by the Japanese air transportation company ANA Holdings Inc. amounted to approximately 1.97 trillion Japanese yen as of March 31 , 2020 , down from its former peak of about 2.06 trillion in the previous fiscal year . The holding is the parent company of All Nippon Airways ( ANA ) , Japan 's largest airline , which operating revenues from air transportation decreased due to diminishing demand in light of COVID-19 .
The timeline shows the value of U.S. product shipments of vacuum cleaners from 2002 to 2011 . In 2009 , the value of U.S. product shipments of vacuum cleaners amounted to 1.1 billion U.S. dollars .
The statistic shows the total assets of the SLM Corporation , commonly known as Sallie Mae , from 2010 to 2019 . The total assets of this publicly traded U.S. corporation , whose operations are originating , servicing and collecting on student loans , amounted to approximately 32.69 billion U.S. dollars in 2019 .
This graph shows the average age of cars on the road in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2000 and 2016 , including projections for 2015 and 2016 . It can be seen that before the recession the average age of cars in the UK was falling , however , since the recession the average age has risen drastically and will probably continue to rise . These figures show that people were preferring to hold onto their cars for longer rather than sell them to buy new cars .
This statistic presents the development of net banking income ( one of the key indicators of the industry ) of European banks from 2009 to 2013 . In 2013 net banking income reached approximately 700 billion euros .
This statistic shows the highest-paid soccer managers in the 2014/15 season . Pep Guardiola was the best paid soccer manager in the world in 2014/15 , earning a salary of 24 million U.S. dollars in his position at Bayern Munich .
The statistic shows information on the percentage of Canadians who think people who die with unfinished business sometimes become ghosts as of February 2016 . During the survey it was found that 30 percent of respondents believed the deceased sometimes become ghosts .
By December 22 , 2020 , the total number of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) cases was 136,931 out of which 12,726 were active cases . At the same time , there were over 120 thousand recoveries and 2,803 deaths registered in the Republic of Moldova . For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic , please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page .
This statistic gives information on the most common sources of candidates to gather information before applying to jobs . During an April 2017 survey of recent job switchers , 38 percent of respondents stated that they used LinkedIn to gather information before applying for a job . Company websites were ranked first with a 53 percent usage rate .
In fiscal year 2019 , the production volume of calcium carbide across India was around 83 thousand metric tons . The Indian chemical industry is highly diversified . With a coverage of over 80 thousand products , the south Asian country was the sixth largest producer of chemicals in the world and the fourth largest in Asia .
This statistic depicts the number of people worldwide with select mental health and substance use disorders as of 2017 . According to the data , a total of 284 million people worldwide suffered from anxiety as of this time .
This statistic illustrates the voter turnout for general elections held in Germany from 1949 to 2017 . In the most recent election , preliminary results show voter turnout to amount to 76.2 percent of the voter population . An increase compared to the election held four years ago at 71.5 percent voter turnout .
The graph shows information on the average daily and monthly number of mobile games played in the United States as of April 2016 . According to the source , mobile gamers in the U.S. played an average of 1.3 mobile games per day in the measured period .
This statistic shows the percentage of female teenagers having surfed a pornographic site in France in 2017 , by type of site visited . For example , more than 80 % of girls who have surfed a pornographic site have , at least once in their lifetime , visited a site with free pornographic content . Paid sites are largely less privileged , with only 6 % of girls who have ever visited a paid porn site .
The statistic shows the budget balance in the United Kingdom from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024 . A positive value indicates a state surplus ; a negative value , a state deficit . In 2018 , the state deficit of the United Kingdom was around 29.33 billion pounds .
Of people who have given to charity in England , the average amount which people gave in the month prior to being asked was 24 British pounds in 2019/20 , compared with 20 pounds in 2014/15 .
This statistic shows the total population of the Kingdom of Eswatini , from 2015 to 2017 , with projections up until 2025 . In 2017 , the total population of Eswatini amounted to approximately 1.09 million inhabitants .
The state of Quintana Roo was among the least populated regions in Mexico in 2018 . Still , the number of inhabitants living in Quintana Roo has increased in the last decade , from less than 1.3 million residents in 2008 to over 1.7 million in 2018 .
This statistic shows the share of American high school students in grades 9 to 12 who stated they have seriously considered attempting suicide during the 12 months before the survey . The results have been sorted by ethnicity and sexual identity . According to the source , 39.2 percent of student respondents with a Hispanic background stated they have seriously considered attempting suicide during the 12 months before the survey .
This statistic shows the population growth in Jordan from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , Jordan 's population increased by approximately 1.45 percent compared to the previous year . When looking at a ranking of population growth by country , Jordan is one of the nations with the highest growth .
This statistic presents the most popular online dating apps according to online users in the United States . As of January 2018 , seven percent of survey respondents stated that Match.com was their favorite online dating app or website .
This statistic displays the percentage of the population volunteering in the U.S. from 2008 to 2017 . In 2017 , about 25.1 percent of adults in America were volunteering .
This statistic shows the most severe heat waves and cold waves in the United States from 1900 to 2016 , by the amount of economic damage caused . The cold wave that hit the East of the U.S. in 1977 caused approximately 2.8 billion U.S. dollars worth of damage .
This statistic shows the number of police officers per 100,000 population in Canada in 2019 , distinguished by municipality . In 2019 , there were 212 police officers per 100,000 population in Montréal .
This statistic depicts the forecast volume of corn produced in the European Union-27 from 2015 to 2028 . According to the data , the estimated production volume of corn was forecast to approximately 66 million tons by 2028 .
Despite being a relatively new industry , the virtual reality market is booming across the globe , including within he video gaming segment , which allows gamers to transport themselves to different worlds with the use of a VR headset . Global revenue within the VR gaming industry is forecast to grow from 0.4 billion U.S. dollars in 2017 to 2.4 billion U.S. dollars by 2024 .
This statistic shows the most common types of Facebook connections in 2014 , sorted by their relationship origin . During the survey period it was found that 58 percent of users in the United States were Facebook friends with their colleagues .
The statistic illustrates the results of a test of 800 search queries on Siri on iOS 6 . The test found that 48 percent of the results were Google based . The rest came from Yelp , Wolfram Alpha , and Yahoo .
The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in Bhutan from 1985 to 2015 , with projections up until 2025 . GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country in a year . It is considered to be a very important indicator of the economic strength of a country and a positive change is an indicator of economic growth .
This statistic shows the results of a survey from 2015 about the food trend preferences of the Norwegian population in the future . 51 percent of the Norwegian probands stated that they would like to buy products that are environmentally friendly .
JD Sports Fashion , the UK 's leading sports and footwear brand , closed the financial year 2019/2020 with an increased number of retail stores through new acquisitions . As highlighted in this statistic , from February 2020 , JD acted as parent company to 2,203 stores in total , including brands such as Perry Sport and Aktiesport in the Netherlands , Glue in Australia , and Hot-T in South Korea . With new retailers acquired worldwide , JD Sports expanded its retail space across its sports fashion and outdoors retail divisions in 2019 .
The Aging Index refers to the number of elderly population ( aged 65 years and over ) per 100 individuals younger than 14 years old in a specific population . Thus , the higher the index is , the older the population results . In 2020 , in Italy there were 178.4 elderly people every 100 young individuals .
This statistic presents the total number of deaths by homicides in Spain in 2018 , by autonomous community . In that year , Andalusia was the autonomous community the highest number of deaths due to this type incident , approaching 53 deaths . The number of deaths in Spain due to this type of aggression amounted to 275 deaths in 2018 , which represents a decrease compared to 2017 .
This statistic shows the per capita personal income in Alaska from 2000 to 2019 . In 2019 , the per capita personal income in Alaska was 62,806 U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows the life expectancy at birth in Colombia from 2008 to 2018 . In 2018 , the average life expectancy at birth in Colombia was 77.11 years .
This statistic shows the number of food health supplement stores in Canada as of December 2019 , by region . There were 698 food health supplement stores in the province of Ontario as of December 2019 .
The statistic depicts the revenue of the Premier League club Manchester United from 2009 to 2020 . In the fiscal year 2020 , Manchester United generated around 629.61 million U.S. dollars in revenue .
In 2017 , most Dutch customers of Amsterdam-based online bank Bunq used its app less than once per month . Why the app of the Fintech startup was n't used that often was likely due to the high number of competing domestic banks in the Netherlands with online banking services . 22 percent of ING customers in the Netherlands for example said they used its smartphone application daily .
This statistic depicts the crude birth rate in Cote d'Ivoire from 2008 to 2018 . According to the source , the `` crude birth rate indicates the number of live births occurring during the year , per 1,000 population estimated at midyear . '' In 2018 , the crude birth rate in Cote d'Ivoire amounted to 35.74 live births per 1,000 inhabitants .

Following this , 28 percent of respondents stated getting less takeout and delivery food and 27 percent said they were snacking more . There were just over 616 thousand deaths in the United Kingdom in 2018 , compared with 607 thousand in 2017 . Between 2003 and 2011 , the annual number of deaths in the UK fell from 612 thousand to just over 552 thousand . Since 2011 however , the annual number of annual deaths in the United Kingdom has steadily grown , with the number recorded in 2018 a high for the provided time-period .
This statistic depicts the distribution of global rough diamond production ( measured by carats ) in 2013 , by application . It is estimated that almost half of all rough diamonds end up as industrial diamonds , while around one third gets lost through cutting and polishing procedures . That means , only one fifth of all mined diamonds ( carats ) finish as polished gem-quality diamonds that can be sold as a piece of jewelry .
In 2019 , there were approximately one thousand refugees residing in Sri Lanka . This was a significant increase from 2012 , in which there were 110 refugees living in Sri Lanka .
The statistic shows Green Bay Packers players with the most receiving yards in franchise history . Donald Driver is the career receiving leader of the Green Bay Packers with 10,137 yards .
Among top pharmaceutical companies in 2019 , Novo Nordisk had the highest gross margin , followed by Amgen . Novo Nordisk 's gross margin in 2019 was 82.6 percent , while Amgen 's gross margin at that time was about 81 percent . Gross margin can be defined as the revenue of a company less the cost of goods sold , divided by revenue .

During that period , online orders which were generated via direct traffic had an average value of 112.01 U.S. dollars . Smartphones may have overtaken desktop devices in terms of retail site visits but have not overtaken desktop terms of revenue - during the first quarter of 2019 , smartphones accounted for 64 percent of retail website visits worldwide but only generated 46 percent of e-retail shopping revenues , same as desktop devices .

This statistic shows the results of a survey question asking consumers in the UK which reasons make them less likely to buy products that are produced in an ethical way . The survey was conducted for the Department of Business , Innovation and Skills in June 2014 , with the aim to gauge public attitudes to ethical standards in retail and the impact this has on their purchase decisions . Of respondents , 39 percent share the opinion that products produced in an ethical way tend to have higher prices and would therefore deter them from buying such products .

Life expectancy in Spain was below thirty in the year 1880 , and over the course of the next 140 years , it is expected to have increased to 83.4 by the year 2020 . Although life expectancy has generally increased throughout Spain 's history , there were several times where the rate deviated from its previous trajectory . The most notable changes were a result of the global influenza epidemic of the 1910s , ( called the 'Spanish Flu ' as it received more press coverage in neutral Spain , during the First World War ) and the Spanish Civil War two decades later .
Data on the overall box office revenue of movies from different sources in North America between 1995 and 2019 showed that movies based on original screenplays earned 104.52 billion US dollars at the North American box office in this period .
The statistic gives the compound annual growth rate of the aircraft maintenance , repair and overhaul ( MRO ) market between 2019 and 2028 , by region . During this period , the aircraft MRO market in India is expected to show a growth rate of 9.5 percent .

Universal credit is the United Kingdom 's social security benefit given to people out of work or on low incomes .

Of the retailers listed by the source , Hagebau market ranked highest with a total of 307 stores nationwide . This was followed by Praktiker with 197 stores and OBI with 190 stores in Germany in 2013 .
This graph shows the real value added to the Gross Domestic Product ( GDP ) of Maryland in 2019 , by industry . In 2019 , the construction industry added 14.24 billion chained 2012 U.S. dollars of value to the total state GDP .
This statistic shows the production area of rye in specified countries in crop year 2018/2019 . According to the report , approximately 79,000 hectares of land were used for rye production in Canada during that period .
This statistic shows the daily capacities of oil refineries in Poland between 2005 and 2019 . The daily capacity decreased from 2005 to 2009 , but increased notably in 2010 to 560,000 barrels . For 2019 , the daily oil refinery capacities of Poland made up 0.6 percent of the world 's total daily capacity , according to the source .
While agriculture accounted for about ten percent of France 's GDP in 1960 , its share in the national economy has only fallen over the decades . Since 2005 , the rate has stagnated at around 1.5 percent of GDP . Agriculture includes forestry , hunting , and fishing , as well as cultivation of crops and livestock production .
The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in Senegal from 1985 to 2025  . GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country in a year . It is considered to be a very important indicator of the economic strength of a country and a positive change is an indicator of economic growth .
In 2019 , a square meter for retail space in Venice cost on average 4.3 thousand euros , making it the most expensive city in Italy for retailers . The ranking presented in the graph shows that Milan , the Italian fashion capital , came second , with an average price per square meter of 3.54 thousand euros . When looking at office space , Venice boasted again the highest prices in Italy .
The figure shows the top 20 countries worldwide in terms of smartphone penetration , as of September 2018 . As of that time , the United Kingdom had the highest smartphone user penetration rate , which stood at 82.2 percent .
On January 7 , 2021 , there were 658,958 cases of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) reported in Romania . The spread of the virus had a relatively slow evolution in March , the highest daily increase being reported on November 18 . However , given than at that time the number of coronavirus cases was severely impacting Spain and Italy , the Romanian authorities reacted promptly .
During last days of March 2020 , respondents were most worried about the necessity of isolation due to the outbreak of the coronavirus pandemic ( COVID-19 ) in Poland . Only half of the Poles noted any positive side of the current situation , while every fourth participant believed that the pandemic-related situation has a good influence on the time spent with the family . For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic , please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page .
The last measured quarter brought the satellite and online radio company a revenue of over 1.9 billion U.S. dollars , marking a small increase from the 1.74 billion reported in the corresponding quarter of fiscal 2019 . Here you can find quarterly Sirius XM 's net income figures .
This statistic shows the median age of the population in Ireland from 1950 to 2050 . The median age is the age that divides a population into two numerically equal groups ; that is , half the people are younger than this age and half are older . It is a single index that summarizes the age distribution of a population .
This statistic presents the sales ratio of user-generated LINE sticker sets . As of April 2014 , chat app LINE permitted users to create and sell their on LINE chat stickers in the app 's digital marketplace . As of August 2014 , it was found that 2.9 percent of sticker sets had reached 500,000 to 1 million yen in sales .
Between January and early December 2020 , the European country registering the largest number of migrants ' arrivals by sea was Spain . As of December 3 , 2020 , nearly 36.3 thousand immigrants reached the Spanish shores . Furthermore , Italy recorded around 32.7 thousand arrivals by sea , while the number of migrants who arrived on the Greek coasts amounted to approximately nine thousand .
Since the president of Spain declared the state of alarm in March 14 , 2020 , Spaniards have lived under very restraining isolation rules . Under these circumstances , media consumption habits have changed dramatically in the course of March 2020 in a society very used to interacting outdoors . The results of a survey conducted in March that year revealed that most of the Spaniards found entertainment in watching TV , as stated by 67 percent of respondents .
This statistic shows the share of American high school students in grades 9 to 12 who stated they used a condom during the last sexual intercourse as of 2019 . The results have been sorted by gender and ethnicity . Some 60 percent of male student respondents stated they used a condom during the last sexual intercourse .
This statistic displays the sales of products for coughs and colds in the self-medication industry in Europe in 2017 . In this year Germany was the market leader in sales of cough and cold medications at approximately 1.5 billion euro . This was followed by Italy at 717.8 million euro in cough and cold medication sales .
The statistic displays the leading players of the national football team of Iran at FIFA World Cup as of June 2018 , by market value . The most valuable player was Alireza Jahanbakhsh , with a market value of 12 million euros .
Target Corporation operates a chain of general merchandise stores , which offer a wide variety of general merchandise and food to their customers . The company has operated primarily in the United States since its inception . Target did have a number of stores in operation in the Canadian market , but these were all closed in 2015 .

The sector of clothing , leather , and shoes manufacturing was expected to lose roughly 53 percent in added value over the course of the year due to the crisis caused by the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) . In 2020 , the estimated youth unemployment rate in Nigeria was at almost 14.2 percent . According to the source , the data are estimates from the International Labour Organization , an agency of the United Nations developing policies to set labor standards .

In that time , Goldman Sachs emerged as the leading advisor to M & A deals in Norway , with deal value amounting to approximately 6.48 billion U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows the Facebook usage penetration in Indonesia from 2017 to 2023 . In 2017 , 23 percent of the population in Indonesia used Facebook and in 2023 , the usage reach is set to reach 49 percent of the population .
In 2019 , the under-five child mortality rate in Cambodia was approximately 26.6 deaths per one thousand live births . This was a decrease from 2010 , in which the under-five child mortality rate in Cambodia amounted to just over 44 deaths per one thousand live births .

As of March 2020 , the Venezuelan women 's soccer team ranked 57th in the world , slightly up from the 58th position achieved by the end of 2019 .

This statistic displays the total accident and emergency attendances in England , from the first quarter 2012/13 to the fourth quarter 2018/19 . In the fourth quarter of 2018/19 , there were approximately 6.24 million attendances in the accident and emergency department nationwide .
In 2019 , almost 89 thousand individuals died in Sweden . Even though the number of deaths was kept at a relatively stable number from 2010 to 2020 , this was the lowest number of deaths during the whole period . The most common cause of death was diseases in the circulatory system , causing about 28 thousand deaths in 2019 .
The statistic depicts a breakdown of the worldwide big data revenue by segment in 2014 . Almost two fifths of the global big data revenue was generated through the professional services segment .
This statistic shows British public opinion on September 24 to 25 , 2014 , on whether the RAF should join the US-led air strike operations against Islamic State/ISIS in Iraq and/or Syria . Whereas nearly half of the 1,972 respondents approved of a RAF campaign in both countries , only 6 percent approved of an Iraq only campaign , and even fewer for a Syria only campaign . The complexity of the situation was also highlighted , with almost a quarter saying that they did n't know .

This statistic shows the number of house fires caused by Christmas trees in the United States from 2000 to 2015 . In 2008 , a total number of about 240 fires were counted .

According to the source , six percent of Millennials who subscribe to online video or music subscriptions had a FandangoNOW subscription as of January 2017 .
In Europe , the direct economic impact of Airbnb in 2018 was highest in France ; There host earnings and guest spending was estimated to have contributed 10.8 billion U.S. dollars to the French economy . Airbnb hosts and guests in Spain and Italy had the next biggest impact , generating 6.9 billion and 6.4 billion U.S. dollars respectively .
As the global demand for N95 masks has skyrocketed in 2020 due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic , producers have scrambled to increase production to meet that demand . The market value of N95 masks amounted to more than 802 million U.S. dollars in 2019 . By 2027 , it is forecast that this value will increase by more than double , to nearly 1.90 billion U.S. dollars .

This statistic depicts the crude birth rate in Sri Lanka from 2008 to 2018 . According to the source , the `` crude birth rate indicates the number of live births occurring during the year , per 1,000 population estimated at midyear . '' In 2018 , the crude birth rate in Sri Lanka amounted to 15.83 live births per 1,000 inhabitants .

In 2009 , there were 479 specialist games and toy stores in the UK . Since then , this number has increased year-over-year , with figures reaching 972 in 2018 .
There were approximately 7.24 nurses per 1,000 South Koreans in 2018 . This is slightly increased from the preceding year . The nurse-to-people ratio has increased continuously since 2000 , with sharper increases in the past several years .
This statistic shows the divorce rate in Nevada from 1990 to 2018 . In 2018 , there were 4.4 divorces per thousand inhabitants in Nevada . This figure is a decrease from 1990 , when the divorce rate was 11.4 divorces per thousand inhabitants .

This statistic shows the result of a survey on religious identification in Sweden in 2017 , by type . That year , the largest group of Swedish population ( a share of 43 percent ) participating in this survey identified themselves as non-practicing Christians . Only nine percent of respondents was practicing Christian , defined by the source as someone who goes to church at least monthly .

The statistic shows Bangladesh 's budget balance in relation to GDP between 2015 and 2019 , with projections up until 2025 . A positive value indicates a budget surplus , a negative value indicates a deficit . In 2019 , Bangladesh 's budget deficit amounted to around 5.36 percent of GDP .

In 2019 , the total fertility rate in Malaysia was approximately 1.8 births per woman aged 15 to 49 years . The total fertility rate refers to the average number of children which would be born if women survived to the end of their reproductive period . This period are then subject to the schedule of age–specific fertility rates for the given year .
This statistic shows the all-time number of trophies won by soccer player , Cristiano Ronaldo , by competition . The Portuguese player has won the Champions League five times - four times with Real Madrid and once with Manchester United .
This statistic shows data on public support for political parties in South Korea in May 2017 . During a poll , 36 percent of respondents stated that they supported the Democratic Party of South Korea . This survey preceded the presidential election in South Korea that will take place on the ninth of May 2017 , following the impeachment of the former President Park Geun-hye .

On January 1 , 2019 , approximately 8.6 million people living in the Netherlands were male and roughly 8.7 million were female , making the female population in the Netherlands the majority . As this statistic on the life expectancy at birth in the Netherlands shows , women in the Netherlands live some three years longer than men .

Life expectancy in Italy was just under thirty in the year 1870 , and over the course of the next 150 years , it is expected to have increased to 83.3 by the year 2020 . Although life expectancy has generally increased throughout Italy 's history , there were several times where the rate deviated from its previous trajectory . The most noticeable changes were a result of the First World War and Spanish Flu epidemic , and also the Second World War and Italian Civil War .

The nationwide lockdown to contain the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) had suspended industrial production across sectors and curbed vehicular movement throughout the country . This brought down pollution levels significantly across Indian cities .

This statistic shows the top funded digital health categories worldwide during 2019 . Some 1.23 billion U.S. dollars of funding has been provided for mhealth apps which makes it the third most funded category in that year .
At the end of fiscal year 2018 , the installed power capacity across Jharkhand in India was around 1,770 megawatts . In 2019 , the south Asian country was the third largest producer as well as consumer of electricity in the world . The country 's national electric grid had an installed capacity of approximately 364 gigawatts as of October 2019 .
The professionalization of the e-sports market has validated it as a career choice for talented players to earn millions and sign lucrative sponsorship deals . The highest earning player of 2019 was Finland 's Jesse Vainikka , also known as JerAx , who earned over 3.16 million U.S. dollars in 2019 , mostly through his exploits playing Dota 2 .
Mexico is the country with the largest number of native Spanish speakers in the world . As of 2019 , almost 122 million people in Mexico spoke Spanish as their mother tongue . The nation with the second highest number of native Spanish speakers was Colombia , with over 49 million .
As of January 3 , 2021 , the cumulative number of confirmed cases of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) in Angola was at 17,642 , with 408 registered deaths . The capital Luanda is the pandemic center in the country . For further information about the coronavirus pandemic , please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page .
In 2019 , the foreign direct investments from Asia Pacific in the United States amounted to approximately 858.5 billion U.S. dollars . The total foreign direct investments in the U.S. were valued at approximately 4.46 trillion U.S. dollars in that year .
In 2019 , 62.4 percent of businesses were victimized by ransomware . During a survey of global IT decision makers , over half of respondents stated that their employer had been victimized by ransomware last year .
This statistic represents the gross number of Boeing 777 aircraft orders from 2004 through 2019 . In 2019 , the U.S. based aircraft manufacturer received approximately 38 orders for their 777 model aircraft .
This statistic displays the mortality rate in Luxembourg from 2008 to 2019 . In 2019 , the mortality rate reached 7.1 percent , an increase compared to 2018 .
This statistic shows the respective market shares of the leading feature phone manufacturers in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of October 2012 . In 2012 , 43 percent of UK feature phone subscribers used an Nokia mobile phone . Thus , Nokia is the most popular manufacturer for feature phones .
This statistic shows the share of small and medium enterprises ( SME ) in the real estate sector with growth plans for the next 12 months in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from fourth quarter 2011 to second quarter 2019 . The peak of this period was in the third quarter 2018 , when 59 percent of real estate sector SMEs stated that they planned to grow in the following 12 months .
In 2019 , J.P. Morgan Chase was the commercial bank with the highest revenue in the United States , with a total revenue of 142.42 billion U.S. dollars . Apart from J.P. Morgan Chase , Bank of America , Wells Fargo , and Citigroup also topped the ranking in that year .
The statistic shows Azerbaijan 's budget balance in relation to GDP between 2015 and 2018 , with projections up until 2025 . A positive value indicates a budget surplus , a negative value indicates a deficit . In 2018 , Azerbaijan 's budget surplus amounted to around 5.48 percent of GDP .
The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in Tunisia from 1985 to 2019 , with projections up until 2025 . GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country in a year . It is considered to be a very important indicator of the economic strength of a country and a positive change is an indicator of economic growth .
This statistic displays Suncor Energy Inc. 's earnings per share from 2010 to 2019 . In 2019 , Suncor Energy 's earnings per share amounted to 1.86 Canadian dollars . Suncor Energy is an integrated energy company , and one of the leading Canadian oil companies .
The combined operating revenue of U.S. airlines has increased each year since 2015 , reaching an all-time high of just under 247.64 billion U.S. dollars in 2019 .
Amazon UK was the most popular brand page on Facebook in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of March 2020 , attracting 5.73 million local fans . This was followed by UNREEL , with nearly 4.86 million fans .
This statistic shows the number of births in Alberta , Canada from 2001 to 2020 . Between July 1 , 2019 and June 30 , 2020 , a total of 51,996 people were born in Alberta .
The table presents the key figures on the Brazilian federal government 's investment in developing their electronic health record ( EHR ) system as of November 2017 . According to the source , the government estimated an annual investment of 22 million Brazilian reals to implement an EHR system throughout the country , with an initial investment of 1.5 billion Brazilian reals in contracts with electronic health companies and service providers .
Between the fourth quarter of 2019 and the first quarter of 2020 , prime rent of both office and industrial real estate in the United Kingdom ( UK ) grew by 0.5 and 1.9 percent . In contrast , retail real estate rent , which was majorly affected by the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) crisis fell by one percent .
This statistic depicts the results of a survey about sexual intercourse among female secondary school students in Italy in 2018 . According to data , the largest share of respondents ( 57 percent ) declared to have never had sex , while 15 percent of female students had an incomplete sexual intercourse . Eventually , 15 percent of girls affirmed that they had a complete sex .
This statistic presents the average transaction price among the leading online furniture retailers in the United States in 2018 . According to the findings , the online furniture retailer Overstock had the highest average transaction price of 289.26 U.S. dollars , while in comparison Walmart had the lowest with an average price of 85.99 U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows the number of employees at Opel/Vauxhall in selected European cities in 2018 . The highest number of employees was recorded at its plant in Rüsselsheim , Germany , at 14,180 people .
In the season 2019/2020 , the net minimum wage of Serie A football players in Italy aged 24 and older was roughly twice the salary of players aged between 16 and 19 . As reported by the study , Serie A footballers aged 24 and older recorded a net wage of 27,290 euros in the selected season .
In 2019 , the Northern states of Acre and Alagoas had the highest femicide rates in Brazil : approximately 2.5 of every 100,000 women who lived in those territories were murdered on account of their gender during that year . The Brazilian state of Mato Grosso ranked second with a femicide rate of 2.3 per 100,000 women . When it comes to overall number of femicides in Brazil , however , the states of São Paulo , Minas Gerais , and Bahia topped the ranking .
This statistic depicts the number of active physicians in Minnesota as of March 2020 , ordered by their specialty area . At that time , there were 715 anesthesiologists active in Minnesota . There are some 9,500 total active physicians in the state .
This statistic shows the most important export partner countries for Angola in 2017 . In 2017 , the most important export partner of Angola was China , with a share of 61.2 percent in exports .
In 2019 , there were over 51 thousand general practitioners ( GP ) in the United Kingdom ( UK ) , this was the highest figure in the provided time interval . The number of GPs in the UK went through a significant increase between 2000 and 2009 .
The statistic shows the growth in real GDP in Yemen from 2009 to 2021 . In 2017 , Yemen 's estimated real gross domestic product decreased by around 5.07 percent compared to the previous year .
This statistic shows the number of deaths due to heart attacks in the European Union ( EU ) in 2014 , by country . In Germany 121,477 people died as a result of a heart attack , followed by Italy with 69,653 people .
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Malta from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , the infant mortality rate in Malta was at about 6.1 deaths per 1,000 live births .
This statistic shows the share of customers in the United States who stopped doing business with a company due to poor customer service from 2016 to 2018 . During the 2018 survey , 44 percent of customers stated they stopped doing business with a company due to poor customer service .
This statistic depicts the net sales of Abercrombie & Fitch Co. worldwide in 2019 , by brand . In 2019 , Hollister had a 59.58 percent share of Abercrombie & Fitch Co. 's total sales .
The production of vegetables made up the largest share of the total cropland under cultivation in the Indian state of Jharkhand measuring 298 thousand hectares in fiscal year 2020 . The second largest share of plantation area was taken up by the production of fruits which constituted about 103 thousand hectares that year .
In a worst case scenario , the travel and tourism sector in Latin America could lose up to 10.4 million jobs in 2020 due to the global lockdown imposed to stop the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic . According to the estimates from June 2020 , this scenario could be avoided if immediate measures were taken in order to accelerate the recovery of the travel and tourism sector in Latin America . In a best case scenario , losses of tourism job in the region in 2020 could be reduce to 4.7 million .
The forecast illustrates the number of global netbook shipments between 2008 and 2013 . In 2008 , netbook vendors shipped 16 million devices worldwide . Global netbook shipment is expected to decline over the next few years as tablet PCs take market share away .
This statistic shows the number of Pell Grant recipients as a percentage of all undergraduate enrollment in universities in the United States from the academic year 2009/10 to 2019/20 . In 2019/20 , around 31 percent of all students that enrolled in undergraduate programs had been granted a Pell Grant award .
The statistic shows the net worth of the richest actors worldwide as of May 2014 . Tom Hanks , who is an actor as well as a producer and director ranked seventh with a net worth of 390 million U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows the United Kingdom government spending on winter fuel payments from fiscal year 2017/18 to fiscal year 2023/24 . Winter fuel payment expenditure is expected to remain constant till 2020/21 , before dropping to 1.9 billion British pounds , recovering thereafter .
This statistic depicts a ranking of the top 10 U.S. for-profit hospitals based on the number of beds as of July 2015 . At this point , the Methodist Hospital in San Antonio , Texas , was ranked first among such hospitals in the United States , with a total of 1,561 beds .
This statistic shows the number of retail chains by sector in Moldova in the year 2020 . Consumer electronics was the leading sector , with eight chains out of the total of 27 , followed by food , with seven retail chains . Fashion and clothing ranked in third place , standing at six chains .
This statistic depicts Bayer 's dividend payment from 1999 to 2019 . Bayer AG is a chemical and pharmaceutical company , headquartered in Leverkusen , Germany . In 2019 , the total dividend payment of Bayer amounted to 2.75 billion euros .
The statistic shows Mexico 's share of the global gross domestic product ( GDP ) adjusted for Purchasing Power Parity ( PPP ) from 2015 to 2025 . In 2019 , Mexico 's share of the global GDP ( in relation to PPP dollars ) amounted to about 1.95 percent . For further information , see Mexico 's GDP .
This statistic presents the home ownership rate among the population of all 28 European Union countries between 2010 and 2018 . During that timeframe , the home ownership rate remained relatively stable , oscillating around approximately 69 percent of the total of the population .
This statistic shows the responses to a survey about the different devices used for online video watching in the United States as of November 2018 . According to the survey results , 62 percent of respondents consumed online video via mobile .
As of January 31 , 2020 , there were a total of 603 Walmart stores in Texas in the United Stores . The company had a total of 11,501 stores around the world that year .
This statistic illustrates how many Toyota Yaris passenger cars were registered for the first time annually in Great Britain , between 2001 and 2019 , in thousand units . A peak in sales of the Toyota Yaris was observed in 2003 , when over 36,000 units were newly registered . In 2019 , roughly 28,000 Toyota Yaris vehicles were registered for the first time in Great Britain .
This timeline displays Italy 's trade balance from August 2017 to August 2019 . According to the data , in August 2019 , Italy 's balance of trade reported a surplus of approximately 2.6 billion euros , a decrease of roughly 4 billion euros compared to the previous month .
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Senegal from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , the infant mortality rate in Senegal was at about 32.7 deaths per 1,000 live births .
The statistic shows the number of U.S. fatal vehicle crashes by time of day in 2018 . In that year , some 5,760 crashes occurred from 6 p.m. to 9 p.m. in the United States . Motor vehicle crashes and drug overdoses are the leading causes of death among those under the age of 55 in the United States .
This statistic shows the total population of Egypt from 2015 to 2018 , with projections up until 2025 . In 2018 , the total population of Egypt was approximately 97.1 million inhabitants .
This statistic represents the leading Chinese semiconductor companies in 2010 , based on revenue . The firm Tianjln ZhongHuan Semiconductor Co generated around 222 million U.S. dollars in revenue that year .
In 2020 , advertising spending in Mexico is expected to amount to 78.1 billion Mexican pesos . That would signify a drop of 7.7 percent compared to the spending of 84.62 billion recorded in 2019 . This statistic displays the seasonally-adjusted unemployment rate among persons between 16 and 24 years in the United States in 2012 , by state . In California , youth unemployment stood at 20.2 percent in 2012 . The general unemployment rate by state can be found here , the annual national unemployment rate can be found here .
This statistic shows the average inflation rate in Zambia from 1984 to 2019 , with projections up until 2021 . In 2019 , the average inflation rate in Zambia amounted to about 9.8 percent compared to the previous year .
Mozambique produced some 564,800 metric tons of aluminum in 2019 , making it the second largest aluminum producing country in Africa . Aluminum production has slightly increased in Mozambique in the past decade , as 2009 production amounted to 544,700 metric tons .
This statistic shows the countries and regions that consumed the most palladium in 2010 . In that year , China used some 1.8 million ounces of palladium .
In 2019 , over 66 percent of South Africa 's total population lived in urban areas and cities . Urbanization defines the share of urban population from the total population of a country . Just like urbanization , the population density within the nation has risen , reaching 46 inhabitants per square kilometer , meaning more people are sharing less space .
This statistic displays the average basket value monthly of retail sales via tablet in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from January to December 2013 . In December 2013 , the average basket was worth 78 British pounds .
This statistic shows a breakdown of violent crimes involving a firearm in England and Wales ( UK ) in 2015/2016 , by the type of the principal weapon . In the case that a firearm was used , the most common type was that of air weapons , there were 3,217 reported cases involving air firearms .
This statistic shows the number of cars sold by Toyota in France between 2009 and 2018 . French sales of Toyota cars rose from 65.4 thousand units sold in 2010 to 71.7 thousand units sold in 2013 , before declining in 2014 and 2015 . In 2017 Toyota sold 77,696 cars in France .
This statistic shows the total number of office buildings in the Netherlands from the first quarter of 2012 to the second quarter of 2020 . In the second quarter of 2020 , there were roughly 96,000 office buildings in the Netherlands . This is an increase when compared to the previous quarter .
Between 2012 and 2019 , the share of foreign residents in the Italian province of Rome experienced an increase . In 2019 , 12.82 percent of the total population of Rome was not Italian . In the last years , the percentage of foreign residents living in Italy increased as well .
This statistic shows the total annual number of albuterol prescriptions in the U.S. from 2004 to 2017 , in millions . In 2004 , albuterol was prescribed over 37 million times . As of 2017 , the number of prescriptions for this drug has increased to over 50 million .
This statistic represents the total number of licensed drivers registered in Alabama in 2016 , with a breakdown by gender . In that year , Alabama had approximately two million female licensed drivers on the road .
This statistic displays the percentage of adults in the U.S. who had a loved one that passed away in the last five years and the location at which their loved one died . According to the data , 34 percent of survey respondents had a loved one die at home , compared to just 10 percent that had a loved one that died in a nursing home .
After the COVID-19 outbreak , also commonly known as coronavirus , instant noodles had a value growth of 67 percent , followed by frozen food and pasteurized sausages . Nevertheless , a survey conducted among urban citizens showed that the majority of the respondents have decreased their frequency of visiting supermarkets , grocery stores and wet markets .
According to a survey carried out in April 2020 , 77 percent of respondents in Brazil reported buying or using more alcohol-based hand sanitizer in response to the COVID-19 outbreak . Disinfectants and disposable face masks were also the most bought or used hygiene products , with more than half of respondents using them more frequently . Almost 45 percent of the Brazilians surveyed were also prone to purchase and use liquid soap for the same reason .
The timeline depicts the player expenses of the Tampa Bay Rays from 2001 to 2019 . In 2019 , the franchise had a team payroll , including benefits and bonuses , of 87 million U.S. dollars . The Tampa Bay Rays finished the 2018 season with a 90 - 72 record .
The statistic shows the revenue of Joe Gibbs Racing of the racing series NASCAR from 2006 to 2017 . In 2011 , the revenue of the team was at 99 million U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows the leading ten countries worldwide based on uranium consumption in 2018 . In that year , the United States was the largest uranium consumer worldwide , using a total of almost 19,160 metric tons of uranium .
At the end of fiscal year 2019 , the national highways length across the Indian state of Jharkhand was around 3.3 thousand kilometers . National highways are constructed and governed by the National Highway Authority of India . The highways made up a share of about two percent of the total Indian roads and carried about 40 percent of the traffic .
This statistic displays the number of people employed by the WD-40 Company worldwide from 2014 to 2020 , as of the fiscal year end on August 31 . WD-40 Company is a household chemicals manufacturer based in San Diego , California . In 2020 , WD-40 Company had 522 employees worldwide .

This statistic shows the share of teenagers in the United States who were Twitter users as of April 2018 , sorted by gender . During that period of time , 32 percent of female and 33 percent of male teens used the social networking site .
