More and more production and manufacturing companies in Norway give temporary layoffs to employees due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) crisis . In this sector , 36 percent of the surveyed companies had already carried out employee layoffs , as of March 20 , 2020 . Some production companies still had close to normal production at that time , and some had already given layoffs to a considerable share of their employees .
Due to the outbreak of coronavirus in Poland in March 2020 , hotels must fight for survival . More than 80 percent of hotels plan to obtain funding to support their employees . At the same time , more than half of them have applied for tax deferrals .
One-third of the respondents indicated the need to visit a hairdresser and a beautician immediately after the lifting of restrictions due to the COVID-19 epidemic in Poland . Only four percent of Poles said that even after the lockdown , they would still isolate themselves for fear of being infected with the virus . In France , 34 percent of respondents very much agreed that there is currently an inequality between men and women in terms of social , politcal and/or economic rights .

Chiapas was the state in Mexico with the highest average extreme poverty rate in 2018 . It was estimated that nearly one third of the population in Chiapas lived in a situation of extreme poverty . Nuevo León was the state with the lowest extreme poverty rate , with 0.5 percent , well below the national average , which stood at 7.4 percent .

Data show that Trapattoni won a total of seven championships . Massimiliano Allegri ranked second in the list , having won six Serie A championships overall .

This statistic shows the annual greenhouse gas emissions from fuel combustion in the transport sector in France from 2008 to 2017 . In 2017 , the greenhouse gas emissions from produced by fuel combustion in the transport sector amounted to approximately 134.74 million tons of CO2 equivalent .
This statistic shows the gross gambling yield ( GGY ) of the total gambling industry in Great Britain from April 2010 to September 2019 . During the period October 2018 to September 2019 , the regulated gambling industry in Great Britain generated a GGY of 14.26 billion British pounds , a decrease compared with the previous reporting period . The GGY is a key metric used within the gambling industry to refer to the difference between the amount of money received by a given agent , and the amount of money payed out by the agent .
The statistic shows the actual outturn sports-related costs of the Olympic Summer Games from 1964 to 2016 . The projected actual outturn sports-related costs of the 2016 Rio Summer Olympic Games was 4.56 billion U.S. dollars .
The statistic shows the types of headphones people in the United States own in 2017 according to a Statista survey . 49 percent of respondents said that they own earbuds .
This statistic shows the population change in South Sudan from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , South Sudan 's population increased by approximately 0.78 percent compared to the previous year .
In 2018 , the number of births per thousand women aged between 15 and 19 years old in Sri Lanka amounted to approximately 21 births . This was an increase from 2016 , in which there were approximately 15 births per thousand women aged between 15 and 19 years old in Sri Lanka .

During as survey in May 2018 , it was found that 25 percent of employers who researched potential job candidates on social media had not extended a job offer because the candidate had been found out to be bad-mouthing their previous employer or fellow employees on social networks .

Walmart U.S. operates retail stores in Walmart 's domestic market of the United States . Walmart , formerly known as Wal-Mart Stores , Inc. , is one of the most well-known and valuable brands in the world .

This statistic shows Turkey 's target for the hospital bed capacity of quality rooms by 2023 . From a capacity of 18,934 beds in quality rooms in 2002 , the hospital bed capacity is expected to rise to 230,000 by 2023 .
This statistic illustrates the share of municipalities covered by 4G/4G Plus in the Italian region of Sicily as of 2018 , broken down by province . In 2018 , Caltanissetta was the province with the lowest mobile internet penetration rate , roughly 91 percent . By comparison , all the municipalities in the provinces of Enna , Ragusa , Trapani , and Catania were covered by the 4G network .
Around 191 thousand aircraft landed in Singaporean Changi Airport in 2019 . The airport is one of the largest transportation hubs in Asia and one of the busiest in terms of passenger traffic .
The approval rate of Mauricio Macri , the president of Argentina since December 2015 , has decreased from 39 percent in his first year of government ( 2016 ) to only 23 percent in 2018 . After reaching a 86 percent peak in 2003 , year in which Eduardo Duhalde was succeeded by Néstor Kirchner , the approval rate decreased to 25 percent in 2009 , when Cristina Fernández de Kirchner was in office .
In fiscal year 2019 , private sector banks across India earned a total income of almost 4.7 trillion Indian rupees . This marked an increase compared to the previous year when the total income of private sector banks amounted to a little over four trillion rupees . However , Indian banks were facing an asset crisis , and in fiscal year 2019 , the value of non-performing assets of private banks across the country amounted to over 1.8 trillion Indian rupees .
As of 2017 , the expenditure on health in Nigeria equaled to 3.8 percent of the country 's GDP . Nevertheless , Nigeria 's spending on health experienced a slight increase in the past years . In the OECD countries , the average percentage of GDP spent on healthcare was 8.8 percent .
The timeline depicts the player expenses of the St. Louis Cardinals from 2001 to 2019 . In 2019 , the franchise had a team payroll , including benefits and bonuses , of 182 million U.S. dollars .
In 2018 , the production value of aquacultures in Japan amounted to around 3.93 billion U.S. dollars , a slight increase from 3.9 billion dollars in the previous year . The production output of the Japanese aquaculture industry peaked in 2011 , reaching a value of almost 4.4 billion U.S. dollars .
The statistic illustrates the volume of private equity investment in Europe as of 2016 , broken down by industry . Private equity is the OTC provision of equity capital through private or institutional investments with the participation of companies in another company for a limited time in order to generate financial benefits . It can be seen that the largest volume of private equity investments were in the consumer goods and services sector at that time , with total investments in this industry reaching a value of more than 14.27 billion euros .

This statistic shows the take up of London West End ( UK ) office space properties in the first quarter of 2020 , by the business sector of companies leasing space . Take up space refers to the sum of lettings and owner occupied office space . According to a report conducted by BNP Paribas , in the first quarter of 2020 , the top three sectors with strongest presence on the London West End office space market were media tech , association and serviced office , accounting for a total of 53 percent of take up space .

The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) in the Seychelles from 1984 to 2017 , with projections up until 2021 . Gross domestic product ( GDP ) denotes the aggregate value of all services and goods produced within a country in any given year . GDP is an important indicator of a country 's economic power .

It is noted that nearly 70 percent of respondents said they did not attach any importance to this , compared to 1 percent of respondents seeking to always be fashionable . In the period between December 28 , 2014 , and April 10 , 2015 , 147 persons who became infected with measles were linked to this multi-state outbreak .
Germany 's GDP per capita stood at almost 46,500 U.S. dollars in 2019 , and it is forecast to exceed 60,000 U.S. dollars by 2025 . Germany ranked among the top 20 countries worldwide with the highest GDP per capita in 2017 – Luxembourg , Switzerland , and Macao SAR were ranked the top three nations .
This statistic presents the estimate for the average annual loss incurred due to natural disasters in Germany as of 2015 , listed by hazard . The annual loss due to flooding was expected to amount to approximately 2.7 billion U.S. dollars on average , whilst the loss caused by earthquake was estimated to reach 2.4 billion U.S. dollars as of 2015 .
This statistic displays the sales value of first aid boxes and kits sold by manufacturers in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2010 to 2018 . In the year 2014 , the sales value of first-aid boxes and kits was approximately 42 thousand British pounds , while in 2018 it decreased to 12 thousand British pounds .
This diagram describes the importance of French manufacturers in the global production of vehicles from 2012 to 2016 . The market share of French companies remained quite stable during this period , fluctuating between 6.3 and seven percent .
This statistic presents the annual sales of lotteries in the United States in 2019 , by state . The state with the largest lottery sales in 2019 was New York , generating approximately 10.29 billion U.S. dollars .
In the early twentieth century , modern-day Czechia and Slovakia were united , as a part of the Austro-Hungarian Empire until after World War I . It then became an independent state in 1918 , although the borders did change during this time and after the Second World War , until it peacefully dissolved into the both the Czech Republic and Slovakia in 1993 . The population of Czechoslovakia did not grow significantly between 1910 and 1921 , and in regards to gender the male population actually decreased by around 50 thousand .
Life expectancy in Afghanistan remained below thirty in the nineteenth century , and it was not until the mid-1900s that life expectancy increased at a significantly higher rate , and by 2020 , Afghanistan 's life expectancy is expected to be just over 64 years . A noticeable drop in life expectancy appeared between 1915 and 1920 , as the Spanish Flu epidemic that swept the globe impacted the population of Afghanistan severely . ( A second drop can be observed in the early 1950s , however this is due to contrasting sources , as more recent data from the UN becomes available ) .
This graph shows the growth in the U.S. import volume of trade goods from Saudi Arabia from 1985 to 2019 . In 2019 , U.S. imports from Saudi Arabia amounted to approximately 13.44 billion U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows the life expectancy at birth in Denmark from 2008 to 2018 . In 2018 , the average life expectancy at birth in Denmark was 80.95 years .
This statistic shows the share of consumers using the leading three customer loyalty card schemes in the United Kingdom ( UK ) , according to a consumer survey conducted in December 2013 . The biggest loyalty scheme in the UK is Tesco Clubcard , with 80 percent of respondents claiming to own a card .
The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) in current U.S. dollars in Cuba from 2008 to 2018 . Gross domestic product ( GDP ) denotes the aggregate value of all services and goods produced within a country in any given year . GDP is an important indicator of a country 's economic power .
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Seychelles from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , the infant mortality rate in Seychelles was at about 12.3 deaths per 1,000 live births .
This statistic shows the sales volume of avocados from the Mexican state of Michoacán in the U.S. during Super Bowl in 2018 and 2019 . In 2019 , the Mexican avocado sales in the U.S. during that sports event were expected to reach about 120 thousand metric tons , up from around 100 thousand metric tons sold a year earlier .
The largest Western European city in 1200 was Palermo , with 150 thousand inhabitants . This is a great decrease in the number 150 years previously , where the population was 350 thousand . The city of Cordova also decreased by almost 400 thousand in this time , possibly because of the declining Arabian control and influence in the area .
In 2018 , gross domestic product of the Democratic Republic of the Congo amounted to around 78.3 billion international dollars . Gross domestic product ( GDP ) denotes the aggregate value of all services and goods produced within a country in any given year . GDP is an important indicator of a country 's economic power .
This graph shows the growth in the U.S. import volume of trade goods from North America from 1985 to 2019 . In 2019 , U.S. imports from North America amounted to approximately 677.86 billion U.S. dollars .
As of 2019 , there over 6.4 million people were part of a trade union in the United Kingdom , compared with 6.35 million in 2018 . During the provided time period the late 1970s and early 1980s saw the highest trade union membership , with over 13.2 million employees a member of a union in 1980 .
This statistic displays the importance of going out with friends to teenagers in Great Britain in 2014 . In 2014 , 37 percent of respondents reported going out with friends as very important .
This statistic shows the number of enterprises in the manufacture of games and toys industry in Denmark from 2008 to 2017 . In 2016 , there were 95 enterprises manufacturing games and toys in Denmark .
Net income measures the amount a company has earned during a given period after subtracting taxes and other deductions from gross income . As the UK 's and Europe 's largest bank , HSBC saw net income of 15 billion U.S. dollars in 2018 , almost 3 times as much as Lloyds .
In 2018 , the fine jewelry market across India was valued at nearly 63 billion U.S. dollars . With the consistent increase over the years , India remains one of the largest exporters of gems and jewelry in the world .
The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in Namibia from 1995 to 2025 . GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country in a year . It is considered to be a very important indicator of the economic strength of a country and a positive change is an indicator of economic growth .

The bond market is a part of the capital market on which fixed-income securities are traded . This includes mortgage , government , municipal bonds , debentures of public sector banks , as well as corporate bonds .

In the period from 2009 to 2019 , the number of asylum applications in Finland peaked in 2015 , as large numbers of migrants arrived in Europe . From 2016 onwards the number of asylum seekers decreased again . Since the peak of nearly 32.5 thousand applications in 2015 , the corresponding figure of 2016 was roughly 5,600 applications .

Maurizio Cattelan is an Italian artist , born in Padua in 1960 and well-known for his satirical approach to art . A sculpture executed in 2001 by the artist and named Him was his most expensive artwork sold by the auction house Christie 's as of 2020 . The sculpture - made of wax , human hair , suit , polyester resin , and pigment - was sold by Christie 's for nearly 17.2 million U.S. dollars .
The global cloud telephony market is forecast to grow by almost 9 percent in 2020 . In 2021 the growth of the market is forecast to be even stronger , when cloud telephony is projected to grow by another 17.8 percent .

In the first quarter of 2020 , TikTok achieved approximately 315 million downloads . Overall , the social video platform has generated more than two billion lifetime downloads via the App Store and Google Play .

The rankings mirror the worldwide performance of the Big Four firms , with Deloitte and PwC again competing for the top two positions .
A survey published at the end of 2017 revealed that four percent of Italians did not know what Black Friday is . While the vast majority ( 52 percent ) had heard of it the very same year . Moreover , the same survey showed that approximately 25 percent of respondents considered Black Friday to be just another consumption trend imported from the United States .

In 2019 , Santander joined a growing number of the world 's largest banks in making a financial commitment to sustainable financing and investments to help projects , technologies , and clean energies in delivery of the Paris Agreement and the UN Sustainable Development Goals . Banco Santander 's goal is to facilitate and mobilze 120 billion euros of green finance between 2019 and 2025 . Between 2019 and 2030 the bank wants the level of green finance to have reached 220 billion euros .

Over 76 percent of respondents stated that they had increased their use of the educational app , Extramarks . India went into a lockdown on March 25 , 2020 , the largest in the world , restricting 1.3 billion people , extended until May 3 , 2020 .

December 2 was the virus ' deadliest day so far in Europe with 6,195 deaths . Italy has the highest number of deaths in Europe at 64,520 , as of December 14 .
The military expenditure that Mexico reported for 2019 accounted for approximately 0.5 percent of the country 's Gross Domestic Product ( GDP ) , the same percentage as the previous year . The share of GDP for Mexico 's military expenditure has remained constant since 2009 , with the exception of 2017 when it dropped to 0.4 percent . That same year , Mexico had one of the lowest military spending in Latin America .

During the measured period , then-17-year old snowboarder Chloe Kim gained over 900 thousand followers across Facebook , Twitter and Instagram . Kim became the youngest woman to win an Olympic snowboarding medal when she won gold in the women 's snowboard halfpipe .

In 2019 , the south Asian country was the third largest producer as well as consumer of electricity in the world . The statistic presents the value of net premiums earned by leading reinsurers in the the United States in 2019 . An earned premium is the portion of an insurance written premium which is considered 'earned ' by the insurer , based on the policy period during which the insurance has been in effect , and the insurer has been exposed to loss . The net premiums earned by National Indemnity Company amounted to approximately 24.99 billion U.S. dollars in 2019 .

Of the appliances monitored , food steamers used up the most electricity on average , at 52.7 kilowatt-hours/year , followed by fryers at 52.7 kilowatt-hours/year and coffee machines at 52 kilowatt-hours/year . Food mixers consumed the least amount of electricity on average at 0.5 kilowatt-hours/year .

The tallest Christmas tree in the world stands in Saint Peter 's Square in Vatican City with a total size of approximately 30 meters , closely followed by the Christmas Tree at the Rockefeller Center with a height of about 23 meters . Another famous American Christmas Tree however , the one at the U.S. White House , is the shortest of the four listed trees - it is only 5.5 meters high .

In the 37 canonized plays in William Shakespeare 's body of work , the number of speeches in each play ranges from 605 to 1,361 separate speech entries . These speeches are when characters speak , ( which can be entire soliloquies , or simple one-word answers ) as well as narrations and stage directions . The plays with the most separate speech entries are Antony and Cleopatra , Othello and Triolus and Cressida , all of which have over 1.3 thousand speeches .

In particular , 32.1 percent of Italians declared to be very concerned about COVID-19 . By contrast , only 5.4 percent stated that they were not at all worried as of February 21 , 2020 .
This statistic shows the median hourly earnings of female wage and salary workers in the United States in 2019 , by age . In 2019 , the usual median hourly rate of a female wage worker between 20 and 24 years old was 12.07 current U.S. dollars .
This statistic depicts the total number of employees of L'Oréal worldwide from 2010 to 2019 . In 2019 , L'Oréal employed a total of 87,907 people throughout the world . L'Oréal is the world 's largest cosmetics and beauty company , concentrating on hair color , skin care , sun protection , make-up , perfumes , and hair care .
The statistic shows the total property damage caused by recreational boating accidents in the U.S. from 2001 to 2019 . In 2019 , total damages amounted to about 55.32 million U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows the number of visits to the Smithsonian National Museum of American History in the United States from 2001 to 2019 . Visits to the National Museum of American History amounted to approximately 2.8 million in 2019 , down from the previous year 's total of 4.1 million visits . The most visited Smithsonian museums in 2019 were the National Museum of Natural History and the National Air and Space Museum .
In 2019 the Labour Party was estimated to have over half a million members , by far the most of any political party in the United Kingdom . The next three largest parties in terms of members were the Conservatives , the Scottish National Party and the Liberal Democrats which all had membership numbers that numbered over 100 thousand .
This statistic depicts the lifetime cyber bullying offending rate among middle and high school students in the United States from May 2007 to April 2019 . As of the latest survey period , 14.8 percent of middle and high school students in the United States have ever cyber bullied somebody .
This statistic presents the rental rate at prime retail street locations in Cyprus based on the cost of rent as of June 2017 . Of the locations , Ledras Street in Nicosia has the highest rental rate , at 600 euros per square meter per year .
This statistic shows the value of gold reserves of South Korea 's monetary authority , the Bank of Korea , from 2000 to 2018 . In 2018 , gold reserves held by the bank of Korea amounted to about 4.79 billion U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows the annual revenue of United Kingdom based online supplier Construction Materials Online ( CMO ) from 2016 to 2017 . In 2017 , the company had generated 27 million British pounds in revenues , an increase compared to the previous year at 18 million British pounds .
In 2019 , approximately 50 million people had access to the internet in Thailand . This figure is projected to grow to about 61 million in 2025 . As the figures suggest , the number of internet users has been gradually increasing since 2017 .
This statistic shows the average inflation rate in Chile from 1985 to 2019 , with projections up until 2025 . In 2019 , the average inflation rate in Chile had amounted to about 2.25 percent compared to the previous year .
This statistic shows the opinion of Americans on whether people who participate in neighborhood watch programs should or should not carry guns . The survey was conducted on March 24 - 25 , 2012 . 76 percent of the respondents are against people in neighborhood watch programs carrying guns .
The government of the United Kingdom spent approximately 112.93 billion British pounds on pensions in 2019/20 , compared with 116 billion in the previous financial year , which was the peak for pensions spending in this ten year time period .
As of 2017 , right-wing American news website Breitbart was rated as not at all credible by 18 percent of respondents from a survey of over two thousand U.S. adults . Additionally , over half of respondents had either never heard of the publication or had no opinion about Breitbart 's credibility .
The average per game attendance during the 2019 NFL regular season was 66,151 , the league 's lowest figure across the entire decade . The Dallas Cowboys had the highest average attendance of all the 32 NFL teams , averaging 91,619 for their eight regular-season home games in 2019 .
According to a survey of 2019 , 48 percent of Italian respondents believed that Italy did not benefit from being a member of the European Union . Only 42 percent of interviewees held a positive opinion about Italy 's membership in the EU . The data reveal that Italy was the most Eurosceptic country in the European Union .
The child mortality rate in Portugal , for children under the age of five , was 373 deaths per thousand births in 1890 . Out of one thousand babies born in 1890 , over 37 percent did not survive past their fifth birthday . Over the course of the next 135 years , this number has dropped drastically , falling to just three deaths per thousand births in the 2015 to 2020 period .
This statistic shows the number of hospital admission episodes for dog bites and strikes in England from March 2013 to February 2015 . There are clear peaks during the summer months . In December 2014 there were 553 admissions due to a dog bite or strike .
This statistic displays the value of beer imported into Sweden from 2008 to 2018 . The value of beer imported into Sweden increased over the period with import values reaching 1.33 billion Swedish kronor in 2018 .
This graph shows the number of firearms which were seized in Canada in 2018 , by type . In 2018 , 1,692 prohibited firearms were seized nationwide .
This statistic shows the share of tourism industry visitor exports in Italy from 2014 to 2029 . In 2019 , the share of visitor exports , namely the international spending , accounted for 7.7 percent of all goods and services ' exports in Italy . According to the forecasts , the visitor exports will consist of 8.4 percent of all exports in 2029 .
This statistic displays the number of patients on waiting lists for surgery in Spain in 2019 , by autonomous communities . In that year , the number of patients waiting for surgery in Andalusia reached over 137 thousand .
In 2018 , 59 percent of people in Italy stayed unemployed for more than a year . Furthermore , 12.6 percent of Italians were unemployed for six to 12 months . Only 5.7 percent of the unemployed individuals found a new occupation within one month .
This statistic shows the degree of urbanization in Germany from 2009 to 2019 . Urbanization means the share of urban population in the total population of a country . In 2019 , 77.38 percent of Germany 's total population lived in urban areas and cities .
According to a survey conducted by Kitchen Stories on the nutritional trends among German citizens in 2019 , it was found that the low-carb diet was considered the most interesting diet . On the other hand , 25.37 percent of the respondents stated that they preferred low-sugar diet programs .
A survey on the most popular devices for streaming media in North America found that 30.8 percent used Internet-connected televisions , whilst 16.3 percent used mobile devices . Additionally , nearly a third of Americans accessed streaming video with smart TVs in the six months leading to the survey .
The graph shows the number of master 's degrees earned in higher education in 2017/18 . About 46,468 master 's degrees were earned in computer and information sciences .
This statistic presents the visitor market share of the most popular online marketplaces in the United States as of the fourth quarter of 2018 . During the measured period , Amazon accounted for 56.1 percent of the segment 's traffic .
This statistic shows the major countries of destination for U.S. fresh fruit exports in 2018 . According to the report , approximately 462.73 thousand metric tons of U.S. fresh fruit were exported to Mexico that year .
This statistic shows the per capita personal income in Tennessee from 2000 to 2019 . In 2019 , the per capita personal income in Tennessee was 48,684 U.S. dollars . Personal income is the income that is received by persons from all sources .
This statistic shows the changes to charitable receipts that U.S. nonprofit organizations are expecting for 2019 . About 45 percent of nonprofit organizations surveyed said they expected their charitable receipts to increase by one to 15 percent in 2019 .
This statistic shows the average inflation rate in Tanzania from 1985 to 2018 , with projections up until 2025 . In 2018 , the average inflation rate in Tanzania amounted to about 3.51 percent compared to the previous year .
This statistic shows the the amount of Christmas gift purchases consumers expect to make online , according to United Kingdom ( UK ) respondents of a holiday shopper survey conducted in September 2014 . Overall , 65 percent said they will purchase at least one gift online this year .
This statistic shows the ratio of pupils to teachers in Finland from 2003 to 2012 . These figures cover education from primary to upper secondary level . The highest level for this period was in 2005 when there were an average of 14.7 students per teacher .
This statistic shows the leading retailers in the general merchandise sector in Canada in 2011 , by market share . Costco held a 24.4 percent market share of the Canadian general merchandise retail sector .
This statistic presents the leading PC video game genres in France in 2015 , ranked by turnover . It reveals that Sports games generated a turnover of 2.59 million euros , which represented over twice the turnover of racing games .
This statistic displays a forecast of the boron market latent demand for glass fiber applications globally from 2012 to 2023 . It is expected that the demand for boron for this application would total over 969,000 metric tons by 2016 .
This statistic presents the total sales value for chocolate confectionary manufactured in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2008 to 2019 . In 2019 , the sales value of chocolate confectionary amounted to approximately 235 million British pounds .
This survey displays a proportion of what the UK public think about pet ownership and analyses their thoughts and opinions . The survey was taken in the United Kingdom in 2015 . Overall 95 percent of pet owners believe owning a pet provides invaluable companionship .
This statistic illustrates the forecast volume of maize imported to the European Union ( EU 28 ) from 2015 to 2029 . According to the data , the estimated import volume of maize was forecast to amount to approximately 20.38 million tonnes by 2029 .
The statistic shows the brand value of the sports event NCAA Men 's Final Four from 2012 to 2017 . The NCAA Men 's Final Four had a brand value of 228 million U.S. dollars in 2017 .
As of January 3 , 2021 , Belgium had the highest rate of coronavirus deaths among its population in the European Economic Area at 172.41 deaths per 100,000 population . Slovenia has recorded 138.93 deaths from coronavirus per 100,000 . Furthermore , Italy has the highest number of confirmed coronavirus deaths in Europe , at 75,332 .
This statistic presents the number of hotels in Paris in 2016 , by arrondissement . That year , there were roughly 100 hotels in the 6th arrondissement . In addition to that , almost 150 were in the 8th arrondissement .
This statistic shows the average monthly spending on pets in Mexico in 2015 , by category ( in Mexican pesos ) . During a survey , it was found that pet owners spent an average of 505 Mexican pesos per month on pet food .
In 2018 , the sales of Italian weapons to Qatar were worth 1.9 billion euros , the largest value among the main import countries . Pakistan ranked second with an export value of 683 million euros . Turkey and the United Arab Emirates followed in the ranking , with 362 and 220 million euros , respectively .
A higher share of female than male Swedish citizens were worried that the Coronavirus would spread in Sweden . As of March 2020 , 57 percent of female respondents were worried to at least some degree , while the share of men was 43 percent .
The highest HIV prevalence in Romania in 2019 was registered among gays and other men with homosexual contacts , and its prevalence stood at 18.2 percent . Among prisoners , the percentage of HIV infections amounted to 1.6 percent .
This statistic shows the percentage of the U.S. population , aged 25 years and older , with a bachelor 's degree or more as of 2010 . The results are distinguished by ethnic groups . 49 percent of Asian-Americans aged 25 and older held a bachelor 's degree as of 2010 .
This statistic shows the worldwide distribution of primary forests in 2020 , by country . Brazil accounted for 12 percent of the total global forest area .
This statistic shows the results of a survey among Americans in 2012 on their attitudes toward seeking a relationship . Some 12.7 percent of respondents stated they were actively seeking a relationship .
This statistic presents the reasons for being on Pinterest according to users in the United States as of the third quarter of 2019 . According to the findings , 32 percent of respondents stated that they used Pinterest to follow brands and companies .
This statistic shows the number of hospital admission episodes for dog bites and strikes in England from April 2019 to March 2019 , by age group . People aged between 50 and 59 were the most likely victims of dog bites and strikes , with over 1.4 thousand admissions in this reporting year .
This statistic presents the percentage of adults in the United States who use the internet to find governmental data or information . During the December 2014 survey period , it was found that 18 percent of U.S. adults use the internet or an app to renew a driver 's license or car registration .
This statistic lists the leading hotel chains in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2014 with respect to the number of hotels owned . The ranking is lead by Whitbread , owner of the Premier Inn brand , which owns 659 hotels . Whitbread is followed by Travelodge IHG , which own 503 and 287 hotels respectively .
While nearly two-thirds of Vietnam remains rural , urbanization has grown by seven percent from 2009 to 2019 . Political reforms in the 1980s created greater economic stability in Vietnam in the decade that followed and led to higher urbanization . The growing population of Vietnam , as well as people migrating from rural areas , contributes to an escalating number of inhabitants in the country 's already crowded cities .
This statistic reflects the dependency rate on energy imports in Cyprus from 2008 to 2017 . In 2017 , the dependency rate on energy imports increased slightly in comparison to the previous year , reaching approximately 96.33 percent . The dependency rate on energy imports peaked in 2010 reaching 100.78 percent .
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Guinea from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , the infant mortality rate in Guinea was at about 63.8 deaths per 1,000 live births .
The statistic shows the number of persons killed in Kentucky road traffic by age group in 2016 . Some 138 people aged between 25 and 34 were killed on the roads of Kentucky in 2016 .
This graph depicts the average ticket price of New Jersey Devils games within the National Hockey League from 2005/06 to 2014/15 . In the 2005/06 season , the average ticket price was 54.67 U.S. dollars . The Devils play their home games at the Prudential Center in Newark , New Jersey .
This statistic represents the annual change in the producer price index of steel aggregates in the United States from January through July 2012 . Between January 2011 and January 2012 , the price increased by around 1.1 percent .
The statistic presents the number of successful fund-raising campaigns run by crowdfunding platforms in 2011 , by region . There were approximately 1.2 million successfull fund-raising campaigns run by CFPs worldwide in 2011 , out of which 654 campaigns were run in Europe .
Vietnam 's real gross domestic product ( GDP ) has been experiencing positive growth for the past ten years since 2009 , and is projected to continue to do so through 2021 . In 2019 , Vietnam 's real GDP increased by around seven percent compared to the previous year .
This statistic shows the median age of the population in Bangladesh from 1950 to 2050 . The median age is the age that divides a population into two numerically equal groups ; that is , half the people are younger than this age and half are older . It is a single index that summarizes the age distribution of a population .
This statistic shows the number of enterprises in the manufacture of cocoa , chocolate and sugar confectionery industry in Finland from 2008 to 2017 . In 2017 , there were 44 enterprises in this manufacturing industry in Finland .
This statistic displays the most visited paid attractions in the North West region of England in 2019 . Chester Zoo was the leading paid attraction in the region with around 2.09 million visitors in 2019 .
This statistic displays the number of obstetricians and gynecologists employed in the health sector in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2000 to 2019 . During this period , the number of obstetricians and gynecologists employed in health sector generally increased from approximately five thousand in 2000 to over 8.2 thousand in 2019 .
This statistic shows the total U.S. farm income from crops between 2010 and 2020 . In 2018 , farms ' cash receipts from this commodity came to around 196.2 billion U.S. dollars .
The statistic breaks down the 2012 Olympic Games TV coverage of the NBC Network in the U.S . The NBC Sports Network will broadcast about 293 hours of Olympic Games coverage during the Olympics in London 2012 .
In 2021 , the online marketplace vertical is projected to increase its revenues by 29 percent compared to 2019 . According to GP Bullhound , marketplaces and large cap e-commerce ( which includes Amazon and Alibaba ) are the verticals with the biggest projected segment revenue growth .
This statistic shows German and Chinese wind turbine manufacturers ' share of the global wind turbine market in 2010 . That year , Chinese wind turbine manufacturer United Power had a global market share of around 4.2 percent .
The annual production volume of Kvanefjeld mine in Greenland is expected to be approximately 10.3 tons of rare earth oxides once development of the mine is completed . In August 2018 , a deal was signed with Shenghe Resource .
The statistics depicts the number of registered ice hockey players in Belarus from 2010/11 to 2018/19 . In the 2018/19 season , there were a total of 4,580 registered ice hockey players in Belarus according to the International Ice Hockey Federation .
This statistic displays the number of prescription items of varenicline ( Champix ) prescribed to help people quit smoking in England from 2006/07 to 2019/20 . The number of Varenicline prescriptions was highest in 2010/11 with close to a million and then gradually declined to around 304 thousand by 2019/20 .
This statistic shows the number of companies active in the Spanish wholesale market between 2009 and 2018 . In 2018 , there were approximately 220 thousand companies in the wholesale trade in Spain .
As of January 06 , 2021 , overall coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) cases in South Africa reached its highest at 1,149,591 infections . It was also the largest volume of confirmed cases compared to other African countries . Regionally , Gauteng ( Johannesburg ) was hit hardest and registered 310,201 cases , whereas KwaZulu-Natal ( Durban ) and Western Cape ( Cape Town ) counted 230,283 and 227,654 coronavirus cases , respectively .
This statistic outlines Arch Coal 's number of employees between 2011 and 2019 . In 2019 , there were approximately 3,700 employees at Arch Coal . Arch Coal is a United States-based company that mines , processes , and markets bituminous and sub-bituminous coal with low sulfur content .
This statistic shows the number of doctors practicing in Austria from 2000 to 2017 ( per1,000 people ) . The number of doctors practicing in Austria reached approximately 5.18 per 1,000 people in 2017 , the largest number recorded during this period .
This statistic shows the top ten strongest Chinese brands in 2020 , by Brand Strength Index . In that year , WeChat was reported to be the strongest Chinese brand with a Brand Strength Index score of 92.9 .
In 2018 , around three thousand people lost their lives in road accidents across the Indian state of Assam . Traffic discrepancies have been a major source of death , injury and damage to property every year . In 2018 , over-speeding of vehicles was the main reason for road accident casualties .
In 2019 , the export value of textiles and textile articles from Vietnam to the European Union amounted to 3.53 billion euros . In the same year , total exports from Vietnam to the European Union reached around 34.44 billion euros .
This statistic shows the reasons for not participating in outdoor activities among Hispanics in the United States in 2017 . During the survey , 16 percent of Hispanics in the U.S. said they did not participate in outdoor activities because they did not have anyone to participate with .
This statistic depicts the average annual prices for palm oil from 2014 through 2025  . In 2019 , the average price for palm oil stood at 601 nominal U.S. dollars per metric ton .
This statistic shows the percentage change in the amount spent on footwear and leather goods ( sales value ) in Great Britain , from 2011 to 2019 . In 2019 , the value of sales increased by 14.6 percent compared to the year earlier .
Vodka was the leading spirit sold in British Colombia in the second quarter 2020/21 . Retail sales of vodka totaled 66 million CAD in that quarter .
Scotland has an installed wind power capacity of over nine gigawatts . Between 2018 and 2019 , wind turbines with a capacity of eight gigawatts were added to the power grid in Scotland . Scotland generates 30.7 terawatt hours of electricity from renewable source .
This statistic outlines the platinum production of mining and metallurgical company Norilsk Nickel from 2009 to 2019 . Norilsk Nickel is the world 's largest nickel and palladium producing company , in addition to producing gold , silver , platinum , cobalt , rhodium , sulfur , tellurium , selenium , ruthenium , and iridium . Norilsk Nickel is based in Russia , and has mining operations in five different countries located on three continents worldwide .
The statistic reveals the leading cyber security spending priorities for enterprises worldwide , over the 12 months following a 2016 survey of C-level executives and IT and security directors . According to 46 percent of respondents , one of the cyber security spending priorities will be security for the Internet of Things and connected devices .
This statistic displays the number of masjids or other premises in the United Kingdom , by their theme in 2017 . In this year there were 797 masjids in the United Kingdom that were the assocaited with Deobandi . This was by far the most common type of masjid in the United Kingdom .
In 2020 , Belize was one of the Latin American countries with the worst gender gap index . That year , Belize scored 0.12 in the area of political empowerment , which shows a gender gap of approximately 88 percent ( women are 88 percent less likely than men to have equal opportunities in political participation ) . The overall gender gap index score of Belize was 0.68 points .
As of the third quarter of 2020 , it was found that 52 percent of Reddit users in the United States accessed the forum and discussion platform on a daily basis . Overall , 95 percent of responding Reddit users claimed that they used the platform monthly .
In 2018 , Incredibles 2 by Pixar was the most viewed movie in Argentina having attracted 3.6 million movie goers . It total , Argentine movie theaters sold 46.2 million tickets that year .
This statistic shows the average annual number of hours worked in dental offices by general practice dentists in the U.S. from 1990 to 2018 . According to the data , general dental practitioners worked an average of 1,648 hours in the dental office during 2018 .
In fiscal year 2019 , the value of deposits at Bandhan Bank in India was over 40 billion Indian rupees , marking a substantial increase in deposits from around 34 billion rupees in the previous fiscal year . Bandhan Bank was founded in 2015 but has been functional since 2001 as a not-for-profit enterprise that focused on the financial inclusion of underprivileged sections of the society through microfinancing .
This graph shows the types of housing in which French people live during the containment caused by the coronavirus epidemic ( COVID-19 ) in March 2020 . At that time , the majority ( 60 percent ) of those questioned stated that they were confined in a detached house with a garden .
This statistic shows the results of a survey among Americans in 2011 on the importance of having a job or career that benefits society . 17 percent of respondents stated that having a job or career that benefits society is one of the most important things to them .
The statistic displays data on the growth of local digital advertising spending in the United States from 2001 to 2013 and a forecast thereof until 2016 . In 2007 , the year-on-year growth rate amounted to 49.1 percent .
This statistic shows the number of pregnancies in the United States in 2009 , sorted by age of the women . There were around 200 thousand pregnancies among U.S. women aged 40 years and over . In total , there were some 6.4 million pregnancies in the United States that year .
This statistic shows the number of perpetrators in child abuse cases in the United States in 2018 , by state . In 2018 , about 780 perpetrators in Wyoming were reported .
The statistic illustrates the total amount of investments of the private equity companies based in Denmark from 2007 to 2016 . Private equity is the OTC provision of equity capital through private or institutional investments with the participation of companies in another company for a limited time in order to generate financial benefits . It can be seen that total private equity investments fluctuated overall during the period under observation , reaching a value of more than 1.22 billion euros as of 2016 .
This graph shows the top 50 metropolitan statistical areas of the United States with the highest robbery rate in 2019 . In 2019 , the Baltimore-Columbia-Towson metropolitan areas in Maryland was ranked first with 242.7 robbery cases per 100,000 inhabitants .
This statistic shows the total amount of municipal waste exported from Italy in 2017 and 2018 . The volume of waste exported increased over the period , reaching approximately 465 thousand tons in 2018 .
This statistic shows the percentage of Canadians who used cannabis in their lifetime as of 2017 , by territory . As of that time , 55.8 percent of those living in British Columbia had used cannabis in their lifetime .
In 2018 , a total of 35 maternal deaths due to abortion were reported in Argentina . That year , at least ten women younger than 25 died due to complications following an abortion in the South American country . Abortion is only allowed by law in Argentina in cases where the mother 's life or health is in danger , or if the pregnancy is the result of rape .
This statistic shows the revenue of Opel/Vauxhall in 2017 and 2018 . In 2018 , Opel/Vauxhall generated 18.3 billion euros in revenue , a significant increase compared to the year before .
The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak caused major changes in everyday lives of people and in the way they spent their free time . Compared to data from March 2019 , there had been a 81 percent decrease in the interest for cinemas and a 65 percent decrease in language learning based on Google searches in Hungary . For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic , please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page .
The statistic illustrates the average lifetime of clothes dryers in the United States in 2009 . The average lifetime of clothes dryers is generally estimated in the range of 12 to 16 years . In 2009 , 30.1 percent of U.S. households had a clothes dryers in the range of 5 to 9 years .
This statistic shows the total funds raised by super PACs and other PACs supporting a candidate in the race for the U.S. presidential election , as of June 22 , 2016 . Super PACs and other PACs in support of Hillary Clinton collected the highest amount of funding with about 97 million U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows the average size of households in the United States in 2019 , by state . In 2019 , the average size of households in Utah was 3.08 people , compared to the national average of 2.61 people .
This statistic shows the public opinion on national identity in Belgium in 2017 . In November 2017 , roughly 60 percent of the Belgian respondents reported they tend to agree with the statement that people in Belgium have a lot of things in common .
This statistic shows the number of deaths in Nunavut , Canada from 2001 to 2020 . Between July 1 , 2019 and June 30 , 2020 , a total of 210 people died in Nunavut .
In 2018 , people aged between 41 and 50 years in Italy were mostly likely to be victims of frauds . Indeed , individuals in this age accounted for 24.9 percent of all those fell victim to a scam . On the contrary , the elderly population made up the smallest group of victims .
A majority of U.S. adults support states closing down their economies again due to COVID-19 concerns , with 55 percent of respondents to an August 2020 survey either strongly or somewhat supporting this measure . Conversely , 31 percent of respondents opposed states returning to an economic shutdown .
This statistic shows the per capita personal income in Nevada from 2000 to 2019 . In 2019 , the per capita personal income in Nevada was 51,161 U.S. dollars . Personal income is the income that is received by persons from all sources .
The statistic shows Alberta 's hydro , wave and tidal generation from 2005 to 2035 . It is estimated that in 2035 , 1,988 gigawatt hours of such power will be generated here . Forecasts are a baseline projection which is considered to be the `` most likely '' outcome for Canada 's energy future , given the underlying assumptions .
The statistic shows Indonesia 's budget balance in relation to GDP between 2015 and 2019 , with projections up until 2025 . A positive value indicates a budget surplus , a negative value indicates a deficit . In 2019 , Indonesia 's deficit amounted to around 2.23 percent of GDP .
This statistic provides information on the level of global mobile audio streaming traffic from 2016 to 2021 . In 2016 , global mobile audio streaming traffic amounted to 559,999 terabytes per month and is expected to increase to 2,674,183 TB per month in 2020 at a CAGR of 37 percent .
This statistic provides information on the level of the customer experience index for retail banking customers , utilizing services in selected Western European countries as of 2016 . The index points equaled 80.4 for the Netherlands during the time of measurement . The source indicated that overall the index levels have increased for Western Europe .
This statistic shows the number of tourist overnight stays in the Netherlands between 2007 and 2018 . In 2018 , 116.08 million nights were spent at tourist accommodation establishments , marking an increase in the nights spent compared to 2017 .
This statistic shows the distribution of the gross domestic product ( GDP ) of Yukon , Canada in 2019 , by industry . In that year , the construction industry accounted for 13.28 percent of the GDP of Yukon .
Between December 2019 and May 2020 , INEA provided the fastest internet among Polish internet service providers - its download speed exceeded 533 Mbps . Toya was second , with over 527 Mbps download speed .
Most Uruguayans do n't profess any religion . In a survey carried out between July and August of 2018 , over 34 percent of Uruguayan respondents said they had no religious affiliation , whereas another nine percent defined themselves as atheists . The most common religion , though , was Catholicism , which almost 33 percent of respondents claimed to profess .
Fruits and vegetables accounted for over 3.7 trillion Indian rupees in the Indian economy in fiscal year 2018 . This value was an increase compared the previous fiscal year . This sector contributed about 28 percent to the GVA of crops that same year , an increase from 24 percent in fiscal year 2012 .

In 2018 , the value of financial asset of the agency-and GSE-backed mortgage pools amounted to approximately 2.29 trillion U.S. dollars .

In 2019 , the regular season home attendance of the Miami Marlins ( formerly Florida Marlins ) was at 0.81 million . • Major League Baseball average per game attendance • Major League Baseball total attendance
This statistic shows the number of imported firearms to the United States in 2019 , by firearm category . In 2019 , a total 743,252 shotguns were imported to the U.S .
This statistic shows the total annual turnover of the retail sales of pharmaceutical products in the United Kingdom from 2008 to 2015 . Throughout the eight year period , pharmaceutical products retail turnover has increased from 3.52 billion British pounds in 2008 to 4.99 billion British pounds in 2015 . In 2014 , the annual turnover of retail sales of pharmaceutical products amounted to 5.56 billion British pounds the was the highest amount during this period .
This statistic shows the share of UK consumers agreeing with the statement `` I try to buy products from companies that act in an ethical way , even if it means spending more '' , by social grade . According to the survey , conducted for the Department for Business , Innovation and Skills in June 2014 , 41 percent of respondents in social grade AB ( upper middle class ) agreed that they try to buy products from ethical retailers , even if it means spending more money . The proportion of those agreeing in the lower social grades tended to be slightly less , with 31 percent of those in social grade DE ( working class and non working ) also claiming they try to some extent to buy products produced in an ethical way .
Alaska is the largest U.S. state in terms of area and also contains some areas of the most untamed wildlife in North America . In 2012 , there was around 91.8 million acres of forest area located in Alaska , more than any other U.S. state .
This statistic shows the check-in average of restaurant categories in the United States in 2014 . Emerging burger restaurants reported 4,987 check-ins on average , while established burger restaurants counted an average of only 1,469 check-ins .
This statistic shows the consumer price index for urban consumers in the United States of America from 1992 to 2019 . In 2019 , the CPI was 255.66 . Data represents U.S. city averages .
The statistic present the percentage of Android devices which had Pokémon GO installed in selected countries in Asia on July 11 , 2016 . It was found that on that day 4.2 percent of Android devices in Hong Kong had Pokémon GO installed on them .
This statistic presents the development of the Bloomberg USD Emerging Market Sovereign Bond Index from 2009 to 2016 . The value of this index amounted to 158.67 in 2016 .
The statistic shows the ratio of government expenditure to gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Mauritius from 2015 to 2020 , with projections up until 2025 . In 2020 , government expenditure in Mauritius amounted to about 32.21 percent of the country 's gross domestic product .
In the school year of 2019/20 , there were about 26.82 thousand schools in Vietnam . The country 's formal education system consists of three levels : primary school , secondary school , and high school , which lasts twelve years in total .
This statistic displays how long consumers spend in food stores on average in Canada as of October 2018 . Some 38.1 percent of survey respondents stated that they spend on average between 20 and 30 minutes in grocery stores per visit .
This statistic shows the advertising expenses of Foot Locker worldwide from 2015 to 2019 . In 2019 , Foot Locker spent approximately 166 million U.S. dollars on advertising , in comparison this figure was 165 million U.S. dollars in 2015 .
Several countries in Central America and the Caribbean registered some of the highest homicide rates in the Latin American region in 2018 . El Salvador ranked first , with nearly 52 homicides committed per 100,000 inhabitants . Jamaica came in second , with 43.9 homicides per 100,000 people .
This graph illustrates global investment in small hydropower technologies from 2004 through 2019 . In 2019 , the world invested around 2.5 billion U.S. dollars in small hydropower technologies , down from four billion U.S. dollars in 2017 .
This statistic shows the 30-day prevalence of use of any illicit drug for grades 8 , 10 and 12 combined from 1991 to 2019 . Some 17.2 percent of all respondents in grades 8,10 and 12 in 2019 stated that they used any illicit drug within 30 days .
This statistic shows the number of doctoral and first professional degree recipients in the United States from academic year 1869/70 to 2017/18 with a forecast up to 2029/30 . In academic year 2017/18 about 184,074 students were awarded their doctoral degrees in the United States .
In Denmark , the total number of reported criminal offences fluctuated in recent years . In 2019 , the number stood at close to 499 thousand crimes , and among them there were 52 homicides reported . According to the Danish Penal Code , the penalty for homicide ranges from a minimum of a five-year prison sentence to imprisonment for life .
The statistic depicts the player expenses of the Dallas Mavericks , franchise of the National Basketball Association , from 2001 to 2019 . In the 2018/19 season , the player salaries of the Dallas Mavericks stood at 108 million U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows consumer products purchased directly from the manufacturer online in 2013 , by category . The survey revealed that 51 percent of the respondents purchased clothing and footwear directly from the manufacturer online .
This statistic shows the leading priorities of European households in regards to their home improvement plans over the next five years . According to the survey conducted in April 2014 , approximately a third of respondents see improving energy efficiency in their home as a priority . 22 percent plan to create more space and 17 percent look to create space for entertainment specifically .
In 2018 , around 11.5 percent of serious violent crime cases in the United States involved teenagers , a slight decrease from the previous year where 14.2 percent of serious violent crimes involved teenagers .
This statistic illustrates seasonally adjusted indices of the production volume in all building and construction in Ireland , measured quarterly from 2013 to 2018 . Despite minor fluctuations , the production volume index rose over the course of years , with a sudden decline in the fourth quarter of 2018 , with an index of 149.9 , a total of 33.3 below the index of the third quarter of 2018 .
As of January 5 , 2021 , the total number of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) cases in Italy surpassed 2.1 million , more than 569 thousand of which were active cases . Moreover , the number of people who recovered or were discharged from hospital after contracting the virus surpassed 1.5 million , while the number of deceased reached 76,329 . For a global overview visit Statista 's webpage exclusively dedicated to coronavirus , its development , and its impact .
In fiscal year 2020 , India exported silk worth over 17 billion Indian rupees . The exports include mulberry silk , non-mulberry silk and silk waste , all used for various garments including carpets , ties and scarves .
This statistic shows the share of individuals who purchased food or groceries online in Bulgaria from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , four percent of individuals purchased groceries online in Bulgaria .
This statistic shows the size of the interventional cardiology market worldwide in 2013 , by product type . In that year , the PTCA ( percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty ) balloons market generated a revenue of some 800 million U.S. dollars worldwide .
This statistic illustrates the nitrogen oxides ( NOx ) emissions in Italy in 2018 , by sector . According to data , the level of these kinds of pollutants in the air has decreased , was mainly caused by road transport to which were attributable 291 Giga-grams of emissions .
This statistic shows the population of the Cleveland-Elyria metropolitan area in the United States from 2010 to 2019 . In 2019 , about 2.05 million people lived in the Cleveland-Elyria metropolitan area .
This graph shows the total number of mosquito-borne disease cases reported in the U.S. from 2004 to 2018 . In the year 2004 , there were 4,858 reported mosquito-borne disease cases , while there were 5,847 such cases in 2018 .
Between 2017 and 2018 , the share of exports of goods and services in the total GDP of Russia increased by approximately 4.7 percent , measuring at under 31 percent in the latest year under consideration . Since 1996 , Russian exports had the highest share of GDP in 2000 at 44.06 percent . Relatively low values of 24.73 and 25.79 percent were observed in 1997 and 2013 , respectively .
This statistic represents the total number of drivers involved in injury crashes in U.S. road traffic from 1995 to 2016 . In 2016 , almost four million drivers were involved in injury crashes in U.S. road traffic . Motor vehicle crashes are the leading cause of death among those under the age of 55 in the United States .
This statistic depicts the net sales Nautilus Inc. worldwide from 2014 to 2019 . In 2019 , Nautilus Inc. had global net sales amounting to about 309.29 million U.S. dollars .
This graph depicts the volume of snowshoes sales in the United States from 2012/13 to 2015/16 . In the 2015/16 season , sales of snowshoes in the United States amounted to 19.28 million U.S. dollars .
This statistic represents the projected number of jobs in the U.S. medical device industry between 2010 and 2014 . In 2013 , around 89,000 employees are expected to work in the medical device industry .
This statistics show the market size forecast of the project services and outsourcing segment , which is part of the cyber security market analysed by IT product and service type , in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2010 to 2017 . The estimated size of the project services and outsourcing segment in 2017 is 1.45 billion British pounds ( GBP ) .
This statistic shows the imports volume of oats from regions outside the European Union into the United Kingdom , from season 2015/16 to 2019/20 . In 2019/20 , around 11 tones of oats were imported into the United Kingdom from non-EU regions .
This statistic shows a distribution of all self-employed workers in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from July 2018 to June 2019 , by major occupational group . The number of the total self-employed workforce that are working in skilled trade occupations exceeds 1.2 million workers , making skilled trade occupations the main occupational group of the self-employed workforce in the United Kingdom in 2018/19 .
This statistic presents the share of consumers that use different authentication methods when logging in to their online bank in France in 2017 . The most popular method used for logging in to online banking was with a username and password with 68 percent . The least popular method ( other than 'other method ' at 2 percent ) was the use of chipTAN ( card with chip inserted into card reader ) which was used by 6 percent of the consumers surveyed .
Data on the gross median hourly pay for employees in the United Kingdom ( UK ) for 2020 , by age group , shows that the age group which earned the highest hourly pay were those between the ages of 40 and 49 years , at 15.86 British pounds per hour . The age group that earned the lowest hourly pay , excluding 16 and 17 year olds , were those between the ages of 18 and 21 years , at 9 British pounds per hour .
According to results of a 2019 survey , people from Belgium were more concerned about fake news than Internet users from the Netherlands . Roughly 45 percent of the Belgian respondents said they were either very or extremely concerned about `` what is real or fake '' when thinking about online news , whereas 30 percent of the Dutch respondents mentioned this . Online news , especially video , was used more often in Belgium than in the Netherlands in 2018 .
This statistic depicts the crude birth rate in Vietnam from 2008 to 2018 . According to the source , the `` crude birth rate indicates the number of live births occurring during the year , per 1,000 population estimated at midyear . '' In 2018 , the crude birth rate in Vietnam amounted to 16.75 live births per 1,000 inhabitants .
At the end of fiscal year 2018 , the installed power capacity across Kerala in India was around 5,083 megawatts . The country 's national electric grid had an installed capacity of approximately 364 gigawatts as of October 2019 . Of this capacity , almost three quarters of electricity was produced through fossil fuels .
As of November 20 , 2020 , South Korea confirmed 30,017 cases of infection including 501 deaths after the first case of coronavirus in the country in January 2020 . As of the same date , 26,263 patients were released from quarantine after making a full recovery from the virus . In total , almost 2.9 million people have been tested until now .
The statistic shows the 10 least peaceful metropolitan areas in the U.S. according to the United States Peace Index 2012 . In 2012 , the metropolitan area Detroit-Livonia-Dearborn was least peaceful with an index value of 3.87 on the United States Peace Index .
This statistic depicts the share of the leading direct selling markets worldwide as of 2019 . As of 2019 , the leading direct selling markets were the United States and China , who held 20 percent and 13 percent market shares , respectively .
This statistic shows the average annual expenditure on refrigerators and freezers ( renter ) per consumer unit in the United States from 2007 to 2019 . In 2019 , the country 's average expenditure on refrigerators and freezers ( renter ) amounted to 7.86 U.S. dollars per consumer unit .
The homicide rate in Belize reached 38 cases per 100,000 inhabitants in 2017 . In that same year , the number of people murdered in this Central American country amounted to 142 , up from 138 victims reported in the previous year .
This statistic shows the results of a survey question asking participants when they last made a buying decision influenced by the ethical standards of a retailer or a product . The survey , conducted for the Department for Business , Innovation and Skills in June 2014 , aimed to gauge the publics ' attitude to ethical standards in retail in the UK and the impact this had on their purchase decisions . Collectively , 45 percent of respondents claimed to have ever made a buying decision influenced by the ethical standards of the retailer or product , 8 percent of whom had done so in the last week .
This statistic shows the share of households in the Czech Republic that had access to the internet from 2007 to 2018 . Internet penetration grew in the Czech Republic during this period . In 2016 , 82 percent of Czech households had internet access .
This statistic shows the life expectancy at birth in Slovakia from 2008 to 2018 . In 2018 , the average life expectancy at birth in Slovakia was 77.27 years .
In fiscal year 2019 , the occupancy rate of hotels in India was 66.7 percent , up by one percent from the previous year . Among the various types of hotels , four-star hotels had the highest occupancy at 67.5 percent , making it the highest in this decade .
This statistic shows the direct cost of crimes committed in the retail sector in the United Kingdom annually from 2007/08 to 2018/19 . The cost of retail crime was measured at one billion British pounds in the 2018/19 survey period . This was an increase of around a hundred million British pounds since the previous annual period .
This statistic shows the number of cars sold by Opel in Turkey between 2012 and 2019 . In the period of consideration , Turkish sales of Opel cars presented a trend of decline with some oscillation . Opel sales peaked at 55.7 thousand units in 2013 .
This statistic shows the average spending on dollar stores according to consumers in Canada as of March 2015 . During the survey , it was found out that Canadians spent an average of 365.25 Canadian dollars per year in dollar stores .
This statistic displays the estimated number of new lung cancer cases in Canada by age group in 2019 . For this year , it is estimated that there will be 25 new lung cancer cases among those between 15 - 29 years old . Cancer is one of the leading causes of premature death in Canada .
The graph shows the leading eSports professional players on Facebook worldwide as of January 2016 , ranked by the number of fans . As of the measured period , Lee Sang-hyeok , a player from South Korea also known as Faker , was the most famous on Facebook , with 806 thousand fans . He was followed by Jaroslaw Jarzabkowski , aka Pasha , who gathered 671 thousand fans on Facebook .
In the financial year 2019 , about 583 million metric tons of cargo was handled across non-major ports in India . About 70 percent of trade by value and more than 95 percent by volume across the south Asian country was done through maritime transport . 62 non-major ports handled cargo traffic in that year .
This statistic shows the national debt of Samoa from 2015 to 2019 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ) , with projections up until 2025 . The figures refer to the whole country and include the debts of the state , the communities , the municipalities and the social insurances . In 2019 , the national debt of Samoa amounted to approximately 47.53 percent of the GDP .
The Indian sports industry has grown dramatically over the last few years . The industry became one of the fastest growing with a margin of around ten percent over the global average . The total revenue of the industry was projected to be around 1.9 million U.S. dollars in 2015 .
This statistic presents the view of individual 's in the United States in regards to if the government should or should not regulate on how social media companies safeguard the personal data of their users . According to the April 2018 findings , 36 percent of surveyed respondents stated the government should regulate , while in comparison 30 percent reported the opposite , saying they should not .
In a survey carried out between 2018 and 2019 , around 13.3 percent of respondents in Colombia said they had been asked or had to pay a bribe in different interactions with public and private authorities ( police officers , government employees , schools , hospitals , at work , among others ) . The share of respondents who claimed to be victims of bribery in Colombia has decreased by 4.1 percentage points compared to the previous edition of the survey , conducted in 2016 and 2017 .
Every fourth woman in Poland expected a large bouquet of any flowers or roses from men on International Women 's Day in 2020 . Six percent of respondents preferred carnations .
This statistic shows the median earnings of male workers in the U.S. from 1990 to 2019 in constant U.S. dollars based on 2019 dollar value . The median earnings of workers in 1990 was about 40,945 U.S. dollars . In 2019 , the average male worker earns approximately 48,769 U.S. dollars .
The statistic depicts the EquiTrend ranking of amusement attractions in the U.S. in 2012 . Disney World 's EquiTrend score is 68.38 in 2012 . Busch Gardens and Six Flags ( not included in this statistic ) ranked below the category average .
This statistic shows the number of persons participated in the supplemental nutrition assistance program in the United States in 2014 , by state . 915,332 persons from Alabama have participated in the supplemental nutrition assistance program in fiscal year 2013 .
Over the last two decades , the household waste recycling rate in England has increased significantly from just 11.2 percent to almost 50 percent . However , England still falls short of the EU target of recycling a minimum of 50 percent of its household waste by 2020 . As of 2018 , Wales was the only nation in the UK to reach this target , and in 2017 recorded a recycling rate of 64 percent .
This statistic shows the number of enterprises in the manufacture of plastics products industry in Sweden from 2008 to 2017 . In 2017 , there were 1,294 enterprises manufacturing plastics products .
The graph shows the deadliest `` Game of Thrones '' locations as of May 2019 , by number of deaths . The source calculated that Winterfell was the deadliest location , with 3,708 characters killed there . Also in the list were Beyond the Wall , King 's Landing , Meereen and Goldroad .
This statistic shows the fertility rate in New Zealand from 2008 to 2018 . The fertility rate is the average number of children borne by one woman while being of child-bearing age . In 2018 , the fertility rate in New Zealand amounted to 1.71 children per woman .
This statistic shows the number of companies in the video game industry in Canada as of June 2019 , broken down by size . In 2019 , there were 377 micro sized video game companies in the country . In total , there were 692 active video game companies in 2019 .
This statistic shows the producer price index ( PPI ) in Spain from January 2014 to December 2019 . The Producer Price Index for October 2018 reached 106.31 , which represented the highest figure of the study .
This statistic shows sheep production in Indonesia from 2009 to 2018 , in million heads . In 2018 , the sheep production in Indonesia amounted to approximately 17.4 million heads .
This statistic shows the percentage of executives in Canada who felt select measures of burnout at least once a week as of 2017 . It was found that 47 percent of executives stated they felt used up at the end of the workday at least once a week .
This statistic depicts the average clear height of buildings in distribution center networks of warehousing and logistics providers in the United States between 2016 and 2020 . During the 2020 survey , the average building height was 32 feet .
As of March 2020 , the Costa Rican women 's soccer team ranked 36th in the world , the same position achieved as the previous year . In the last decade the Costa Rican team has gone up in the ranking table since ranking 92nd in 2009 .
More than 34 million people landed in Singaporean Changi Airport in 2019 . The airport is one of the largest transportation hubs in Asia and one of the busiest in terms of passenger traffic .
This statistic displays the total global estimated and forecasted market size for ventilators from 2018 to 2026 . By 2022 , the global ventilator market is expected to exceed one billion U.S. dollars in size .

This statistic depicts the number of hospitals in California in 2018 , by type of ownership . During this year , 64 hospitals in California were owned by the state or the local government . Over half of the community hospitals located in the country are considered non-profit .
This statistic shows the percentage of Americans who personally own a gun in 2011 sorted by their preferred political view . In 2011 , 41 percent of respondents who defined themselves as Republicans or leaned towards the Republican point of view stated they personally own a gun .
This statistic depicts consumer spending in Turkey from 2006 to 2010 , per capita . In 2010 , Turkey 's consumer spending per capita was 6,789 U.S. dollars .

This statistic shows the total value of retail sales ( excluding automotive fuel ) in Great Britain annually from 2005 to 2019 . Over the period , the amount spent in the retail industry has increased gradually , reaching 393 billion British pounds worth of sales in 2019 .
This statistic displays the speed with which orders from UK online retailers arrived in the first quarter of 2015 . Of retailers , 73 percent of standard delivery orders arrived the day following order placement .
This statistic gives information on B2C e-commerce sales as percentage of the gross domestic product in North America from 2009 to 2018 . In 2013 , B2C e-commerce accounted for 1.14 percent of the GDP in North America .
The statistic illustrates the most expensive sales at auction by living artists worldwide between 2011 and 2014 . Between 2011 and 2014 , the American artist Jeff Koons had the most expensive sale at auction at Christie 's in New York in 2013 , with a lot that sold for 58.41 million U.S. dollars . Koons had four of the top ten most expensive auction lots worldwide between 2011 and 2014 .

This statistic displays the volume of wine ( excluding juice and musts ) produced in Croatia from 2010 to 2014 . The total volume of wine produced in Croatia has decreased slightly since 2010 . In 2010 there were approximately 1.4 million hectoliters of wine produced .
This statistic shows the number of robberies in Canada in 2019 , by province or territory . There were 8,936 robberies in Ontario , Canada in 2019 .
This statistic displays the average annual salary in the Caribbean Netherlands from 2011 to 2017 ( in U.S. dollars ) . Between 2011 and 2017 , the average annual salary in the Caribbean Netherlands increased from approximately 22,300 U.S. dollars to approximately 26,100 U.S. dollars . In 2017 , the average salary was 26,110 U.S. dollars per year .
Approximately 34.2 million arrivals were recorded at travel accommodation in Greece in 2019. International tourism was the highest contributor , with around two thirds of arrivals in visitor accommodation coming from a foreign country .

The statistic shows the youth unemployment rate in Azerbaijan from 1999 and 2020 . According to the source , the data are ILO estimates . In 2020 , the estimated youth unemployment rate in Azerbaijan was at 15.69 percent .
The Last Dance , an American sports documentary , was by far the highest rated Netflix Original production among Polish viewers in 2020 , with a rating of 8.75/10 . Second was a Swedish thriller series called Caliphate , rated 8.17/10 .
During the general elections held in Argentina on October 27 , 2019 , the candidate Alberto Fernández obtained the highest share of votes , amounting to 48.1 percent when 97.13 percent of voting stations had been counted . With this result , the candidate representing the Frente de Todos coalition , is the newly elected president of Argentina , after reaching an almost eight percent point difference with incumbent Mauricio Macri .
This statistic represents the machinery and equipment price index in Canada between 2006 and 2016 . In 2016 , machinery and equipment had a price index of 128.4 , compared with 100 in the base year ( 2010=100 ) .

The number of tested individuals in week 49 ( November 30- December 6 ) amounted to 261 thousand . In total , around 357 thousand individuals had been confirmed infected with the virus in the country as of December 16 , 2020 .

The index of production value measures the gross value added of output from the production industries and is used as an indicator of growth . By 2018 , the production output index rose to 114.5 .

CNH is an industrial and agricultural machinery company , formed by a merger between Case and New Holland , with Fiat Industrial also later merging into CNH . The company also owns the Austrian tractor manufacturer Steyr and Italian industrial vehicle producer Iveco , among others .

According to the survey , 60 percent of farmers cited that precision farming will be the most influential trend affecting farming practices and structure through 2030 .
