The statistic shows Chicago Bulls players with the most steals in franchise history . Michael Jordan is the career steals leader of the Chicago Bulls with 2,306 steals .
In 2019 , the Dominican Republic was ranked as the country with the fourteenth highest risk index of money laundering and terrorist financing in Latin America , with an index score of 5.41 , down from 5.8 reproted a year earlier . At least since 2016 , the risk index of this Caribbean country showed a downward trend . The Basel AML Index is a composite index , a combination of 14 different indicators with regards to corruption , financial standards , political disclosure and rule of law and tries to measure the risk level of money laundering and terrorist financing in different countries .
The statistic depicts the number of registered golfers in France from 2010 to 2018 . In 2018 , there were 412,726 registered golf players in France .
The cost-income ratio of the Italian banking group UniCredit increased from 2009 to 2016 , when it peaked at 66.2 percent . In the following years , the ratio improved significantly , reaching 52.7 percent in 2019 . The cost-to-income ratio is among the key performance indicators used to gauge the profitability of companies operating in the financial sector .
Store brands held a 19.2 percent share of the market value of the retail industry in the United States in 2019 . According to the report , over one of every five products sold in the U.S. was from a retailer 's own brand .
As of 2019 , almost half of British adults have made a New Year 's resolution to exercise more or generally improve their fitness . Resolutions concerning health and diet are the most common type of resolutions , although financial and career orientated ones were also popular , with 31 percent of Britons stating they have made a resolution to save more money . While New Year 's resolutions are popular , 27 percent of British adults claimed that they have never made one at all , with older age groups being far less likely to make a resolution than younger ones .
This statistic shows the average unemployment rate amongst different ethnic groups in the United States for 2019 . In 2019 , 5.6 percent of the Black or African-American population in the United States were unemployed .
Because of the effects of the COVID-19 coronavirus , global year-to-date chemical production declined by 1.8 percent as of August 2020 as compared to the previous year . Chemical production has increased in five category during 2020 , however year-to-date global chemical production declined in the rest of categories . Coatings production has decreased by the largest margin so far in 2020 , at 25.8 percent as of August .
As of 2020 , there were 54 nuclear reactors under construction worldwide , with the majority being built in China . Comparatively , there were 186 nuclear reactors shut down permanently as of that year . The United States had permanently shut down 37 nuclear facilities as of February 2020 .

Moreover in that year , Chile scored 0.53 in wage equality for similar work , which shows a gender gap of approximately 37 percent ( women are 37 percent less likely than men to receive an equal wage for similar work ) .

In 2019 , the south Asian country was the third largest producer as well as consumer of electricity in the world . Indonesia was mentioned as the world 's second-largest plastic polluters of the ocean and furthermore deforestation of peatlands made Indonesia the world 's third largest emitter of greenhouse gases . But the rise of social media made Indonesians more aware of current environmental issues .

This statistic demonstrates the share of households owning microwave ovens in Great Britain from 2005 to 2017 . Over the time period observed , the share of respondents owning microwaves has fallen from 95 percent in 2003 to 93 percent in 2017 .
This statistic shows the green space per inhabitant in the territory of the city of Reykjavik in Iceland as of 2018 , broken down by category . According to data published by TravelBird , the overall green space per person in Reykjavik was of 410.84 square meters , among which roughly 223.21 square meters per person referred to nature reserve .
West Virginia , Mississippi , and Oklahoma are the U.S. states with the highest percentage of their population who are obese . The states with the lowest percentage of their population who are obese include Colorado , Hawaii , and California . It is estimated that around 31 percent of the entire U.S. population is obese .
Alberta was home to the most cannabis stores of any Canadian province , at 225 locations in December 2019 . Ever since recreational cannabis legalization in Canada , cannabis stores have been popping up all across the country .
This statistic shows the average inflation rate in Jordan from 1985 to 2019 , with projections up until 2025 . In 2019 , the average inflation rate in Jordan amounted to about 0.68 percent compared to the previous year .
According to a pan-India survey conducted in 2020 , on smartphones , over 23 percent of the respondents stated that they owned a smartphone from Xiaomi . This was closely followed by Samsung , with approximately 21 percent market share . Xiaomi had a share of over nine percent in the total smartphone shipments across the globe .
The most followed Hungarian online streamer on Twitch was WeAreTheVR as of March 2020 . KriszhAdvice took the second place with over 227 thousand followers .
As a result of the coronavirus pandemic ( SARS-CoV-2 ) , the Andalusian tourism sector was expected to experience a loss of more than 2 billion euros in 2020 . According to the latest studies , the most affected Andalusian province would be Malaga by a wide margin , with an economic impact that was expected to reach almost 900 million euros due to the global pandemic .
This statistic displays the percentage of childless women in the United States in 2018 , by educational background . In 2018 , about 37 percent of the women who had a graduate or professional degree were childless in the United States .
The statistic shows SABMiller 's EBITA margin worldwide in 2016 , by region . In that year , SABMiller 's EBITA margin amounted to 18.5 percent in North America .
This statistic shows the leading 10 fastest growing retailers of baked products in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2013 , by the increase in number of outlets . In 2013 Costa ranked as the fastest growing bakery retailer with 200 new outlets since 2012 . Greggs ranked second with 100 more outlets .
This statistic shows the total annual expenditure on tools and equipment for house and garden in the United Kingdom from 2005 to 2019 , based on volume . In 2019 , UK households purchased approximately 6.5 billion British pounds worth of tools and equipment for house and garden , a considerable increase on the previous year .
This statistic shows the growth in transaction value for reward-based crowdfunding platforms ( an alternative finance market segment ) in Europe ( excluding the UK ) from 2013 to 2018 . In 2018 , reward-based crowdfunding reached a total transactions value of 175.4 million U.S. dollars , a decrease of approximately 4 million USD from the previous year .
This statistic shows the annual production value of the manufacture of paper and paper products in Slovenia from 2008 to 2017 . In 2017 , the Slovenian production value of paper and paper products came to approximately 798.9 million euros .
This statistic shows the total number of female lone parents ( single mothers ) in Canada in 2018 , distinguished by their age . In 2018 , about 49,250 single mothers aged between 0 and 24 years were living in Canada .
This statistic shows the number of registered helicopters in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2005 to 2013 . In 2013. there were 1,232 helicopters registered in the United Kingdom .
This statistic illustrates the structure of the construction industry in Northern Ireland in 2017 , by sector . That year , the biggest sector in Northern Ireland´s construction industry was the non-housing repair and maintenance sector , amounting to 23 percent of the overall construction output .
In 2019 , Singapore imported approximately 236.8 billion Singapore dollars worth of machinery and equipment , making it the country 's largest import commodity by value . This was followed by the import of mineral fuels and lubricants , valued at 102.7 billion Singapore dollars .
This statistic shows the leading 20 countries based on mortality rate attributed to unintentional poisoning in 2016 , per 100,000 population . In that year , Burundi had an unintentional poisoning mortality rate of 5.2 per 100,000 population .
This statistic shows the annual revenue of food manufacturing in Canada from 2012 to 2018 . In 2018 , the food manufacturing industry 's revenue amounted to approximately 111.6 billion Canadian dollars , up from around 108.02 billion Canadian dollars in the previous year .
In 2019 , PT Telkom Indonesia 's total data , internet and SMS revenue was about 72.79 trillion Indonesian rupiah . Telkom Indonesia is the largest telecommunication and network provider in Indonesia . The company offers a wide range of network and telecommunication services , including fixed-line connection services , cellular services , network and interconnection services , as well as Internet and data communication services .
In 2019 BASF , the largest diversified chemical company in the world , generated a revenue of around 59 billion euros .
Between 2008 and 2014 , ATMs in Russia continuously increased , reaching a peak of nearly 140 thousand ATMs as of 2014 . During the following months , number of automated teller machines ( ATMs ) fluctuated , amounting to approximately 131.9 thousand machines as of January 2020 .
This statistic displays the effectiveness of recruitment channels worldwide in 2018 , ranked using an effectiveness score . During the survey , the second most effective recruitment channel was internal recruitment , with a score of 15.42 . The effectiveness score is calculated through dividing the portion of overall hires due to a channel by the portion of overall applications received from that channel .
This statistic depicts the leading law firms in New York City in 2019 , by number of lawyers . In that year , the law firm with most lawyers in the city was Paul , Weiss , Rifkind , Wharton & Garrison , who employed 832 New York City-based lawyers .
This statistic shows the annual domestic consumption of sour cream in the United States from 2000 to 2019 . In 2018 , the U.S. domestic consumption of sour cream amounted to about 1.4 billion pounds .
In 2019 , the rubber industry contributed an estimate of 0.2 percent to the gross domestic product ( GDP ) of Malaysia . The rubber industry 's contribution to GDP had remained constant in the past few years .
During the second quarter of 2019 , 2.58 percent of global e-commerce website visits were converted into purchases , down from 2.72 percent during preceding quarter . In the United States , online shopper conversion rates amounted to 2.57 percent . Despite mobile commerce catching up in terms of page views and revenue , traditional online shopping visits via PC still hold the top spot for conversions .
This timeline depicts the net income of Hibbett Sports in the United States from fiscal year 2015 to 2020 . In 2020 , the net income of Hibbett Sports amounted to around 27.34 million U.S. dollars in the United States .
According to the most recent transparency figures of the British retailer New Look , the two leading supplier countries of the company were China and Turkey , with 225 and 142 factories in these countries respectively . In the United Kingdom ( UK ) , where the retailer is based , New Look has 16 supplier factories .
In Russia , the prevalence rate for chronic kidney disease was 12,832 per 100,000 population in 2017 , compared to 5,687 per 100,000 population in Germany . This statistic shows the prevalence rates for chronic kidney disease for select countries worldwide in 2017 .
As of January 3 , 2021 , the cumulative number of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) cases in Angola amounted to 17,642 , maintaining an upward tendency . The country registered 408 deaths due to the virus . The capital Luanda is the disease epicenter in the country .
The statistic shows Deutz AG 's unit sales from the fiscal year of 2007 to the fiscal year of 2019 . In the fiscal year of 2019 , Deutz sold 211,667 units , a 1.4 percent decrease on the previous year . Deutz AG is a German engine manufacturer established 1864 in Cologne .
This statistic presents the average room rate of hotels in selected cities in the United Kingdom in 2016 . Average room rates in London amounted to 172.57 British pounds , while at London Heathrow airport average rates were around 100 British pounds .
This statistic displays the volume of coach and bus passenger transport in Sweden from 2006 to 2017 , in million passenger-kilometers . In the period under consideration , passenger transport volume presented a trend of growth despite some oscillation . In 2017 , passenger volume reached its peak at approximately 10.6 billion passenger-kilometers .
The statistic shows budget balance of Bosnia & Herzegovina in relation to GDP between 2015 and 2019 , with projections up until 2025 . A positive value indicates a budget surplus , a negative value indicates a deficit . In 2019 , budget surplus of Bosnia & Herzegovina amounted to around 1.52 percent of GDP .
This statistic displays the annual change in the harmonized index of consumer prices in the Netherlands from 2013 to 2018 , with a forecast for 2019 to 2021 . In 2020 , the HICP is expected to grow by approximately 1.5 percent .
The timeline presents the League of Legends World Championships prize pool from 2012 to 2019 . In 2019 , the LoL World Championship , which took place in various cities across France , Germany , and Spain , had a prize pool of 2.23 million U.S. dollars , down from 6.45 million a year earlier .
The statistic shows the penetration rate of unique mobile subscribers worldwide from 2000 to 2020 . In the second quarter of 2017 , 67 percent of the global population were subscribed to a mobile service .
This statistic shows the number of deaths from accidental apparent opioid overdose in Canada in 2017 involving fentanyl , by province . In that year , 1,174 opioid overdose deaths in British Columbia involved fentanyl .
The statistic shows the youth unemployment rate in Uruguay from 1999 and 2020 . According to the source , the data are ILO estimates . In 2020 , the estimated youth unemployment rate in Uruguay was at 27.1 percent .
The internal consumption of travel and tourism in Dominica , which includes the sector 's revenues and government spending , fluctuated strongly during the past decade . The Caribbean nation registered the highest internal tourism consumption in 2014 , with 250.4 million U.S. dollars , while the lowest was recorded in 2018 , with 129.4 million U.S. dollars .
This statistic presents the brand value of the most valuable Swiss watch brands in 2016 . In that year , Rolex was the most valuable Swiss watch brand at 7.25 billion Swiss francs ( CHF ) . Rolex is one of the worlds most powerful brands , and it has a long history within the watch making business .
This statistic shows the advertising cost of Spectrum Brands worldwide from 2017 to 2019 . In 2019 , Spectrum Brands had advertising costs amounting to 34.2 million U.S. dollars worldwide .
Although its popularity has experienced some decline , many Spaniards regularly practice cycling for transport , recreation , or sport purposes . Regrettably , some bike rides might have an unfortunate turn of events and end up in accidents where the cyclists involved were unable to pull through . This is the case for the 58 cyclists that were victims of fatal traffic accidents in Spain in 2018 .
In 2019 , the agricultural sector in Haiti contributed with approximately 19.5 percent of the value added to the country 's gross domestic product ( GDP ) , the highest contribution reported for the Latin America and Caribbean region . In contrast , the lowest contributions were reported by Puerto Rico and the Bahamas , with a share of less than one percent . The agricultural sector includes forestry , hunting , and fishing , as well as cultivation of crops and livestock production .
As of mid-2020 , five out of ten Latin American and Caribbean cities with the highest local purchasing power were located in Mexico . With an index score of 53.84 , people in Monterrey had the highest domestic purchasing power in Mexico . Puerto Rico 's capital was also the Latin American city with the highest cost of living index .
This statistic shows the amount of coal sold by Arch Coal between 2008 and 2019 , in millions of tons . Arch Coal is a U.S. company that mines , processes , and markets bituminous and sub-bituminous coal with low sulfur content . Arch Coal is headquartered in St. Louis , Missouri .
This statistic shows the ten earthquakes that occurred in the United States from 1900 to 2016 , that had an affect on the most people . Approximately 3,000 people were affected by the earthquake in Klamath Falls , Oregon on September 21 , 1993 .
This statistic depicts the value of global mining and metals sector deals in 2017 , by targeted region . In that year , in the Asia-Pacific region there were such deals worth some 9.9 billion U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows the annual expenditure on postsecondary education per student in OECD countries as of 2008 . The figures shown are an average across both public and private institutions . In the United States , 29,910 U.S. dollars is spent per student which is considerably more than the OECD average of 13,461 U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows Chrysler 's adjusted net income between the fiscal year of 2011 and the fiscal year of 2013 , as well as FCA US LLC 's adjusted net income in the fiscal year of 2014 . In the fiscal year of 2012 , Chrysler 's net income amounted to approximately 1.7 billion U.S. dollars . As a result of a 2014 merger between Chrysler and Fiat , Chrysler is a wholly owned subsidiary of Italy 's Fiat S.p.A .
The graph depicts the expenditures related to recreational fishing trips in the United States in 2016 , by expenditure category . In 2016 , 308.16 million U.S. dollars was spent on equipment rental for recreational fishing trips in the United States .
This statistic shows the countries with the largest lithium reserves worldwide as estimated in 2019 . In that year , it was estimated that the United States had total lithium reserves of approximately 630,000 metric tons .
This statistic presents the leading rum brands worldwide in 2019 , based on sales volume . Bacardi was the second largest global rum brand that year , with a sales volume of about 17.8 million-9 liter cases .
Despite only ranking third in terms of average monthly visits , Groupon is still the most searched for coupon website worldwide . In June 2020 , the platform generated approximately 6.12 million global website-related searches .
The statistic shows the amount of general liability insurance gross written premiums in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2004 to 2018 . In 2018 , the amount of the general liability insurance premiums was equal to over 17 billion euros , the highest value recorded in the 15 year period .
This statistic shows the growth of selected cruise passenger source markets worldwide in 2013 . Australia was the fastest-growing cruise passenger source market in 2013 with a growth in passenger numbers of 20 percent .
This statistic shows the population growth in Uganda from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , Uganda 's population increased by approximately 3.56 percent compared to the previous year .
This statistic shows the number of soft drink and ice manufacturing establishments in Canada as of December 2019 , by region . As of December 2019 , there were 53 soft drink and ice manufacturing establishments in the province of Ontario .
This statistic shows the St. Louis Cardinals all-time home run leaders as of October 2020 . Stan Musial has hit the most home runs in St. Louis Cardinals franchise history with 475 home runs .

This statistic shows the number of unemployed people in Sweden in 2019 , by education level . That year , approximately 113 thousand unemployed people had a higher education , whereas nealy 135 thousand had a primary education .
The graph shows the similarity of political beliefs of Facebook users in the United States as of August 2016 . During the survey period , 23 percent of respondents stated that their Facebook friends had similar political beliefs to them , while five percent stated that the political beliefs of their friends were different .
This statistic shows the fertility rate in the Central African Republic from 2008 to 2018 . The fertility rate is the average number of children born to one woman while being of child-bearing age . In 2018 , the fertility rate in the Central African Republic amounted to 4.72 children per woman .
This graph presents the reasons given by French women for bikini line hair removal in a survey from 2019 . It shows that 38 percent of the respondents stated that they consider pubic hair unattractive was a determining reason for waxing their bikini line .
According to the most recent data , the computer games revenue generated in Iceland more than tripled from 2017 to 2018 . In 2018 , the value amounted to over 173 million Icelandic krónur .
The statistic shows the gross margin of Games Workshop worldwide in 2017 and 2020 . In 2020 , Games Workshop had a global gross profit margin of 67 percent .
As of 2018 , 25.7 percent of South African households were classified as single person households , being most prevalent in the North West province ( at 32.6 percent ) . Households inhabiting six or more people amounted to 13.6 percent of South Africa 's total population , being more common among rural areas ( at 20.6 percent ) .
This statistic provides information on the internet usage penetration in Nigeria from 2015 to 2025 . In 2020 , 46.6 percent of the Nigerian population were internet users . This share is projected to grow to 65.3 percent in 2025 .
The timeline shows the value of product shipments of dry pasta , dough and flour mixes from purchased flour in the United States from 2012 to 2016 . According to the report , the U.S. product shipment value of dry pasta amounted to about 12.19 billion U.S. dollars in 2016 .

In 2018 , the agency-and GSE-backed mortgage pools sector in the United States had total debt securities amounting to approximately 2.29 trillion US dollars .
This statistic shows the total number of alcohol-specific deaths in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 1994 to 2018 . The total number of alcohol-specific deaths peaked for this period in 2008 at 9,031 , and has since decreased to 7,551 deaths by 2018 .
This statistic shows the preference for online banking as means to opening a banking account in Great Britain ( United Kingdom , UK ) as of January 2014 , listed by age group . People aged 25 to 34 are the most active users of online banking for opening an account , with 28 percent of this age group expressing their preference for the online service .
This statistic shows the development of the share of households in Denmark connected to the internet via broadband connection from 2003 to 2019 . While in 2003 , 25 percent of households had access to the internet via broadband , the share increased to 93 percent in 2019 .
This statistic shows the national debt of the Gambia from 2015 to 2018 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ) , with projections up until 2025 . The figures refer to the whole country and include the debts of the state , the communities , the municipalities and the social insurances . In 2018 , the national debt of the Gambia amounted to approximately 84.61 percent of the GDP .
This statistic shows the annual general government debt in Finland from 2008 to the second quarter 2018 . According to the latest report period , the Finnish general government debt amounted to 135.8 billion euros .
This statistic shows the domestic soybean meal consumption in Canada from 2000 to 2019 . According to the report , domestic soybean meal consumption in Canada amounted to approximately 2.25 million metric tons in 2019 .

The quantity of monthly Messenger users in Argentina has increased , recording a peak usage in June 2020 . In the South American country , women accounted for close to 53 percent of the Facebook users in 2020 .

Nevertheless , over 50 percent found it challenging to monitor the learning process via online classes . This statistic presents the payment preferences of Americans as of August 2017 . It was observed that 34 percent of the respondents used a debit/credit card as payment means most of the time and occasionally paid with cash in 2017 .

In 2019 , about 778,090 babies were born in Germany , a slight decrease from the year before . Germany is the country with the highest number of births in the European Union , with over 20 thousand more births more than France , the country with the next highest number of live births in Europe .
The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in St. Vincent and the Grenadines from 1985 to 2016 , with projections up until 2025 . GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country in a year . It is considered to be a very important indicator of the economic strength of a country and a positive change is an indicator of economic growth .
This statistic presents the value of domestic travel and tourism spending in Finland from 2012 to 2018 , with a forecast for 2028 . Domestic expenditure is estimated to reach 10.9 billion euros in 2018 . Over the following ten years it is predicted to rise by 1.7 billion euros in 2028 .
This statistic depicts the market share of masterbatch worldwide , by type , in 2016 . In that year , white masterbatches , which are used to provide absolute white color to plastic products , accounted for approximately a 29 percent share of the global masterbatch market .
According to a survey carried out in Canada in July 2019 , some 14 percent of respondents who had tried plant-based meat alternatives , such as Beyond Meat , thought that they were good value and absolutely worth the price . On the other hand , some 15 percent thought they were terrible value and too expensive for what they are .
Among Canadians who have been staying home more due to COVID-19 , around 18 percent said their alcohol consumption had increased as of April 2 , 2020 . The statistic illustrates the percentage of Canadians whose alcohol consumption had changed due to COVID-19 lockdown measures as of April 2 , 2020 .
Facebook was the most beloved social media platform among the citizens in Hong Kong . As of July 2020 , the global social media giant held a market share of 57.9 percent across all devices , leading other rivals like Twitter and YouTube with a wide margin . The American social news and discussion website Reddit has gained traction since the anti-government protests in the city in 2019 .

The number of passengers using the station during this period fluctuated from year to year , but overall this number grew from 50 million in 2004/2005 to 67 million in 2016/17 .

This statistic shows the number of same-sex marriages in Norway from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , 331 same-sex marriages were registered in Norway .
Cats are a popular choice in Europe when it comes to pet ownership , although we do n't see them outside as often as their canine friends . As shown in this statistic , Germany and France are the two countries leading the list of cat owners in the EU , with the former 's narrow win . While Germany also ranks as the top EU country with the highest number of pet dogs , cats still win in European households .

'' are perceived in various countries all over the world . During this survey , 38 percent of respondents from China perceived products made in India as `` slightly positive '' or `` very positive '' .
In 2018 , the share of government spending on education in Peru amounted to approximately 16.99 percent of total governmental expenditure . This represents a decrease of 1.25 percentage points in comparison to the previous year , when educational spending amounted to 18.24 percent of the Peruvian government 's total spending .

This statistic shows the results of a survey on the frequency of consulting with dentists/dental surgeons among Italians in 2018 . According to data provided by Ipsos , only 21 percent of respondents declared to undergo dental checks twice a year .

YPF was one of the national oil corporations with the highest revenue in Latin America .
In 2019 , the total global reserves of the transition metal chromium amounted to an estimated 570 million metric tons . Chromium metal is highly valuable due to its hardness and corrosion resistance .
The first women 's cricket One Day Internationals were played in 1973 as part of the first Women 's World Cup in England . Mithali Raj currently tops the list of all-time matches played in women 's ODIs , having taken part in 209 matches since 1999 .
Considering nuclear families , referring to couples ( married and in consensual union ) and children below the age of 18 , the most common family composition in Iceland in 2020 was married couples without children . Even so , close to 23 thousand families consisted of a married couple and children . When examining single-parent households , it can be observed that single mothers living with their children were close to eight times more common than single fathers living with their children in Iceland in 2020 .
The soccer club Boca Juniors , based in Buenos Aires , had the highest number of fan members in the Argentinian soccer championship Superliga  , with approximately 206.1 thousand club members during the 2018/2019 season , followed by River Plate with 151.4 thousand club members .
In 2019 , about 63.53 percent of the Indonesian population owned and used a mobile phone . The highest share was found in Jakarta where over 78 percent of the population had one . However , on the contrary , only about 38.5 percent of the population in Papua owned a mobile phone .
From a recent study conducted in 2019 , it emerged that the number of Italians who have started listening to podcasts has increased significantly during 2019 . In particular , it merged that the category which was the most frequently listened to was the content regarding Business , preferred by 17.6 percent of the respondents . `` Society and culture '' was ranked second with 14.6 percent of podcast listeners choosing it .
COVID-19 has become one of the largest epidemics in the world . As of February 20 , 2020 , the crude fatality rate of novel coronavirus COVID-19 among patients who had cardiovascular diseases ranged around 13.2 percent in China . The figure was based on a medical analysis of 55,924 confirmed infections with 2,114 death cases .
As of June 2018 , emergency departments ( ED ) and critical care units ( CCU ) in hospitals in Tokyo Prefecture had a capacity of 635 hospital beds , which was the highest number among all 47 prefectures in Japan . Aichi Prefecture followed with 608 beds . That year , a total of around 6.4 thousand beds were available in ED and CCU in Japanese hospitals .

This statistic shows the net profit of the China Construction Bank from 2008 to 2019 . The China Construction Bank is one of the four major banks in China . In 2019 , the China Construction Bank generated a net profit of approximately 269.22 billion yuan .
In 2019 , four percent of the total population of Iowa were uninsured , while the largest part of Iowa 's population was insured through employers . This statistic depicts the health insurance status distribution of the total population in Iowa .
This statistic gives information on the distribution of internet users in Indonesia as of October 2016 , sorted by island or region . As of the measured period , Java accounted for 65 percent of the Indonesian online population .
