This statistic shows the fertility rate in Moldova from 2008 to 2018 . The fertility rate is the average number of children born to one woman while being of child-bearing age . In 2018 , the fertility rate in Moldova amounted to 1.26 children per woman .
The statistic illustrates the passenger load factor ( PLF ) on selected domestic markets in September 2016 . In September 2016 , the domestic passenger load factor in Russia amounted to just over 82 percent .
At the end of fiscal year 2019 , the IT/ITES/Electronic/Hardware/Semiconductor SEZs amounted to 58 percent of the total share of Special Economic Zones throughout the country . Special Economic Zones ( SEZs ) are regions within the country that have , geographically , more liberal economic laws to promote Foreign Direct Investments from foreign investors as compared to the domestic law of the land . SEZs have their own specific set of laws .
This statistic presents the daily time spent by U.S. users on their tablets . As of 2016 , it was found that the average tablet user in the United States spent 81.4 minutes per day accessing their mobile device .
This statistic shows the share of individuals who read books for reasons unrelated to their jobs or studies during the previous year in Spain according to a survey from 2014 to 2015 , broken down by age group . Approximately 90 percent of individuals aged 15 - 19 years old stated that they had read books for reasons unrelated to their jobs or studies .
This statistic displays the number of adults aged 65 years and older vaccinated against influenza in Spain during the 2017 - 2018 season , by autonomous community . In that year , over 725 thousand individuals aged 65 years and older in Catalonia were vaccinated against influenza .
This statistic depicts the proportion of women among active psychologists working in the U.S. from 2007 to 2016 . According to the data , the proportion of women psychologists has increased from 57 percent in 2007 to 65 percent in 2016 .
This statistic displays the revenue share of Burberry in 2020 , by distribution channel . Retail was the leading channel for Burberry that year , accounting for over eighty percent of the company 's revenue . Burberry had global revenues of 2.63 billion British pounds that year .
This statistic shows the number of employees of Ross Stores , Inc. stores in the United States from 2014 to 2019 . As of February 1 , 2019 , Ross Stores , Inc. had a total of 92,500 employees in the United States .
In the academic year 2019/2020 , over 82 thousand foreigners studied at universities in Poland . Within five years , the number of foreigners studying in Poland increased by almost 78 percent .
This statistic shows the number of recreational visitors to Point Reyes National Seashore in the United States from 2008 to 2019 . The number of visitors to Point Reyes National Seashore amounted to approximately 2.27 million in 2019 .
This statistic shows the share of adults in the United States who were using Reddit as of February 2019 , sorted by age group . During that period of time , 14 percent of respondents with some college experience used the social networking site .
This statistic shows radio advertising revenue ROI in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2013 , by sector . Retail had the highest ROI at 18.9 British pounds . For each British pound of advertising investment , there were 18.9 British pounds of return .
This statistic displays a ranking of beauty-related websites by share of natural search voice in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in February 2016 . The website boots.com raked first with a 50 percent share of natural search voice .
According to a survey conducted in eight waves between August 2012 and March 2019 , the share of internet users in the United Kingdom ( UK ) who consumed video games illegally had shown a continual drop . From 18 percent in 2015 and 2016 , this share had dropped to 6 percent by 2019 .
This statistic shows the most important skills to successfully manage highly complex projects in organizations worldwide as of July 2013 . During the survey , 81 percent of the respondents stated that leadership skills were the most important for successfully managing highly complex projects .
The statistic highlights the sales share of Hugo Boss in the Americas in 2019 , by country . In 2019 , 73 percent of Hugo Boss ' sales in the Americas were generated in the United States . In that year , Hugo Boss generated sales of 560 million euros in the Americas .
As of June 2020 , the Icelandic Foreign Ministry was the most well-connected foreign office , mutually following 147 foreign ministries and world leaders on Twitter . Ranking second was the EU External Action Service , with 145 mutual Twitter connections .
The statistic shows the national debt in Iraq from 2015 to 2018 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ) , with projections up until 2025 . In 2018 , Iraq 's national debt to gross domestic product ratio amounted to about 48.89 percent .
2019 saw the largest expenditures on Medicaid in U.S. history . At that time about 639.4 billion U.S. dollars were expended on the Medicaid public health insurance program that aims to provide affordable health care options to low income residents and people with disabilities . Medicaid was signed into law in 1965 .
This statistic shows the number of employees working in the construction industry in Sweden from 2010 to 2017 . In 2017 , the construction industry employed 342,570 people .
This statistic shows the sales volume of wine in British Columbia ( BC ) from 2012/13 to 2018/19 . The sales volume of wine in the Canadian province of British Columbia reached approximately 76.01 million liters during the fiscal year ending in March 2019 .
This statistic shows the total amount of statutory profits and losses of Balfour Beatty Group from 2011 to 2018 , in million British pounds . During the eight years recorded here , the Group 's profit has oscillated considerably , ranging from a loss of 206 million British pounds to a profit of 186 million British pounds . In 2018 , the group generated a statutory profit of 135 million British pounds , a decrease of nearly 20 percent compared to the previous year .
The statistic shows the Kyrgyz Republic 's budget balance in relation to GDP between 2015 and 2019 , with projections up until 2025 . A positive value indicates a budget surplus , a negative value indicates a deficit . In 2019 , the Kyrgyz Republic 's budget deficit amounted to around 0.14 percent of GDP .
This statistic shows the population change in Guam from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , Guam 's population increased by approximately 0.92 percent compared to the previous year .
This graph shows the usage of acupuncture by WHO member states as of June 11 , 2012 . As of this time , 29 WHO member states had regulations in place for providers of acupuncture services .
The statistic shows Arizona Cardinals players with the most touchdowns scored in franchise history . Larry Fitzgerald is the career touchdown leader of the Arizona Cardinals with 120 touchdowns .
This statistic shows the development of SPD party member numbers in Germany from 1990 to 2019 . At the end of 2019 , the SPD party counted 419,340 members , compared to 943,402 in 1990 . Thus the number of party members has more than halved since then .
This statistic shows the average annual household expenditure on chocolate bars in Canada from 2010 to 2017 . The average annual household expenditure on chocolate bars in Canada in 2017 amounted to 77 Canadian dollars .
This statistic depicts the crude birth rate in Bahrain from 2008 to 2018 . According to the source , the `` crude birth rate indicates the number of live births occurring during the year , per 1,000 population estimated at midyear . '' In 2018 , the crude birth rate in Bahrain amounted to 13.99 live births per 1,000 inhabitants .
This statistic depicts the percentage of Canadians who had been diagnosed with anxiety as of 2018 , by age . According to the data , 41 percent of those aged 18 - 29 years had been diagnosed with anxiety .
This statistic shows the revenue of the telecom services industry from 2012 and 2018 . In 2018 , the revenue of the Singaporean telecom market reached around 9.5 billion Singapore dollars , indicating a decrease of approximately 900 thousand dollars compared to 2017 .
Of all the countries in the world , China had , by far , the largest international reserves in August 2020 , with 3.46 trillion U.S. dollars in reserves and foreign currency liquidity . Japan and Switzerland were the only other countries with over a trillion U.S. dollars in reserves , with a total of 1.51 trillion U.S. dollars and 1.003 trillion U.S. dollars respectively .
Between December 2019 and May 2020 , Orange Polska provided the fastest mobile internet among Polish internet service providers in terms of download speed , with 25.4 Mbps .
In 2019 , there were 585 crimes related to extremism in Russia , compared to 894 cases recorded in the previous year . The number of criminal cases in this category continuously increased between 2011 and 2017 , ranging from 480 to 972 offenses of such nature registered by the country 's law enforcement authorities .
Throughout the 2018 calendar year , Shazam reportedly had 478 million annual active users , an impressive increase from the 400 million recorded in 2017 . Some sources have attributed this rapid growth to the recent acquisition of Shazam by tech giant Apple , a deal which cost Apple 400 million U.S. dollars . Apple acquired Shazam in late 2018 , a move considered controversial by some because of the effect the acquisition could have on competitors .
As of October 2019 , the support for the Italian government appeared to be disparate among the Italian population . Indeed , 44 percent of the respondents entitled to vote held a negative opinion , whereas 43 percent of interviewees were positive towards the new government . The current government is supported by M5S , PD , LeU , and Italia Viva and was sworn in September 2019 , representing Conte 's second cabinet .
This statistic compares the cost of an angioplasty procedure in selected countries as of 2019 . In the United States , an angioplasty cost 28,200 U.S. dollars , while in Costa Rica such a procedure cost less than half of that price .
The men 's PGA Tour 2019/2020 season had a scheduled 49 events with a cumulative prize pool across all tournaments of 400 million U.S. dollars . By contrast , the 33 events of the women 's LPGA Tour had cumulative prize money of 75 million U.S. dollars
This graph shows recent university graduates responses to a survey question about the impact their college debt had on their other financial and life decisions following graduation . The survey was conducted in the United States in 2012 . 40 percent of graduates said that they had delayed a major purchase , such as a home or car , because of their continuing college debt .
This statistic depicts dishwashers brands used the most by U.S. construction firms in 2015 . The survey revealed that 31 percent of the respondents use GE Appliances brand dishwashers the most .
This statistic illustrates the total amount of passenger cargo uplifted by Flybe Ltd in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2008 to 2019 . Flybe Ltd was a low-cost regional airline based in Exeter , Devon . Flybe was sold to Connect Airways in February 2019 .
This figure shows the market value of the ice cream sector in the United Kingdom ( UK ) for the 52 weeks ending November 8 , 2015 , by category . Choc snacks amounted to 237.7 million British pounds , followed by premium ice cream valued at 171.5 million British pounds . Annual expenditure on sugar , confectionery and ice cream has increased when based on the volume of household purchases , although the average volume of purchases per week has done so only slightly .
This statistic shows a selection of companies LinkedIn has acquired since 2010 , and their respective acquisition price . In July 2014 , the professional networking company acquired marketing platform Bizo for 175 million U.S. dollars . The company 's most expensive acquisition was online learning company Lynda.com for 1.5 billion U.S. dollars in April 2015 .
The house-price-to-income ratio in Canada was equal to 122.33 percent in the first quarter 2019 and was the least affordable country analyzed . This means that house prices in Canada outpaced Canadian incomes by 22.3 percent . It also shows that house prices grew faster than incomes in most of the countries .
This statistic shows Volkswagen 's operating profit in the first quarter of 2015 and the first quarter of 2016In spite of the emissions scandal , Volkswagen produced operating profit of around 3.4 billion euros in the first quarter of 2016 . Between the first quarter of 2015 and the first quarter of 2016 , the company 's profit after tax fell from 2.9 billion euros to 2.37 billion euros .
This statistic shows the total number of enterprises in the non-financial business economy in Portugal in 2016 , by size class of employment . In 2016 , there were 808 enterprises with 250 employees or more in Portugal .
The statistic shows Montenegro 's budget balance in relation to GDP between 2015 and 2019 , with projections up until 2025 . A positive value indicates a budget surplus , a negative value indicates a deficit . In 2019 , Montenegro 's budget deficit amounted to around 2.4 percent of GDP .
This statistic outlines the number of employees at CF Industries between 2010 and 2018 . CF Industries Holdings , Inc. is a manufacturer and distributor of agricultural fertilizers , and is based in Chicago . In 2019 , the corporation had 3,000 employees .
This statistic display the total number of patients on the kidney transplant waiting list in Cyprus from 2015 to 2019 . In 2019 , there were 74 patients active on the waiting list for a kidney in Cyprus .
The statistic shows the annual spending on food for the average adult in the United Kingdom in 2016 , broken down by expenditure on groceries , takeaways and eating out . Of the total amount of 3,680 British pounds spent on food , 67 percent of it ( 2472 British pounds ) goes into grocery expenditure .
This statistic shows the annual average per capita consumption of fruit juice drinks in Germany from 2012 to 2019 . In 2019 , the average German consumed roughly 10 liters of fruit juice drinks , a decrease from11 liters the previous year .
This statistic presents the forecast volume of skim milk powder consumed in the European Union-28 from 2015 to 2028 . According to the data , the estimated consumption volume of skim milk powder will increase to approximately 747 thousand tonnes by 2028 .
This statistic shows the estimated market value of organic meat worldwide in 2019 and 2020 , with a forecast figure for 2023 . In 2020 , the market value of global organic meat was estimated to be approximately 16 billion U.S. dollars .
The statistic shows Atlanta Hawks players with the most games played in franchise history . Dominique Wilkins is the career games played leader of the Atlanta Hawks with 882 games played .
The United Kingdom ( UK ) and the Netherlands were the two European country with full 4G coverage by Vodafone in 2020 . Romania ranked last , with 84 percent of population covered .
This survey shows the length of time that U.S. consumers are willing to wait on the line when contacting a customer service center by telephone . 28 percent of respondents are prepared to wait between 5 and 10 minutes .
The statistic shows the expenditure of affluent households , or the so-called highest quintile , in the United States on women 's coats and jackets from 2013 to 2016 . In 2016 , affluent Americans spent some 95 U.S. dollars on women 's coats and jackets .
This statistic shows the number of movers in the United States in 2019 , by type of movement between the new and old residence . In 2019 , about 31.37 million people changed their residence in the United States .
This statistic depicts the pharmaceutical company ranking based on general access to medicine management in developing countries in 2018 , according to the Access to Medicine Index 2018 . In that year , the company with the highest score in this category was Novartis AG , with a total indicator score of 4.56 . The Access to Medicine Index is an independent initiative that ranks the world 's 20 largest companies according to their efforts to make their products more available , affordable and accessible in developing countries , highlighting policy and practice that either facilitate or hinder access to medicine .
This statistic shows the number of outgoing ( emigrating ) adoptions processed in the United States in the fiscal year of 2019 , by receiving country . In 2019 , a total of 24 American children were adopted by families living in Canada .
This statistic shows gross value added ( GVA ) of the agriculture , fishing and forestry industry at current prices of Scotland from 2000 to 2018 . The GVA of this industry has experienced a net increase over this period , peaking in 2017 at 1.8 billion British pounds .
This statistic depicts the crude birth rate per thousand population in Sweden from 1960 to 2015 . The crude birth rate dipped in 2000 at 10.2 live births per thousand population before increasing to 11.9 births per thousand population in 2014 . In 2016 , the crude birth rate was 11.8 per thousand population .
This statistic shows the number of days per week Canadian restaurants are open by share of restaurant operators , in 2014 . During the survey , 93 percent of survey respondents said the restaurants they operated were open seven days per week .
The statistic shows the 20 countries with the highest public surplus in 2019 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ) . In 2019 , Micronesia ranked 1st of the countries with the highest public surplus with an estimated surplus of around 16.44 percent of the gross domestic product .
Canada 's natural gas production has been by far larger at Alberta . Alberta 's province generated around 126.1 billion cubic meters of natural gas in 2019 . British Columbia ranked second with some 58.8 billion cubic meters .
The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in Paraguay from 1985 to 2018 , with projections up until 2025 . GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country in a year . It is considered to be a very important indicator of the economic strength of a country and a positive change is an indicator of economic growth .
Following a period of consistent growth , the locomotive fleet of U.S. class I railroad operators fell slightly to 26,546 locomotives in 2017 , from 26,719 locomotives in the previous year , only to increase again to 26,086 in 2018 .
This statistic shows the share of people , who followed social media at least or nearly daily in Finland in 2018 , broken down by age group . During the survey period , 73 percent of people from 35 to 44 years of age followed social media continuously or several times per day .
This statistic displays the number of children looked after in England in 2017 to 2018 , by region . The region with the largest amount of such children is the North West with over 14 thousand individuals .
This statistic provides information on the personal e-mail access frequency in the United States as of November 2017 . During the survey period , 19 percent of respondents in the United States checked their e-mail once a day .
This statistic shows the fertility rate in Trinidad and Tobago from 2008 to 2018 . The fertility rate is the average number of children born by one woman while being of child-bearing age . In 2018 , the fertility rate in Trinidad and Tobago amounted to 1.73 children per woman .
This statistic shows the Chicago White Sox all-time hits leaders as of October 2020 . Luke Appling has the most hits in Chicago White Sox franchise history with 2,749 hits .
In 2018 , the average number of people per family in Finland was 2.8 persons . The average size of a family remained at the same level from 2010 to 2018 . The most common family type in 2018 was a married couple without children ( 36.3 percent of the population ) , followed by married couples with children ( 27.6 percent of the population ) .
Of the U.S. college students surveyed , around 48 percent reported having had a flu vaccine within the last 12 months . This statistic shows the percentage of college students in the U.S. who received a vaccination against influenza in the last 12 months , as of fall 2019 .
This statistic depicts the leading U.S. states by Alzheimer 's mortality rate in 2018 . Alabama ranked first with 59.3 deaths per every 100,000 population due to Alzheimer 's that year , followed by Vermont with 53.2 deaths per 100,000 population .
The graph shows millennials ' primary news sources in the United States in May 2013 . During a survey it was found that 30 percent of millennials used news websites as their primary news source .
Around 27.9 million arrivals were recorded at accommodation establishments in Portugal in 2019 . Over the last five years arrivals in tourist accommodation have been increasing at a higher rate , with an extra ten million arrivals in 2019 compared to 2014 .
This statistic displays leading reasons why consumers in Great Britain reported continuing to follow brands on social media in 2013 . The greatest share of respondents reported continued social media engagement with brands because the brand sent coupons for discounts .
The statistic shows the consumption of coal energy for electricity generation in the United States between 1950 and 2019 . In 2019 , U.S. energy consumption derived from coal came to approximately 539.42 million short tons of this fossil fuel .
This statistic shows the average annual expenditure on kitchen , dining room furniture per consumer unit in the United States from 2007 to 2019 . In 2019 , the country 's average expenditure on kitchen , dining room furniture amounted to 46.21 U.S. dollars per consumer unit .
This statistic shows the number of enterprises in the manufacture of furniture industry in Malta from 2008 to 2018 . In 2017 , there were 489 enterprises manufacturing furniture in Malta .
This statistic displays the leading markets for the export of Scotch whisky in Europe in 2019 , by value . In this year , France was the leading market for the export of Scotch whisky with an export value of 432 million British pounds , followed by Germany at 184 million British pounds .
This statistic illustrates the total value of written property premiums on the European insurance market between 2010 and 2018 . As of 2010 , property premiums on the European real estate market reached approximately 81.4 billion euros and have been growing ever since , reaching nearly 105 billion euros as of 2018 . More data on the insurance market in Europe can be found in the Statista Dossier .
This statistic shows the most important export partner countries for Armenia in 2017 . In 2017 , the most important export partner of Armenia was Russia , with a share of 24.2 percent in exports .
Hong Kong had the largest share of female prisoners , with about 20.1 percent of its detainees being women , as of June 2020 . In the United States , 9.8 percent of its inmates were women .
This statistic shows the degree of urbanization in Vanuatu from 2009 to 2019 . Urbanization means the share of urban population in the total population of a country . In 2019 , about 25.39 percent of Vanuatu 's total population lived in urban areas and cities .
The country with the highest cost-per-click on Facebook in the measured period was the Czech Republic , where CPC reached over two U.S. dollars , whereas the lowest CPC on the platform was recorded in Switzerland , at three quarters of a dollar . The average for the studied countries amounted to 0.95 U.S. dollars . The United States placed slightly above the global average , with CPC valued at 1.1 U.S. dollars .
The statistic shows Taiwan 's share in the global gross domestic product ( GDP ) adjusted for Purchasing Power Parity ( PPP ) from 2015 to 2025 . In 2019 , Taiwan 's share in the global gross domestic product adjusted for Purchasing Power Parity amounted to approximately 0.94 percent .
This statistic shows the least affordable off-campus rents in college towns in the United States in 2017 . Stanford University was the second most expensive college town for off-campus rents with a market difference of 68.3 percent . This means that the average off-campus rent near Stanford university was 68.3 percent higher than the average market rent in that area .
During a survey conducted in 2018 , over 60 percent of Brazilian respondents deemed the state of the economy of Brazil to be bad or very bad . Approximately 31 percent of the people surveyed said the Brazilian economy was somewhat good or bad , whereas less than six percent stated that it was good or very good.Still , one third of the people from Brazil who participated in the survey claimed that their personal and family income was just enough to cover their needs .
As of December 2019 , the retail price index of potato in India was over 360 . This meant , the RPI of potato had increased by 260 percent compared to the base year of 2001 . Retail prices index is a measure of inflation published monthly by the Office for National Statistics .
Pig farming production in Mexico was forecasted to amount to around 20.2 million heads , up from 19.6 million heads from the previous year . Swine production volume has been increasing since 2015 , corresponding to the continual increase of swine feed production in the country , which reached 5.82 million metric tons in 2019 .
From January 1st to August 20th of 2020 , a total of 74 thousand wildfires were registered in Brazil . The region most affected by them was the Amazon rainforest , which accounted for almost 48 percent of the fires reported . The Cerrado -a Brazilian biome equivalent to a tropical savanna- suffered over 27 percent of all the forest fires identified in this period , while the Atlantic forest represented 11 percent .
In 2019 , Coteccons Construction 's revenue amounted to approximately 23.73 trillion Vietnamese dong . Coteccons Construction is one of the leading construction groups in Vietnam with core businesses in building and repairing civil and industrial works , technical infrastructure of urban and industrial areas as well as traffic works . It also provides investment consultancy .
As of 2019 , the 151-meter-tall MGM Cotai in Macau was the most expensive building in China , with a cost of 3.4 billion U.S. dollars . It was the winner of Emporis Skyscraper Award in 2018 with its innovative design . Shanghai Tower and The Venetian Macao ranked second place , both cost 2.4 billion U.S. dollars .
The statistic shows the retail trade and food service sales in Georgia in 2009 , by type of store . In 2009 , sales of food and beverage stores added up to about 16.48 billion U.S. dollars in Georgia . Total sales of retail trade and of food services and drinking places were about 130.33 billion U.S. dollars in that year .
The statistic shows the most expensive combat aircraft . At 21 million euros , BAE System 's Hawk trainer/fighter was ranked tenth .
When asked which of the following news sources they felt offered a range of opinions , 67 percent of respondents in the United Kingdom in 2020 stated Sky News . The BBC Website and App was not too far behind , listed by 65 percent .
This statistic shows the growth in the total contribution of the travel and tourism industry to employment in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2012 to 2018 , with a forecast for 2028 . The growth rate stood at 4.6 percent in 2017 .
This statistic presents the assets of foreign-controlled banking group subsidiaries and branches in Slovenia from 2008 to 2016 . In 2016 the assets amounted to 19 billion euros , an increase in approximately 5 billion euros from the previous year .
This statistic shows the population growth in Bulgaria from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , Bulgaria 's population decreased by approximately 0.7 percent compared to the previous year .
This statistic shows the London West End ( UK ) office properties submarket breakdown according to capital value as of 2014 . In that time , Mayfair and St. James 's was the largest submarket with assets totaling approximately 4.4 billion British pounds .
This statistic displays the share of households in Finland that accessed the internet via a desktop or portable computer from 2003 to 2014 . In 2014 , 87 percent of households used a desktop or portable computer to access the internet .
In 2019 , around 22.7 percent of White , non-Hispanic teens were both enrolled in school and working in the United States . On the other hand , 13.4 percent of Black , non-Hispanic teens were both enrolled in school and working .
On the 15th of December 2020 , the Netherlands registered 736 new positive cases of coronavirus . The total number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in the Netherlands amounted to 628.5 thousand . To this day , the provinces of Zuid-Holland and Noord-Holland registered the most Coronavirus cases .
In 2019 , leisure tourism spending in Cuba accounted for 94 percent of the total tourism spending in the country . Business tourism represented the remaining six percent of the total tourism spending . That same year , domestic and international tourism accounted each for 50 percent of the total tourism spending in Cuba .
This statistic shows the value of organic exports from Canada from 2013 to 2016 . The value of Canadian organic exports grew from 610 million Canadian dollars in 2015 to approximately 652.28 million in 2016 .
This graph depicts the estimated number of skier and snowboard visits in the U.S. during the winter seasons between 2000 and 2020 . During the 2019/2020 season , the U.S. had about 51.1 million snow sports visits in total .
This statistic displays the results of a survey on the share of reasons for not using the internet in the Italian region of Molise in Italy in 2019 , by motivation . During the survey period , it was found that 65.3 percent of households lacked in the necessary ICT skills .
This statistic displays public preferences towards Christmas cards in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2018 . The survey results showed that 67 percent of respondents agreed that Christmas cards are more worthwhile if some of the proceed go to charity . Only 15 percent said they prefer to receive a digital e-card than a traditional Christmas card .
This graph presents the number of police violence cases recorded during the `` yellow vests '' movements in France between November 2018 and July 2019 according to the journal Mediapart , by type . It shows that the majority of recorded police violence cases were head injuries : 315 head injuries resulting from police violence have been reported since the beginning of the movement , while 164 cases of threats , insults or restrictions on freedom of the press were also recorded .
This statistic shows the amount of money spent by German travellers abroad from 2006 to 2019 . The spending of German tourists in 2019 added up to roughly 82.7 million euros , a significant increase from the year before at 79.4 million euros .
Financial problems and unemployment were the most common cause of the crises in Polish relationships in 2019 . Boredom and burnout resulting from the long-lasting relationship remained at the level of 22 percent .
As of December 2019 , most Italians did not know what the European Stability Mechanism was . Additionally , 25 percent had general knowledge about this European organization , while only nine percent declared to exactly know what the ESM was . The ESM is an international European organization located in Luxembourg providing financial funding for the monetary stability of the Eurozone .
ABN AMRO 's stock price , part of the AEX stock exchange in the Netherlands , decreased by almost two thirds between February and May 2020 . This was partly caused by concerns over the coronavirus outbreak , as consumer demand could decrease and industries possibly face the effects of a looming recession in 2020 . First estimates forecast that the Dutch economy , for example , could see its growth slow down significantly due to the new virus .
As a result of the coronavirus epidemic in Poland , the sports and recreation industry will lose about 40 revenues in 2020 compared to the previous year , if the bans and isolation introduced are completed before June 2020 . According to the third scenario , the revenues of the fitness industry will decrease by more than half compared to 2019 if the epidemic has its second wave in autumn 2020 . For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic , please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page .
In 2019 , the number of Northrop Grumman employees reached its highest number , since it spunoff its shipbuilding operations in 2006 , with around 90,000 people . During 2018 , Northrop Grumman obtained Orbital ATK , a current subsidiary of the company , which accounts for the increase in employees between 2017 and 2018 .
The graph shows the results of an online survey on the likelihood of purchasing the new iPhone models 5s and 5c which was going be released onto the Chinese market on September 20th , 2013 . According to the survey conducted by popular Chinese news platform Sina , 57.7 percent of the interviewees were not planning on buying either of the two .
This statistic ranks organisation types least trusted to hold individuals personal data in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2014 . Of respondents , 45 percent reported being most concerned with online retailers holding personal information .
According to a survey among Indians in March 2020 , about 34 percent thought incoming travel should be limited for the month following the survey period . This included the opinion that travelers into India should only be allowed if they had a `` coronavirus free '' certificate from the country of departure or boarding port . With the outbreak of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) in late 2019 , countries across the world have implemented entry restrictions , quarantine measures and travel advisories to help contain the virus .
This statistic shows the leading ten biggest mobile shop operators for baked goods in the United Kingdom in 2013 , ranked by by number of mobile shops . The data refers to craft bakers who operate through mobile shops rather than , or as well as , through bricks-and-mortar stores . In 2013 the highest ranking mobile operator was Cooplands ( Doncaster ) with 22 shops in the UK .
The statistic illustrates the best-selling female artists worldwide , based on sales of works between 1985 and 2014 . The world 's top selling female artist was American-born Joan Mitchell who died in 1992 . Mitchell 's art sales had reached 299.01 million U.S. dollars as of November 30 , 2014 .
This statistic presents the number of monetary financial credit institutions ( MFIs ) in Belgium from December 2008 to December 2019 . Over time the number of institutions decreased . As of December 2019 there were 85 credit institutes operating in Belgium .
This statistic shows the expenses global travelers are willing to spend more money on as of March 2014 . During the survey , 39 percent of the respondents said they were willing to spend more money on a hotel in a desired location .
This statistic displays the number of community pharmacies owned by independent contractors in England from 2006/07 to 2018/19 . In the period 2018/19 , 4,525 community pharmacies were owned by independent contractors .
The statistic shows the total consumption of fruit juice and fruit nectar in the European Union from 2007 to 2018 . In 2018 , roughly 9.1 billion liters of fruit juice and fruit nectar were consumed in the 28 European Union countries .
The timeline shows the annual revenue of the Match Group from 2012 to 2019 . In the last reported year , the Match Group 's dating revenue amounted to 2.05 billion U.S. dollars . Up until early 2020 , the Match Group belongs to IAC and includes online dating platforms such as the eponymous Match.com , OkCupid , Tinder , PlentyofFish and others .
This statistic displays the top 10 changes in market capitalizations of biotechnology companies in the United States between 2012 and 2016 . During this period , Amgen had an increase in market capitalization of nearly 58 billion U.S. dollars . Revenues of the United States biotechnology market has grown over the last 15 years .

This statistic depicts the number of fixed broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants in Iran between 2002 and 2019 . In 2019 , there were 10.4 subscriptions registered for every 100 inhabitants .
This statistic presents the forecast volume of fresh dairy products consumed in the European Union-28 from 2015 to 2028 . According to the data , the estimated consumption volume of fresh dairy products will increase to a total of 37 million tonnes by 2028 .
This statistic presents the percentage of college students in the U.S. that had received information from their college or university on select health topics as of fall 2018 . According to the data , about 86 percent of respondents indicated that they had received information about sexual assault and relationship violence while just over 20 percent had received information about problem use of internet and computer games .
This statistic depicts the percentage of adults in select countries worldwide with select sleep habits as of 2019 . It was found that 67 percent of respondents stated they typically wake up at least once during the night .
In 2017 , China had the highest research and development ( R & D ) spending of any country in the global chemical industry , investing around 14.6 billion U.S. dollars , while the United States was ranked second , spending approximately 12 billion U.S. dollars .
Almost half of Peruvian respondents who participated in a survey by IPSOS said that self-driving cars would become a usual sight on the streets of their town or city in 2020 . Argentinian respondents were the least prone to thinking this would happen , with only 32 percent .
In 2018 , Mexican government spent around 2.6 trillion Mexican pesos on health , out of which nearly 20 percent ( 440 billion pesos ) was aimed to cover hospital services . That same year , the country 's spending on health represented 5.46 percent of its Gross Domestic Product ( GDP ) .
The majority of the people who emigrated from Greenland in 2019 moved to Denmark . Since Greenland is an autonomous region of Denmark , the vast majority of the population of Greenland held a Danish citizenship .
The statistic contains data on the U.S. book publishing in the category 'personal finance ' from 2002 to 2013 . In 2006 , 582 books on personal finance were published in the United States .
In 2025 , the number of internet users in Saudi Arabia is forecasted to reach 36.2 million users , up from around 28.8 million users in 2019 . The number of mobile internet users in Saudi Arabia is forecasted to reach 36.17 million users in 2025 .
The median hourly wage of customer service representatives in the U.S. radio and TV broadcasting industry was 17.47 U.S. dollars , marking an increase of around 20 cents from the previous year . As in the motion picture industry , general and operations managers earned more than producers and directors .
Texas was the state with the highest number of registered weapons in the United States in 2019 , with 830,109 firearms . Rhode Island , on the other hand , had 4,784 registered firearms .
This statistic displays smartphone usage in the United Kingdom from 2011 to 2019 . The proportion of smartphone users increased notably from 2011 to 2019 , with 85 percent of respondents using a smartphone in 2019 .
This statistic shows the percent of four different generations who are willing to make a monetary charitable contribution using a mobile device in 2013 . According to the study , 47 percent of Generation X would give money using a mobile device .
This statistic shows the public healthcare expenditure in the United Kingdom from 1997 to 2018 . The majority of healthcare expenditure in the United Kingdom is publicly funded through the National Health Service , amounting to 149.5 billion British pounds in 2018 .
This statistic shows the share of teenagers in the United States who were Vine users as of March 2015 , sorted by gender . During that period of time , 27 percent of female and 20 percent of male teens used the social video app .
This statistic shows the estimated age-standardized mortality rates for cancer in Canada by cancer type , as of 2020 . At that time , it was estimated that there would be 4.4 deaths per 100,000 population due to kidney cancer . Cancer is one of the leading causes of premature death in Canada .
This statistic displays possible impact of lifting sanctions against Iran on daily oil production until 2016 . As of June 2015 , the country produced some 2.8 million barrels per day . Production estimates for 2016 and if sanctions are lifted may be considered optimistic .
The graph shows data on the number of marketing and/or advertising agencies hired per company in the United States as of April 2016 . Among responding marketers from companies with 500 employees or more , 12 percent stated they hired one agency .
This survey shows the share of social media users in Norway in 2019 , by usage frequency . 73 percent of social media users used social media daily or almost daily during this year , while nine percent used it weekly .
This statistic shows the degree of urbanization in Suriname from 2009 to 2019 . Urbanization means the share of urban population in the total population of a country . In 2019 , 66.1 percent of Suriname 's total population lived in urban areas and cities .
This statistic displays the revenue of the cancer and tumor profiling market in China from 2016 to 2023 . It was projected that the cancer and tumor profiling market revenue in China will amount to about 2.83 billion U.S. dollars by 2023 .
This statistic shows the results by of a survey about parental awareness of which digital platforms were used for cyber bullying in Argentina . The April 2018 Ipsos survey showed that 74 percent of all responding parents were aware of social media as a platform for cyber bullying children .
This statistic depicts the crude birth rate in Myanmar from 2008 to 2018 . According to the source , the `` crude birth rate indicates the number of live births occurring during the year , per 1,000 population estimated at midyear . '' In 2018 , the crude birth rate in Myanmar amounted to 17.55 live births per 1,000 inhabitants .
This statistic shows the average per store sales of packaged beverages in convenience stores in the United States in 2019 . In 2019 , the average sales of packaged beverages in convenience stores was 62,125 U.S. dollars per store .
This statistic depicts the percentage of the population who had eating disorders worldwide from 1990 to 2017 . According to the data , the rate of eating disorders increased from .18 percent in 1990 to .21 percent in 2017 .

In the fiscal year ending March 31 , 2020 , Chinese e-commerce corporation Alibaba Group recorded consolidated revenues of around 509.7 billion yuan . This translates to approximately 72 billion U.S. dollars .
The statistic above shows retail advertising revenue of U.S. newspapers from 2000 to 2012 . In 2010 , retail advertising revenue of U.S. newspapers amounted to 12.93 billion U.S. dollars .
This survey shows the handling of data leakage of sensitive information in organizations in 2012 . 72 percent of respondents have defined a policy for the classification and handling of sensitive data as a control for data leakage risk .
The graph shows the distribution of average expenditure per cruise passenger for all cruise lines around the world in 2011 . 7 % of the cost is fuel .
This statistic displays the share of online retailers in the United Kingdom offering free delivery on orders exceeding a given value threshold from 2006 to 2015 . In 2015 , 51 percent of online retailers offered this option .

The Statista and LSP Digital ranking is based on annual business reports , press databases and expert interviews among others . With an annual revenue of roughly 1.9 billion euros , Google ranked first ahead of iTunes and Expedia .

This statistic presents the most popular daily activities of teen and young adult Snapchat users in the United States as of February 2016 . During the survey period , it was found that 69 percent of respondents chatted with people they knew on a daily basis .

This statistic displays the annual revenue figures of Rogers Sugar Inc. from 2014 to 2019 . In 2019 , the revenue of Rogers Sugar Inc. amounted to approximately 794.29 million Canadian dollars , a decrease from around 805.2 million Canadian dollars the previous year .
The installed production capacity of cypermethrin across India was around 24 thousand metric tons at the end of fiscal year 2018 . Cypermethrin is used as an insecticide in large-scale commercial agricultural applications as well as in consumer products for domestic purposes . Since 2009 , the general public can not access to this chemical.The total production volume of pesticide in the country that year was over 200 thousand metric tons .
This statistic displays the percentage of U.S. adults that were anxious about select aspects of their lives as of 2019 . According to the data , 66 percent of adults were anxious about keeping themselves or their family safe .
This statistic shows the production volume of lime in the United States from 2012 to 2019 . In 2019 , the U.S. produced an estimated 18 million metric tons of lime sold or used by producers .
This statistic illustrates the average share of internet users in Italy in November 2019 , by age groups . According to data , about 85 percent of adults aged between 25 and 34 years used internet daily , representing the largest internet audience , followed by the users aged between 45 and 54 years with 81 percent . By contrast , users aged 65 years and older were equal to 29 percent .
The statistics depicts the number of registered ice hockey players in the United States from 2010/11 to 2018/19 . In the 2018/19 season , there were a total of 567,908 registered ice hockey players in the United States according to the International Ice Hockey Federation .
In the second week of April 2020 , online sales of sterilized milk in Russia increased by nearly 200 percent compared to the same period of the previous year . The increase in fast-moving consumer goods sales over the internet was observed due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic , as more cases of the infection were reported in Russia and around the world . During the self-isolation regime , Russians used online grocery delivery services , which led to an increase in sales .
As of March 2020 , the Consumer Price Index ( CPI ) in South Africa , an economic indicator providing information on the change of prices over time , was measured at 122.7 points regarding electricity and other fuels . This is symbolizing an increase of 12.8 points from the previous year .

Consumers in Norway were the most likely to have paid for any digital news content in the last year , with a global survey revealing that 42 percent of Norwegians had made an online news purchase in that time . Meanwhile , just seven percent of UK consumers and eight percent of respondents in Japan had paid for online news in the past twelve months .
According to the source , 43 percent of countries worldwide enjoyed press freedom , 32 percent of countries only had partial press freedom and 25 percent had no press freedom at all . Additinally , 36 percent of the world 's population lived in a country which lacked press freedom .
Destiny 2 is a online multiplayer first-person shooter game which was first released for PlayStation 4 and Xbox One in September 2017 . Whilst the game was initially available on Windows the following month , it only became available on the online gaming platform , Steam , some two years later in October 2019 . In the first month of its release on Steam , the game peaked at over 292 thousand concurrent players worldwide .
This statistic displays the percentage of U.S. adults with short sleep duration and sleep-related difficulties in the period 2005 - 2008 , based on the Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System in 12 states . Some 37 percent of all respondents stated that they sleep less than 7 hours on average . Of these , around 23 percent reported problems with concentrating .
This statistic compares the punctuality rates for the major United Kingdom ( UK ) airlines calculated from selected flights between January and December 2013 . BMI regional was the most punctual airline in the UK in 2013 , with 92 percent of all flights arriving within 15 minutes of the scheduled arrival time . British Airways managed a punctuality rate of 73.7 percent , however , BA also runs many more flights than BMI .
This statistic shows the commercial sales of foodservices in Canada from 2008 to 2021 . In 2016 , foodservices in Canada generated sales of approximately 64.9 billion Canadian dollars . This figure was forecasted to rise to 71 billion in 2018 .

During this year , the contract for IDL Solutions was worth 31.8 million U.S. dollars . HealthCare.gov has cost about 800 million U.S. dollars and includes 60 contracts with 33 different companies .

This statistic shows the number of cars sold by Ford in Austria between 2010 and 2018 . Austrian sales of Ford cars rose to 23.7 thousand units sold in 2011 before continuously declining to under 18 thousand units sold in 2015 . It subsequently increased again in the following years , reaching 20.75 thousand units in 2017 .

It shows that the price for diesel fuel for road vehicles in the UK is expected to increase to a total of 143.9 British pence per liter in 2035 .

The rating showed that 58 percent of respondents had a positive opinion of the brand , compared to 14 percent with a negative opinion . According to the same survey , J D Wetherspoon ranks among the most popular dining brands in the UK .
The infant mortality rate in Norway , for children under the age of one year old , was over 140 deaths per thousand births in 1840 . This means that for all babies born in 1840 , roughly 14 percent did not survive past their first birthday . This rate fluctuated over the next sixty years , falling to just under one hundred deaths per thousand births at the turn of the twentieth century .
The highest average purchase price for one- and two-residential property buildings in Sweden in 2019 was in Stockholm , where the average price reached around 5.7 million Swedish kroner . The lowest average purchase price that year was in Västernorrland , which was around 1.5 million Swedish kroner .
Between 2016 and 2019 , the production volume of meat worldwide has increased from 317 million metric tons to 325 million metric tons .
The top 200 tracks on Spotify were streamed a total of 132.7 million times in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in the week ending October 9 , 2020 .
In 2018 , the Ghanaian agricultural , forestry and fishing sector contributed with an added value of approximately 18 percent to the country 's gross domestic product ( GDP ) . This represents a decrease of just over 11 percentage points in comparison to 2008 , when the sector 's added value to the country 's GDP added up to approximately 29.41 percent .

At the same time , Zynga reported daily active user numbers reaching 31 million .

This statistic depicts the pharmaceutical company ranking based on public policy and market influence in developing countries in 2018 , according to the Access to Medicine Index . In that year , the company with the highest score in public policy and market influence in these countries was GlaxoSmithKline , scoring 4.01 points . The Access to Medicine Index is an independent initiative that ranks the world 's 20 largest companies according to their efforts to make their products more available , affordable and accessible in developing countries , highlighting policy and practice that either facilitate or hinder access to medicine .
The graph shows the population aged 60 and older in China from 1950 to 2010 , with forecasts up until 2100 . In 1950 , around 41 million Chinese had been 60 years or older .
Spain is gradually becoming older , or so it seems when looking at the latest studies which forecast that the average Spaniard would be 52.3 years old by the year 2050 . The Mediterranean country featured a median age of 27.5 years old in 1950 , but this trend shifted towards a steady ageing of the Spanish population in the subsequent years . Spain 's median age was expected to reach approximately 45 years by 2020 .
The statistic shows the number of violent anti-Semitic incidents worldwide from 1989 to 2019 . The Kantor Center team monitored 456 violent cases during 2019 compared to 387 in 2018 , an increase of approximately 18 percent .

In 2020 , VF Corporation 's active segment revenues amounted to 4.9 billion U.S. dollars worldwide . This statistic shows the amount of cash deposited , by EU countries , into the European Stability Mechanism ( ESM ) . Germany has contributed 21.7 billion euros to the ESM to date which , in comparison to the 80 billion euros in the fund , amounts to 27.1 percent ( according to key ESM contributions ) . The European Stability Mechanism ( ESM ) , commonly referred to as the EU `` rescue funding programme , was designed to stabilize the European economic and currency union and to avert `` state bankruptcy '' and any negative consequences to the common currency .

Over 40 percent thought it should be financed exclusively from advertising . In February , average levels of PM2.5 pollution in the Chinese city of Wuhan were 35.1 micrograms per cubic meter . In 2019 , Russia 's transport volume in the inland waterway freight sector amounted to approximately 66 billion tonne-kilometres . The highest transport volume achieved within this time period was in 2006 .
This statistic shows the main export partner countries for Morocco in 2017 . In 2017 , the most important export partner of Morocco was Spain , with a share of 23.2 percent of all exports .
This statistic shows the average annual tuition fees for Canadian citizens in graduate degree programs in Canada from 2006 to 2020 . In the 2019/20 school year the average annual tuition fee for a graduate degree program in Canada was 7,304 Canadian dollars .
How many dogs are there in the US ? According to a pet owners survey , there were approximately 89.7 million dogs owned in the United States in 2017 . This is an increase of over 20 million since the beginning of the survey period in 2000 , when around 68 million dogs were owned in the United States .
The graph shows the opening weekends box office revenue of the top 10 movies in Hong Kong as of end of July 2019 . The movie `` Avengers : Endgame '' ranked first among the all time openings in Hong Kong , earning about 12.7 million U.S. dollars by the end of its opening weekend .
In 2017 , the number of suicides in Italy amounted to 3,091 . According to data , 1,897 people committed suicide by hanging or asphyxiation .
During a survey conducted from June to August 2018 , 23 percent of male respondents from 18 Latin American countries stated they used Instagram , against approximately 22.6 percent in the case of female interviewees . Overall , more than 28 percent of people in the region recently said they do not use any social network .
This statistic displays the number of magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) scan examinations conducted in Croatia from 2012 to 2016 . In 2016 there were approximately 194 thousand MRI scan examinations conducted .
This statistic depicts the likelihood to use ride-hailing apps of adults in the United States in 2018 . During the survey , 22 percent of respondents stated they are very likely to use ride-hailing apps .
This statistic shows the results of a public opinion survey carried out in El Salvador in 2017 and 2018 . When asked which online social network they used , approximately nine percent of respondents claimed to be Snapchat users in 2018 , up from four percent of the people surveyed a year earlier .
In 2018 , the percentage of informal employment in Bolivia stood at 80.7 percent of the total employed population . The share of employment informality has slightly increased in comparison to the previous year , when 79.1 percent of workers were considered informally employed . Bolivia is one of the Latin American countries with the highest level of informal employment .
Between 1820 and 1957 , at least 400,000 people migrated from Poland to the United States . Due to Poland 's complicated border-history , many Polish migrants were recorded as having other nationalities , particularly Austrian , German and Russian ( all migrants who claimed to be Polish between 1899 and 1919 were recorded as being one of these other nationalities ) , therefore the exact number of Polish migrants to the United States during this time is unknown . From 1920 onwards , Poland 's sovereignty and independence was acknowledged by the United States government ( US President Wilson was instrumental in helping to establish the independent Republic of Poland ) , and the figures become more reliable .
The approval rate of Uruguayan presidents has been decreasing recently . During the last years of Tabaré Vázquez 's administration , from 2016 to 2018 , the approval rate fluctuated between 43 percent and 41 percent . This represents a steep decrease from a 75 percent approval rate registered in 2010 , when José `` Pepe '' Mujica assumed office.The ratio of government expenditure to gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Uruguay is predicted to remain at approximately 33 percent within the next years .
In 2018 , the registered number of taxis in Delhi , India , amounted to over 156 thousand . The number of taxis registered in the nation 's capital city has increased by over 72 percent between 2016 and 2018 . The exponential increase in the number of vehicles and the consequent emissions had contributed to making the air quality in Delhi very poor in recent years .
This statistic shows the percentage of public sources as source of health care payments in the United States from 1987 to 2014 . In 2014 , the share of public sources payments in the United States stood at 43.5 percent .
This statistic shows the total amount spent on chilled quiches and flans in the United Kingdom from December 2007 to December 2019 . In the 52 week period ending 29th December 2019 , 188.09 million GBP was spent on quiches and flans .
Of the 8.5 thousand telecommunications sector enterprises operating in the United Kingdom in 2020 , the majority were businesses that employed less than five people . Telecommunications sector enterprises that employed between five and nine people numbered 630 , while there were just 80 companies that employed 60 people or more .
This statistic shows the most important export partner countries for Finland in 2017 . In 2017 , the most important export partner of Finland was Germany , with a share of 14.2 percent in exports .
This statistic shows the average weekly household expenditure on clothing and footwear in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2017 to 2018 , by age of household reference person . Respondents with a household reference person aged 30 to 49 spent an average of 31.2 British pounds a week on clothing , compared to 10.5 British pounds spent weekly by those aged 75 or over .
This statistic displays the leading ten antiepileptic drugs dispensed in England in 2019 , by item . In 2019 , there were approximately 7.39 million items of antiepileptic drug Gabapentin dispensed in the community .
This statistic depicts the share of UK consumers spending more on major household appliances in the United Kingdom from 4th quarter 2011 to 4th quarter 2015 . According to Deloitte 's consumer tracker , consumers generally spent less on major household appliances during the last three months of each quarter . For the past consecutive four years that drop has been by 2 percent .
This statistic shows the total amount of freight transported annually in the United Kingdom ( UK ) by all inland modes of transport between 2006 and 2018 , including freight trains , road transportation and inland shipping . A slight decrease in the amount of freight transported can be observed over the time period shown . In 2018 , around 178.4 billion tonne-kilometers of freight were transported within the UK .
This statistic displays the value of alcoholic beverages exported from Sweden from 2009 to 2019 . Throughout the ten year period the value of alcoholic beverages exported from Sweden fluctuated . In 2019 , the export value of alcoholic beverages amounted to approximately 6.6 billion Swedish kronor .
This statistic displays the capacity utilization of the leather and footwear manufacturing industry in the Netherlands from April 2015 to January 2020 . It shows that in January 2020 , the Dutch leather and footwear manufacturing industry used just under 78 percent of their total capacity .
This statistic shows the total population of the Bahamas from 2015 to 2018 , with projections up until 2025 . In 2018 , the total population of the Bahamas was at approximately 380,000 inhabitants .
This statistic depicts the percentage of U.S. youth aged 12 to 17 years with a major depressive episode in the past year in 2017 , by age . At that time , it was surveyed that approximately 11.8 percent of 14 year olds experienced a major depressive episode in the past year .
This statistic shows the population change in Belize from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , Belize 's population increased by approximately 1.88 percent compared to the previous year .
This statistic displays the percentage of synthetic cannabinoid ( SCRA ) users that used SCRAs per select methods as of 2016 . According to the survey , 66 percent of SCRA users used synthetic cannabinoids in a joint with tobacco .
Here is a statistics on high-speed lines ( LGV ) in France in 2014 , depending on the length . The high speed line East , which connects Paris to Strasbourg , covers a distance of almost 300 kilometers .
This statistic shows the percentage of Canadian students in grades 7 to 12 who used select illicit drugs in the past year as of 2017 - 2018 . As of that time , around 2.2 percent of Canadian students had used cocaine in the past year .
This statistic presents the length of road tunnels in Japan from 2010 to 2017 . In 2017 , the length of road tunnels stretching over Japan amounted to 4,499 kilometers , an increase from 3,725 kilometers in 2010 .
The statistic shows Games Workshop 's number of stores worldwide as of 2020 , by region . As of May 31 , 2020 , Games Workshop had a total of 140 stores in the United Kingdom .
This statistic depicts the results of a survey from 2019 about the awareness on socializing problems due to the internet in Italy . According to data , 42.7 percent of individuals agreed on the assumption that young people had issues with their social life because of the internet .
After the outbreak of COVID-19 , commonly referred to as coronavirus , the majority of Vietnamese consumers were afraid that the virus will have a negative impact on their business and that they would get infected by the virus . Prior to the outbreak , consumers were rather concerned about the environmental pollution , the reduction of healthcare and education services , or the infrastructure development . The sentiment turned around after the outbreak .
First case of a person infected with the novel coronavirus in Argentina was reported on March 3 , 2020 . One day earlier , on March 2 , 2020 , 6.13 million inhabitants of the metropolitan region of Buenos Aires watched TV . Approximately two weeks and 78 reported cases later , on March 17 , 2020 , the number of viewers increased to 6.32 million .
According to the findings of a survey by IPSOS , the majority of countries underestimate the proportion of people who die from cancer each year . Those in the Philippines were the most likely to accurately guess the percentage of deaths attributable to cancer in their country . This statistic shows the actual vs public estimates for number of deaths per 100 which occur as a result of cancer worldwide as of 2019 , by country .
The timeline shows the value of product shipments of soft drinks in the United States from 2002 to 2016 . In 2016 , the U.S. product shipment value of soft drinks amounted to approximately 35.46 billion U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows the number of state prisoner fatalities in the United States in 2016 , by cause of death . Cancer killed 1,128 state prisoners in the U.S. in 2016 .
This graph shows the median starting salaries , according to different categories , of recent graduates surveyed in 2012 around the United States . In 2012 , survey respondents who had done an internship reported starting salaries of 30,000 U.S. dollars .
The statistic shows the leading movie theaters in China in 2016 , by box office revenue . During the measured period , the Beijing Jackie Chan Yaolai International Cinema at Wukesong location generated approximately 99 million yuan box office revenue .
This statistic depicts cancer incidence rates among men in selected countries worldwide between 2003 and 2007 , per 100,000 inhabitants . African American men have one of the highest cancer incidence rates worldwide , with 446.1 new cases per 100,000 inhabitants .

This statistic displays making video calls online at least quarterly among respondents in the United Kingdom in 2013 , broken down by age . In 2013 , 13 percent of respondents over the age of 65 reported making or receiving telephone or video calls using services like Skype or Facetime at least quarterly .

Cost amounted to 276.8 million British pounds in 2011 and is forecasted to grow to 279.5 million British pounds in 2016 . In England alone food waste cost in quick service restaurants is also expected to rise .
This statistic shows the worst airports worldwide according to eDreams reviews in 2015 . Mohammed V International Airport , located in Morocco , was the worst-rated airport in the world in 2015 , with a score of just 3.19 out of five .
This statistic shows the alternative finance market segments in Spain in 2017 , broken down by leading platforms . Peer-to-peer Business lending lead the market in Spain in 2017 , with a market value of 42.7 million euros . Peer-to-peer Business lending was followed by peer-to-peer Consumer lending and Invoice trading , at 31.6 million and 30.8 million euros , respectively .
This statistic shows the number of cars sold by Volvo in Greece between 2008 and 2019 . In the period of consideration , Greek sales of Volvo cars fluctuated . Volvo sales volume peaked at 2.2 thousand units in 2008 .
In Italy , the number of cars sold by Kia between 2011 and 2019 more than doubled , from 19,454 units in 2011 to 47,730 units in 2019 . The sales volume peaked in 2017 at nearly 48,000 units . However , sales figures dropped considerably in 2020 to just over 35,450 units , the lowest figure since 2015 .

This statistic shows the broiler turkey production in Canada in 2019 , by region . The province of Ontario produced approximately 8.96 million kilograms of broiler turkeys weighing under five kilograms .
This statistic shows the reasons consumers think genetically modified foods should be labeled in Canada as of August 2015 . During the survey , 87 percent of the respondents stated they wanted to know what is in the food they are eating .
This statistic depicts the number of mobile cellular subscriptions per 100 inhabitants in Gambia between 2000 and 2016 . There were 139.63 mobile subscriptions registered for every 100 people in 2016 .
The statistic shows North Macedonia 's budget balance in relation to GDP between 2015 and 2019 , with projections up until 2025 . A positive value indicates a budget surplus , a negative value indicates a deficit . In 2019 , North Macedonia 's budget deficit amounted to around 1.95 percent of GDP .
This statistic shows the amount of Americans who renounced their citizenship per year from 2008 and 2015 . 2015 was a record year for renunciations in the country with 4,279 people renouncing their American citizenship or long-term residency .
This timeline depicts Nike 's revenue worldwide from 2005 to 2020 . In 2020 , Nike 's global revenue amounted to about 37.4 billion U.S. dollars .
In 2019 , the armed forces represented the most trusted institution in Italy . In particular , 72 percent of respondents declared to trust the armed forced . On the contrary , political parties and the Parliament were trusted by only nine and 15 percent of respondents , respectively .
This statistic shows the annual change in the real GDP of Tennessee from 2000 to 2019 , compared to preceding period . In 2019 , the real GDP of Tennessee grew by roughly 1.6 percent .
The statistic illustrates the government expenditure on recreation and sports in the Netherlands from 2006 to 2016 . In 2016 , the government expenditure on recreation and sport was approximately 3.4 billion euros .
This statistic shows the number of nuclear warheads around the world from 1945 to 2017 . In 2017 there were an estimated 9,220 nuclear warheads worldwide .
As per the results of a survey across India , around five thousand female students were awarded their undergraduate degree in Goa during academic year 2019 . The number of male graduates was considerably lesser that year compared to female graduates in this state .
YouTube is the most active social network among internet users in the United Kingdom ( UK ) , with 78 percent of people reporting use of the service . Facebook was very close behind , with a rate of 73 percent .
This statistic presents the Corruption Perception Index score obtained by Uruguay from 2012 to 2019 . This index is a composite indicator that includes data on the perception of corruption in areas such as : bribery of public officials , kickbacks in public procurement , embezzlement of state funds , and effectiveness of governments ' anti-corruption efforts . The highest possible score in perception of corruption is 0 , whereas a score of 100 indicates that no corruption is perceived in the respective country .
This statistic compares how favorable Prince Charles was viewed in different countries worldwide in 2018 . With a net favorability of 47 percent , Charles is viewed most favorably in Romania , more than his native Great Britain where his net favorability rating is only three percent . In 14 of the countries surveyed here , Charles has a negative favorability rating
This statistic displays the total global human growth hormone market in 2016 and a forecast for 2026 , measured in billion U.S. dollars . In 2016 , the total market was estimated to stand at approximately 3.7 billion U.S. dollars . Among the leading application areas of growth hormones are growth hormone deficiency , Idiopathic Short Stature ( ISS ) , Turner syndrome , Prader-Willi syndrome , and Small for Gestational Age ( SGA ) .
This statistic shows the development of Missouri 's real GDP from 2000 to 2019 . In 2019 , the real GDP of Missouri was 209.96 billion U.S. dollars .
The statistic shows the capacity of UASC ships based on TEUs . As of June 25 , 2014 , the container carrier chartered ships with a capacity of 198,164 TEUs . The abbreviation TEU stands for twenty-foot equivalent units .
The statistic depicts the penetration rate of laptops in the United States from 2016 to 2018 . The laptop penetration in the United States was 53.86 percent in 2017 .
In 2017 , there were exactly 730,242 births in France . That same year , France was the European country with the second highest number of live births behind Germany . Thus , France had a birth rate of 11.7 births per 1,000 population in 2016 , which was one of the highest birth rate in Europe .

The statistic depicts the assets of section 529 savings plan in the United States from 2001 to 2019 . In 2019 , the assets of the section 529 savings plan reached 345.6 billion U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows the median age of the population in New Zealand from 1950 to 2050 . The median age is the age that divides a population into two numerically equal groups ; that is , half the people are younger than this age and half are older . It is a single index that summarizes the age distribution of a population .

This statistic displays the distribution of annual greenhouse gas emissions worldwide in 2017 , based on select countries . During this year , some seven percent of the global emissions originated from India . Carbon dioxide can be removed from the atmosphere through reforestation , soil improvements , and other carbon sinks .

This statistic shows the total number of old age pensions ( AOW ) in the Netherlands from 1998 to 2019 ( in thousands ) . In 2019 , there were approximately 3.4 million old age pensions in the Netherlands . The AOW scheme is an insurance scheme which covers everyone who lives or works in the Netherlands , regardless of nationality and is a basic state pension .

It appears that Matt Pokora was the most followed singer on Twitter with 5.5 million followers . As for David Guetta , he overheard all the other personalities of music with its international notoriety which brought him more than 21.9 million subscribers that year .

The statistic shows Australia 's public debt from 2014 to 2018 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ) , with projections up until 2024 . The debt-to-GDP ratio includes the debts of central and local government , communities and municipalities as well as social security . In 2018 , Australia 's public debt was around 41.37 percent of its GDP .
This statistic displays the results of a survey conducted in 2019 , in which dog owners in the United Kingdom ( UK ) were asked which treats they regularly give their dog . Among the various types of treat , dog biscuits are the most common , given by 77 percent of owners surveyed . Dental chews and leftovers rank in second and third place , popular among 63 percent and 26 percent of owners , respectively .

As of 2019 , Elysia , situated in Angleur , was the number one technology company in Belgium with a growth rate of approximately 2,858 percent .

This union territory and district in western India had about 3,175 industrial units . The country 's national electric grid had an installed capacity of approximately 364 gigawatts as of October 2019 .
In 2019 , `` Czech '' was the leading relative category on Pornhub.com in Poland . It was viewed 98 percent more often in Poland than worldwide .
Almost all Hungarian companies operating in the hospitality sector expect the negative effects of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) . Construction companies least expect negative economic consequences of the virus . For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic , please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page .

The first case of COVID-19 in Norway was confirmed on February 26 , 2020 .

Gilly Hicks is a Abercrombie & Fitch brand , which specializes in women 's underwear , pajamas , casual clothing and beauty products .
This statistic shows the number of infant deaths in the United Kingdom from 2000 to 2018 . Infant death is defined as a death under the age of one . The overall trend was one of decrease , however , after dropping from 2000 to 2002 , the figure saw five rises in six years between 2002 and 2008 before decreasing each year considerably to the latest figure for 2018 .
